"Excuse me," a tiny voice interrupted. Laura looked down and found a girl of maybe 11 or 12 years old. Even she had the tight muscular body of a gymnast. She held a glossy photo and a marker up to Laura. "Can I have your autograph? You're my hero."

Laura let out a surprised laugh that was too loud and awkward. She quickly snatched the photo from the girl and scribbled her name on it. She took a quick glance at the image before passing it back to the girl and saw herself in a bejeweled bikini similar to one a pro bodybuilder would wear in a competition. She was standing in a white room flexing her stupendous muscles. Laura was pretty sure she was a good 30 or 40 pounds heavier now than when the picture was taken and she wondered how old it was.

The girl thanked Laura for the signature and bounced away. Once she was gone Vanessa scoffed, "What, you're giving those away for free now?"

"She's just a kid," Laura shot back.

"Just a kid? Are you going soft on me?"

"Does anything about me look soft to you?" Laura smiled at her own comment and puffed out her chest for emphasis.

Vanessa rolled her eyes then directed Laura's attention down the sand. "Here comes Sara."

Laura turned and saw that the Sara in question was the one she knew from her own reality as Greg's girlfriend. Laura had always thought of Sara as beautiful but here she was radiant. Somehow her "girl-next-door" beauty had been transformed, the girl Laura would have called adorable was gone and in her place was a diva who she strut with the confidence of goddess making even Laura feel nervous to be around her. Just like nearly everyone else in this world Sara's physique was expanded meaning she was a bit more developed than Vanessa but on a frame that was the same height as Laura making her look like a powder keg primed to explode. Her platinum hair was in a pixie cut and she wore a white one-piece swimsuit that was so thin, and so tight that every single detail of her torso was visible, the outline of her shredded abs, the shape of her perky breasts, all was on complete display with only her nipples and crotch granted extra padding for concealment. The girl also wore an interesting amount of jewelry for a beach trip giving her pale suit and pale hair gold highlights with a gold necklace, bangle and even a gold and diamond anklet.

"What's up bitches?" Sara said as she arrived amidst her friends. "You're both looking big and bad as ever."

More and more Laura had a sinking feeling about the sort of people she and her friends were in this world. The Sara she knew was sweet and demure while at the same time sexy and powerful; not brash like this new version. Things were beginning to spiral out of control.

"Hey, you'll never guess what Ms. Monster over here just did." Vanessa said to Sara. "She just gave out an autograph for free!"

The look of shock on Sara's face was complete. "What. The. Fuck. Money-Mad McMuscles? I don't believe you."

Vanessa laughed. "I saw it with my own eyes."

"The same girl that chased down a family because their child squeezed her thigh? And when they refused to pay for the pleasure of touching her she ripped their car door off as they tried to get away?" Sara wasn't laughing.

Vanessa nodded gravely but her eyes were sparkling. "The same."

Laura's stomach sank further, I did that? Then another thought occurred to her: I can do that? How strong am I? So much was a mystery to her, based on her size alone she shouldn't be capable of such feats as Sara had mentioned but perhaps the phone had boosted her strength beyond what her size would suggest.

Frustrated and intruded at the same time Laura glared at Vanessa and Sara, "Can we go now?"

Both girls got quiet immediately telling Laura that they were intimidated by her despite being friends. The trio marched across the beach as Laura mulled over her situation. She loved her new body and apparent power but she was not a fan of the fact that her life had changed so drastically. She sighed to herself thinking that if she had only known that the crazy app was going to change her entire history she would have been more careful. Heck, she hadn't even really expected it to work and now here she was. She'd lost Jason as a friend and turned her, Vanessa and Sara into jerks. She was pretty sure, in fact, that they were full blown bullies. This was further punctuated by the fact that everywhere they went they drew stares, but not the kind Laura wanted. The looks they were getting wasn't of allure or lust but fear. People were afraid of her and her gang and Sara and Vanessa seemed to be basking in it.

The trio walked in a silent strut all the way to The Stage where Laura found...
121321.title: The World of Today

choices: Laura sticks with her group.
Laura leaves.
1213212.content:
The Stage was so called because that's what it literally was: a stage. Rows of elevated bleachers faced a platform on which it looked like plays would normally be performed but instead a sort of gym had been installed. The equipment was huge and loaded with tons of oversized weights: steel plates the size of bus tires, refrigerator-sized concrete blocks wrapped in chains, even a huge pile of mangled scrap metal off to one side. Half a dozen men and two women were on the stage using the equipment, but few seemed to be utilizing its full potential. Most stuck to more standard weights, but lots of them. Everyone on the stage was built bigger than anyone Laura had ever seen in her life but somehow she was still the biggest of them all.

On the far right side was a giant of a man standing 6' 2" and tipping the scales at around 300 pounds of super jacked muscle. He was standing in the squat rack with a huge bar across his shoulders. From her vantage point Laura surmised that he was the closest to her in terms of bulk but the fact that she outweighed him by more than 50 pounds at nearly a full foot shorter made her look far more developed. As they got closer Laura could see that the giant was someone she recognized. His name was Eric and in her own reality he and Greg had been friends in High School both playing on the football team. The two had drifted apart after graduation with Greg getting into bodybuilding and Eric falling out of athletics altogether. In this reality it seemed the two had switched places with Greg the smaller of the two by far.

"How much is fat fuck squatting over there?" Sara asked.

"Hmmmm…," Vanessa thought for a moment counting in her head, "Looks like about a ton, I'd say."

Laura was about to blurt out some shocked explicative but held her tongue and good thing because the next words out of Sara's mouth were:

"Ha! Does he really think anyone can compete with Laura here? She could do twice that without breaking a sweat."

Vanessa laughed then added, "On one foot."

Laura's stomach fluttered and she was, once again, left wondering just how much raw power was contained in her beastly body.

As the trio got closer to the stage they were able to see more and more of it and now they could see a woman working the bench press.

"Check out Nikki," Vanessa said. "She's looking to show off."

The bar she was pressing was like nothing Laura had ever seen before. It held a full compliment of plates but that was only the beginning. A steel frame had been built around the plates on both sides atop which were a couple of chairs which were occupied with huge men who were both holding even more weights in their laps. As if that wasn't enough a concrete block the size of a microwave dangled down from below each side of the bar. Despite this incalculable weight the woman, Nikki, was pounding out rep after rep with furious speed and ease while the huge men held on for dear life. By the time Laura counted 25 she could see Nikki begin to slow but still she persisted through another dozen or so reps before racking the bar and sitting up.

Just like everyone else on stage this girl was a behemoth like Laura had never seen before. She leapt to her feet and curled her giant arms into a mind-bending crab flex while roaring for the crowd. Even from a distance Laura could see the insane vascularity and crazy detail in this girl's pumped up muscles. To add to the fact that the 5' 7" girl was a muscle monster she was also gorgeous with fiery red hair, dazzling green eyes, and a smile that even made Laura's knees weak. Nikki strut her way to the front of the stage and went through a series of poses that made it look like her overstressed bikini top was going to pop right off.

Laura spotted Eric rack his 1 ton bar and step out of the rack shaking his thunder thighs and giving a few flexes while nodding with pride. And Laura thought he should be proud, he looked amazing. She wanted to jump up on the stage and give those quads a good squeeze, she wanted to ask Eric what he was doing later. Was he seeing anyone? Did he like big girls? She wanted to know what it would feel like to rub her muscles against his.

A moment later she saw Nikki, apparently finished with her posing routine, strut over to where Eric was and say something to him. He looked a bit hesitant at her words and looked like he wanted to turn to leave but couldn't for some reason.

"Ha! Look at her go!" Vanessa said. "She's gonna take him down a peg or two!!"

Sara was ecstatic, "Yeah, it looks like he wants to back down. YOU KNOW THE RULES, FAT ASS!! NO BACKING DOWN FROM A CHALLENGE!!"

Eric sighed and slumped his shoulders. Nikki turned to the crowd and got them cheering the both of them on. The pair walked over to an arm wrestling table and stood on opposite sides. Nikki pumped her 25 inch bicep several times driving the people in the stands crazy before posting up and waiting for Eric to do the same. Finally he took her hand after a countdown began pushing with all of his might. Even from a distance Laura could see veins on his neck, arm, shoulders, even his chest bulge like crazy while his skin flushed. Yet despite all his effort Nikki's hand never budged and she threw her head back in a haughty laugh.

Nikki made a motion with her free hand as if telling Eric to bring it on even more and so he did now using both of his hands against her one but still he couldn't move her. Nikki held strong against him looking like she was having the time of her life while sweat poured down Eric's face. Finally she put him out of his misery quickly and smoothly pushing both of his hands back until they touched the table. Nikki put her hands in the air in a victory pose while Eric slunk off to the back of the stage and vanished.

The crowd was going wild as were Vanessa and Sara. Laura just felt sick. She knew that macho attitudes were a part of the bodybuilding scene but she'd never really been around it that much since her brother and his friends had always been so grounded and nice. Now, not only was she surrounded by mean spirited jerks but she was apparently their leader. It was enough to actually make her want to head home and use the phone to get her old life back. But what if she couldn't? Maybe it was better to stay here and use her influence to get everyone to be nicer. Maybe she could just straight up ditch Vanessa and Sara and find better friends.

Vanessa and Sara left Laura's side to join Nikki on stage and congratulate her on her domination of Eric. Alone on the sand Laura decided to…

12132121.content:
As she watched Vanessa and Sara walk up to the stage she decided that she should follow.

"That guy stood no chance" said Nikki, especially when you're comparing him to these guns" as he started I flex her 2 biceps which lead the crowd to go wild.

Then as Laura ran up to the stage the crowd proceeded to turn it up at the sight of her. From hearing that Vanessa, Sara, and Nikki all smiled and proceeded push Laura to the front while they stroked a pose behind her. The crowd was anxious for it so Laura decided to give in and flex both her biceps which the crowd loved. At the sight of this she felt that this world wasn't so bad and felt like she could do something for people when suddenly-

"ALL RIGHT BITCHES, PAY UP" came Sara, " YOU GOT TO SEE LAURA SO PAY YOUR DUES" as she proceeded to get down from the stage and got the people to line up to pay her.

Vanessa and Nikki followed with Laura behind, but she felt uneasy as her 15 seconds of blessing turned into a money making scheme. "You sure we should be taking their money, I mean it was only 15 seconds?" She asked.

Nikki turned back over and gave her a look. "This is coming from the woman who noticed that on her food bill, they over taxed her so she chose to nearly choke the waiter" Nikki said annoyed, " honestly it's like you're a different person who doesn't ca-HEY, WHAT ARE YOU DOING OVER THERE?!" As Nikki's attention was drawn to someone in the back.

Laura turned to see what she was referencing and saw a man pushing his way out panicking.

With less people in the vicinity Vanessa took initiative and started to run after the guy, however they guy for whatever reason had set up and array of people to block any one of them. Sure they were weak that could be pushed over, but when there were like a stampede of them it slowed Vanessa down to the point where she lost sight of him. So at best se chose to take the rest of the guys and head back to the group.

"That bastard had the guts to run from us" Vanessa said as they were waking out,"despite that, how much did we make in profit?"

"Got about $4000, honestly we could do better gals" said Sara, "although money aside what we gonna do about our runner?" As they switched back to the guy who escaped their clutches of paying the fee.

Laura kept a straight face, but inside she was baffled at how they were able to call $4000 measly and how they could do better. She lost her train of thought however when Nikki spoke up.

"Alright, the guy couldn't have Gina far at his size, we should be able to hunt him down right Laura?" Said Nikki as she turned her head over to her.

Laura weakly retorted by saying "isn't it late though, maybe we should rest up and go at it when it's daylight". To only get dirty looks from all 3 of them.

They were about to say something when Vanessa cut them off.

"You know what, maybe you gals should go on ahead. I'll take Laura home to set her straight". As they left the group to start heading home

Laura gets confronted by Jason the wimp and they lay a towel on the sand and sit and chat Laura is alot bigger than him and way hotter but Jason had atractive looks for a guy in her old life Laura asks Jason if he could please rub tanning oil on her and he agrees Laura lays down and closes her eyes and says in her sweet voice " you know Jason your really sweet " Jason blushes and massages her muscles with the oil.

Laura immidiately clicks on it and looks at some clothes she buys a string thong bikini

121321221.title: Laura goes to her room

choices: Find Greg and ask for a workout plan.
Put Greg on a shrinking plan opposite her growth.
Put her best friend Jason on a similar growth plan.
122.content:
As much as she wanted to explode with powerful size and show off insane muscles right now Laura decided that the joy of slowly growing to the size of her brother then beyond would be incredible fun.

She examined the graph and found that she could set the length of time until her growth completed and how much she would grow during the process. She set the target time of completion at 1 year. She knew that this was still very fast for anyone to add that much size, but decided there was no way she would be able to wait any longer and it would allow her to show off her dynamite physique on the beach next summer. She set the growth to happen very slow at first adding only 5-10 pounds a month for the first few months then slowly cranking up the growth faster and faster until the last few months in which she’d be packing on the pounds like crazy until reaching her target weight of 355 lbs.

Laura decided that she wanted to add a little bit of height to her body as well, and while she wouldn’t be able to really account for that sort of addition from working out at the gym she figured it would give her impending muscle more room to breathe once it had been added to her frame. She backed up to the main alterations page and selected height, then added 5 inches bringing her to 5’ 9”. She wanted to go farther, but realized she’d have enough trouble explaining those inches she’d already added.

Tapping on the “Scheduled Application” button once more she was greeted with a second line on the graph, this one representing her height increase. She made it a straight diagonal line from the start date and 0% growth to the end date and 100% growth so she would get taller at the exact same rate for the full year.

Her hands were sweating with excitement as she placed her finger on the button marked “Begin Scheduled Alterations” and initiated a process that would change her life forever. Once the button had been pressed Laura could feel a warmth enter her body, and she knew that feeling would be with her until the same day the following year.

She turned and examined herself in the small mirror on top of her bookshelf and said goodbye to her old body and hello to the new Laura.

What to do next?
122.title: Slow and Steady

choices: Greg sends her away with a workout plan.
Greg agrees to train her one-on-one.
Vanessa decides to join Laura in exercising.
1221.content:
Looking in the mirror, Laura realized that her body erupting with mounds of muscle would seem kind of odd to everyone around her. She needed a cover story.

Throwing on her one-piece swimsuit and a pair of shorts, Laura made her way down to the beach to talk to her brother. If he could give her a good workout plan it would explain her growth, at least to a degree. Greg would feel good about his personal training skills, too.

Finding her siblings, she sees the expected scene. Greg is surrounded by ladies caressing his muscles and Vanessa is joined by boys staring slack-jawed at her body and other girls hanging around to make themselves appear more popular.

"Hey, Greg." Laura spoke up sheepishly. "You have a minute?"

"Sure, sis." Greg replied while standing up. "I'll be back, ladies."

They walked a short distance down the beach before Laura built the courage to speak up. I was watching you and Vanessa down here. It got me thinking. I'd like to be more outgoing."

"Oh yeah? That's great. Wanna hang out with us?"

"Well, that's why I wanted to talk. I don't feel confident enough, you know... looking like this."

"What are talking about?"

"I'm scrawny and underdeveloped!" Laura blurted out with a bit of a laugh. "Or haven't you noticed?"

"Haha. Okay. You want me to train you?"

"Yes. That's exactly it." She says with a pat on his shoulder.
1221.title: Find Greg and ask for a workout plan.

choices: Her day goes according to plan and she meets Greg at the gym.
She finds her friend Jason in her room, playing with her phone.
12212.content:
"Well, I start my shift at the gym at 4, if you want to come." Greg offered. "I could give you some one-on-one advice."

That was a generous offer and Laura was genuinely touched. Though her siblings had always outclassed her physically, they had never been rude to her and they were a loving family.

"Thanks, G. I really appreciate it." Laura said with a smile. "I'll see you there. Now get back to your groupies. I'm sure they're missing their centerpiece."

Greg smiled, turned, and walked back to his crowd, proud of his sister for taking matters into her own hands where genetics had failed her.

Laura decided to not let this trip to the beach be a waste and found a nice spot to herself to sit and watch the waves. As people walked by she couldn't help but get excited at the prospects of what were to come. Some day she'd be able to come to this beach and turn heads just like her siblings did. Watching people go by she noticed, too, that the ladies on this beach seemed to be fitter than usual, with most sporting defined abs if not an outright six-pack. This was odd to her. Had she just not noticed? She was usually too shy to come down here after all, she could have just missed it. Or maybe that's a new trend? Both plausible answers, but for some reason it piqued her curiosity.

She realized that she had been staring at group of girls admiring their physiques and was suddenly awash in embarrassment. She decided to head on back home and get ready for her gym-date with her brother.
12212.title: Greg agrees to train her one-on-one.

choices: Her growth goes as planned.
For good or ill, something unforeseen occurs.
122121.content:
Laura meanders into the gym in awestruck wonder. She had begun to feel silly for even thinking the app would work, and the enormity of this place was beginning to intimidate her. The floor was filled wall to wall with nothing but the sexiest of hardbodies, male and female. Unlike most gyms, she imagined, there was nobody here that seemed to be out of shape in the least. Well, nobody but her. Every last man and woman looked as if they had been cut from marble and placed in a pantheon of bodybuilding.

She was about to chicken out and leave when the biggest of any of the specimens approached her. It was Greg. "Hey lil sis. You don't know how excited I am to see you here. I've been trying to get you healthy for so long." He gave her a playful punch on the shoulder that almost knocked her from her feet.

"I don't know, Greg. It's pretty intense in here. I feel out of place."

"Well, leave that to me. Being head trainer has it's perks. We can use the private weight room as long as it's not reserved, which fortunately it isn't for the next hour. Come on."

Laura followed her brother through the veritable museum of god and goddesses, making her feel smaller and smaller every step she took. He led her to a door next to the locker rooms that opened into a small room that was noticeably better stocked than the rest of the gym. Three of the walls were lined with mirrors while the fourth was made of one way glass so you could witness the rest of the gym without being seen yourself. Currently there was a couple on the other side playfully trying to outflex each other, completely unaware that Laura was watching from the other side.

"Okay, Squirt. Today I'm going to put you through some simple exercises for each part of your body to get a sense of your baseline strength. Nothing too intense today." Greg may not have realized he was lying, but he was. Laura struggled through every maneuver, most of the time using just a bar with no added weight. By the end, she was exhausted and could barely sit up straight on the bench.

"Alright, Laura. We've got a ways to go, but I'll have you pushing some serious iron here in no time." He smiled and mussed her mop of sweaty hair before leading her out of the gym.
122121.title: Her day goes according to plan and she meets Gr...

choices: Laura plays it safe and stops working out (facing the wrath of Greg).
Laura keeps going to the gym. Getting stronger is too much fun.
1221212.content:
After leaving the gym Laura drove home stinking of sweat. She couldn't believe how stressful her workout had been despite the fact that she'd only been using the most minimal weights and settings. Greg had been very sweet and not commented on her severe lack of strength but had instead been a perfect trainer and encouraged her to push harder and harder. She could see why he was so successful in his job.

Laura arrived home and felt real fatigue setting in as she got out of her car. She'd felt pretty good for a little bit after leaving the gym but now her muscles were tightening up and she was beginning to really feel sore. Ascending the stairs to her room was actually painful and she had to stop halfway. By the time she got to her room Laura felt like something was very wrong, her entire body was on fire and it really hurt. She couldn't make a single move or even breathe without hurting. She peeled off her damp clothes, turned on her TV, and lay down in bed. It was only 6 in the evening but Laura drifted off to sleep and didn't awake until late the following morning.

- - -


Laura was awoken by her cell phone ringing and based on the fact that it was her Doctor Who ringtone she knew it was Jason calling. She sat up and looked to her bedside table but her phone wasn't there. She climbed out of bed and searched around for the source of the ringing. She found her workout clothes still in a pile on the floor and her phone was still in her shorts pocket.

She answered the phone just before it went to voicemail. "Jason?"

"Hey!" He was certainly in a good mood. "Are you still coming over today? I found my old Nintendo 64 and I thought we could play some old games together."

Laura laughed. "Yeah, that sounds like fun. Let me just get ready and I'll be over in a bit."

Laura hung up her phone and suddenly realized that she was naked and remembered arriving home tired and sore from her workout. She smiled when she realized that every bit of soreness had vanished from her body and was replaced with energy. She felt completely refreshed and, surprisingly, stronger than she'd ever felt in her life. She looked to the mirror that hung from her wall and examined her body. She decided it looked pretty much the same as it had, but when she ran her hands over her chest and stomach she found that much of the softness she'd grown used to was gone. Now she felt a lot more solid and even downright hard in some places.

Laura let loose a string of giggles as waves of excitement charged through her body. It had only been a day and already she was finding changes. She picked out some clothes to wear and practically skipped to the shower. She got her shoes on then sprinted from her house to Jason's. It wasn't a very far run, Jason's house was only a few down from her own, but usually even a short dash was enough to leave Laura winded. Instead she arrived at Jason's brimming with energy.

Jason and Laura played video games and chatted for a few hours though Laura spent much of the time distracted. She kept imagining the monstrous body she was growing into but even more than that she wrestled with a brand new feeling: she was horny. Really, really horny. A couple of times she found herself touching Jason on the shoulder or the leg in the hopes that he would reciprocate or even escalate. Laura was still a virgin and had always kind of assumed that her first time would be with her best friend but somehow that had never come to be. Now she was trying to subtly cash that check but to her frustration Jason remained oblivious to her intentions.

Just about the time that Laura couldn't take it anymore and was going to really launch herself at Jason full force she received a text message. It was from her brother and read:

Hey Sis! You still comin to the gym today? Don't quit on me yet!! I can fit in a session with you at 6 tonight, good?

"What's that smile for?" Jason was asking.

Laura didn't even realize it but she was practically glowing with excitement. "Oh, nothing. I'm just making arrangements with my personal trainer," she said as she sent a text back agreeing to meet Greg at 6.

"Personal trainer?" Jason asked. "What's all that about?"

Laura giggled, she could see Jason was trying to hide excitement. "Oh yeah, I decided I wanted to get into shape. Maybe even pack on some muscle. I just got started yesterday and I'm already feeling great."

"Really?" Jason continued to act nonchalant but Laura could see that he was only playing. Was Jason turned on by strong women? This could be great; she decided to push further.

"Yep. Can't you picture me with huge muscles? Wouldn't that be awesome. Like, what if I were as big as Greg? Or even bigger?!?" She stood and pretended to flex enormous muscles.

"Heh, I guess so. But I seriously doubt you'd ever be able to get close to Greg's size. You'd have to be the biggest woman in the world for that." Jason was adjusting in his seat and Laura realized that she had discovered something about her friend she had never known.

"Then that's what I'll be," she said plainly. "I've got to go get ready." She shot him a wink and left even though she still had 2 hours to kill before her session with Greg. She decided this was a perfect time to end the conversation with Jason and though she still wanted to jump all over him she decided that she'd leave him wanting more. Maybe she could even get him to come on to her.

Laura hung out at her house for a while before getting into her workout clothes and heading to the gym. Today she felt less intimidated by the pantheon of muscle gods and goddesses that surrounded her on all sides even though she appeared no closer to matching their size or strength she knew she was on her way. Greg took her into the private room in the back again and they began working through a few routines.

Almost instantly Greg was shocked by how much stronger Laura was. She had added nearly 15 pounds to most of her lifts and over 20 pounds to any exercise involving her legs.

"You must have been holding back yesterday," Greg said. "I've never seen anyone, especially a beginner like you, tack on so much weight overnight. You sure you're not pushing yourself too hard? I don't want you to hurt yourself."

"I feel great," Laura said, and she meant it.

Greg didn't have another client until 8 so she was able to work out twice as long as she had the night before. Once she left, though, she was regretting it and the pain and the soreness returned in full force. Laura once more collapsed into bed, this time not even able to take her clothes off first.

- - -


A little after 9AM Laura's eyes shot open and she leapt out of bed. Just like the previous morning all stiffness was long gone and she felt amazing. Glancing in the mirror once more she examined herself and decided that she still looked pretty much the same. She wasn't sure but perhaps her waistline was a little trimmer and maybe she had lost a tiny bit of fat on her thighs and arms but when she felt herself there was no doubt that her muscles were responding to her workouts. It felt like there was a layer of rock beneath her skin and though it hadn't shown through just yet she knew it would any day now.

Laura found her phone and opened the Alterations app to get a look at the image of herself at full size. As soon as she did, however, she was met with a message:

WARNING!
Baseline stats have changed.
Target stats will be recalibrated.


Now when she was shown the avatar of herself as she'd be in a year she noticed the weight had grown to 410 pounds. Laura frowned, why had that changed? She noticed a small icon in the warning message that would give her more information and she tapped it.

When long term goals are established the body enters a state
in which it becomes more pliable and responsive to outside
stimuli. As such it is recommended that one should abstain
from activities that could alter the established goals as
this can cause unexpected changed to occur.


"So my workouts are suddenly supercharged which is why I'm getting stronger so fast and that's affecting what will happen to my body at the end of my transformation." She thought about this for a moment before she was interrupted by a text from her brother:

I have an opening earlier in the day today. Meet me at noon.

She responded back with a quick message telling Greg that perhaps she should stop working out. She said she wasn't sure that weightlifting was right for her. Instantly her phone rang.

Before she could even say hello Greg was speaking, "Oh no you don't! I've seen this before. You can totally do this and you're coming to the gym if I have to drag you there myself. Vanessa had originally wanted to join Greg at the gym to "tone up" and maybe check out the hunks, but from the first day she had fallen in love with lifting and was damn good at it. In four short weeks her sister had become somewhat of a celebrity in the gym for her progress.

"Damn, Vanessa. Even I didn't make those kinds of gains my first month." Greg interjected, breaking Laura's inner monologue.

Laura sat and watched her sister posing in the mirror after her third bench press set with 150 lbs. "You know, I was afraid that the stronger I got that I'd lose my, um, assets. I couldn't have been more wrong. I mean, I had an awesome booty before, but now I look 10x better. Even the muscles I was really scared to build look good." Vanessa flexed her biceps in the mirror and grinned as wide as possible. A tennis ball sized mound rose from her slender arm. "I thought it wasn't feminine, but I was wrong. The bigger I get the sexier I feel. I told myself I'd stop gaining after a little bit, but no way. I'm getting as big as possible." She pumped her arm a few more times and then spread her lats and turned to look over her shoulder in the mirror. "You know what I mean, Laura? You have to, you're building up, too., no offense, but this look is a huge improvement from where you were.

Laura smiled and nodded. She knew her sister was right, but she struggled with the jealousy. She was supposed to be the one making a splash, but as usual, Vanessa stole the spotlight. How could this happen?

Another Month Later

The jealousy never went away. Laura had assumed that her sister would plateau and she would overtake her easily, but it was not to be.

The app was performing it's magic on Laura. She had added another 23 lbs and no longer merely looked athletic, she was downright muscular and sexy at 148. Her buff body drew stares everywhere she went. And she knew for sure that her long time friend Jason was in love with her because he told her so last week. An admission he made after being given permission to feel her flexed biceps. Her muscles weren't just for show, either. She had just set a new one rep max on the bench with 190 lbs.

The jealousy has never gone away because Vanessa is now warming up with that same 190 lbs. The jealousy was wrestling with awe, though. According to Greg, nobody had ever made progress this fast, man or woman. He had asked her if she was on steroids, but he believed her denial because there was no drug that could cause muscle mass to grow this fast.

The jealousy won, though, because that awe should be hers. She, too, was making unheard of gains, but Greg and everyone else was focused on Vanessa's metamorphosis.

Vanessa easily put the bar back on the rack and stood up to pose in the mirror as she always did between sets. "275 today. I want a new PR."

"Whatever you say, 'Ness." Greg set about loading the bar, just shaking his head and laughing to himself.

Vanessa was tipping the scales at 180 muscular pounds. The fat had pretty much disappeared from her body, except for exactly where a woman would want it. 180 lbs of hard muscle looked unbelievable with natural DD's and a bubble butt. Literally unbelievable because it was unheard of. Especially paired with the 17" biceps she was proudly flexing in the mirrored wall.

Unbelievable was an understatement. Laura's growth was unbelievable, Vanessa's was impossible.

DUH! How had she not thought of it before now. Maybe the app made a parallel change to Vanessa because of genetics or something. She pulled up the app for the first time in awhile. She didn't have much use for it right now since her profile was locked down until the end of her growth. If Vanessa was affected, hers would be locked, too.

Laura's heart sank as her sister's page opened completely, showing a perfect model of the behemoth of beauty. Laura dejectedly flipped through the settings admiring the numerical representation of Vanessa's perfection when she came across an interesting setting she hadn't seen before: "Muscle Growth Aptitude."

On a scale of 1-100 Vanessa's bar was naturally set at 95, which explained the ever growing mass of sexuality in front of her. Flipping over to Greg she sees his is sitting at 71. On her own page, she finds her aptitude is a ridiculous 12, which didn't matter due to the other alterations she had made to herself.

Her attention was drawn away from her phone to the bench where Vanessa lifted the ridiculous weight from the rack. She promptly completed her new 1-rep max and followed it up with 4 more labored, screaming, presses. After racking the bar, she sprang to her feet and ran to the mirror to witness her own massive most muscular flex. Her now known aptitude level had allowed that lift to pump her chest enough that her pecs had obviously grown from just a moment ago, enough to make the straps of her bikini top visibly stretch. Oh yeah, by the way, Vanessa lifts in a bikini top, cut off denim booty shorts, and on non-leg days like today, 4-inch heels.

The jealousy never went away. Laura needed to do something about it.

122132222.content:
Angela wasn't sure why she picked this gym. It had a reputation as the most hardcore muscle factory in the area, and initially that had felt like an attraction. Surely surrounded by all of these bodybuilders she would find help and motivation. Instead she had just found confusion and intimidation. She had no idea what she was doing and that was punctuated by the fact that so many people here had obviously been doing this for so long, especially the massive and gorgeous model/bodybuilder currently about to flex out of her top in front of the mirrored wall.

"Well, standing around gawking isn't going to get anything accomplished." Angela said to nobody in particular. "Might as well try something."

Looking around, she found the least fit girl she could find and decided to emulate her. The problem is, although she was the nearest in fitness level, it still wasn't close. This girl looked like she had walked out of a fitness magazine and straight to the dumbbells.

Angela sighed and followed step. She passed over the lightest weights, assuming that although she had never worked out once in her life,her natural size should give her something of an advantage. Angela was 6' tall and mostly legs. Unfortunately for her, that picturesque frame was covered with almost 300 lbs of fat. Earlier this week she had looked into the mirror and was honest with herself for the first time in awhile. She had to admit that she was actually quite attractive facially, she just had to make her body match.

Reaching down, Angela grabbed the 25's assuming this would be a good start. They were heavier than she had anticipated and she had struggled to emulate the good form of the woman next to her. Angela was a determined woman, though. She forced herself to curl the weights 10 times, and by the end she had found her rhythm. The lifts were actually easier than at first, so she just assumed she had started wrong. She picked them up again to do another set of 10 and found that the whole set went smoothly. Stealing a glance at the girl next to her, she noticed that although she was undoubtedly more muscular and toned, she was also just using 25's.

"Huh. I must have some muscle under this flab." Angela said to herself and flexed a double biceps pose in the mirror. To her utter shock, there was movement atop her arm. More than just movement, her upper arm swelled above her shoulder. It didn't have the definition or shape of the rest of the meatheads around her, but there was definitely considerable mass there.
122132222.title: Angela: An obese newbie on her first day

Laura's plan backfires.  Vanessa and Angela become friends and workout partners.
1221322222.content:
Angela had considered buying time with a trainer when she signed up at this gym. There was certainly no shortage of qualified candidates to help her chisel her physique. That turned out to be unnecessary, though, as she was apparently a natural at bodybuilding.

"Why have I never tried weight training before?" She muttered to herself in the changing room stall. She was observing herself in the private mirror hanging on the back of the door. She had tried every fad diet, infomercial training program, and even other conventional exercises like yoga. She had never given true resistance training a chance but she was taking to it now like a fish to water.

"God. If a week of aimlessly lifting has given me this, imagine if I had dedicated myself to it awhile ago, like in college or high school." She watched her underwear clad frame bring up a double bicep flex. She was still soft, which is why she worked out in an oversized track suit, especially with viral sensation Vanessa Friedman always around showing off her shredded bulk in next to nothing. The thick layer of fat was giving way to hard muscle, though, and every day after her workout she made sure to examine her progress in private.

Like most women she initially wanted to lose all her fat and be like the slim and lean models plastered all over society's advertising. Like other women, she had liked the idea of having abs, but also like other women she had hated the idea of cardio. Unlike most other women, when she saw her arms move with her flex, she began to like the idea of growth.

She could see the growth now. Even though she stayed clear of the treadmills, she was losing fat all over her body. That fat was being replaced by strong muscle. That first day she had been somewhat close to Vanessa as she shot a video for her YouTube channel. For her fanbase, which was growing almost as fast as she was, Vanessa was measuring her biceps, cheering loudly when she squeezed her flex to get them over 17 inches. Angela had never though of measuring her arms or body parts other than bust/waist/hips. It made sense to her as a way to track progress, so she had done the same, just not for a camera.

She fished the measuring tape from her bag and wrapped it around the largest part of her upper arm. She looked at her notepad to see last week's measurements, though she remembered them easily. A week ago, her first day at the gym, her arm had been 14 inches unflexed and 15 inches flexed. Some research told her that those were impressive numbers even for a woman of her height. She doubted it was impressive at all if you took into consideration how soft her arms were.

She tightened the tape around her relaxed arm. 13.75 inches. A good amount of fat loss for just a week of working out. Angela brought out a smirk. One thing the tape didn't tell was the strength she could feel even in her inert arm. Eagerly she flexed her bicep as hard as she could, nearly dropping the tape measure in her enthusiasm. She had stretched it to 15.5 inches. A half inch of growth in a week was great. Combined with the quarter inch of fat loss it was awesome. What was making her bite her lip in excitement was something else altogether. She could feel the power inside her body and it was intoxicating. As she had seen Vanessa do last week, she relaxed her arm and quickly brought it back into a flex with all of her might. Her arm shook and she ground her teeth, and the tape slid past 16 inches.

Dropping the tape she turned back to the mirror. She had slowly begun to see definition throughout the week, but not that much. Now she could see the full separation of her biceps from her arm. A visibly hard peak stood next to a large, round deltoid. Without any form of smooth transition, she unleashed the same power she felt in her biceps from every muscle in her body with a most muscular flex. She watched as her body went from large and obviously strong but smooth and a little soft, to large, obviously strong, and incredibly hard.

She watched rapturously as her abs not only appeared from beneath her fat, but showed up as a six pack. Her pecs surged forth, lifting her large breasts with them. Her shoulders bulged and hardened while her traps reached a bit higher up her neck. Her back widened, audibly straining the cheap sports bra she wore under her jacket. She was straightening both of her legs, standing on the ball of her foot, which brought her quads flexing past her kneecap and made her calves so large the muscle could be seen from the front.

She let go of her transformative flex to find her body had returned closer to it's previous state, but not completely. Even relaxed she now looked like she belonged in this gym. "Holy shit." She said to herself, trying to sort out her brain.

Breathing heavily, she recovered mentally and slid the pants over her now noticeably stronger legs and more bubbly butt. She reached for her jacket hanging from the hook and caught a glimpse of herself in the mirror.

"You know what? I thought I was cute before." She said to nobody in particular. "I was wrong. I was hot as Hell. Now I look even better." She let go of the jacket, and flexed her triceps. "I think I'm getting my second wind. This workout isn't over." She confidently strode out of the changing stall into the locker room, leaving her jacket behind and openly showing off her upper body.

Previously she stood out as being out of shape. Now she blended in perfectly with the assorted models, gorgeous women, and bodybuilders that used these facilities. She made her way past these beauties toward the training floor to see what would happen if she dedicated herself NOW.

Minutes later she began to wonder if she shouldn’t tell Jason what was going to happen to his body over the course of the next year, or maybe it would be a nice surprise. She hoped he wouldn’t panic or get scared when his body began to pack on muscle regardless of whether he worked out or not.

Laura decided it would be better if Greg knew what was coming. She didn’t want him to be caught off guard by questions about his increasing bulk with no way to answer them. She grabbed her iPhone and ran downstairs to the living room where she grabbed the cordless house phone and flopped down on the couch.

She called Jason’s cell and he picked up on the second ring.

“I almost didn’t recognize the phone number,” he said without even saying hello first. “What happened to your cell phone that you have to call me on the house line?”

“What are you doing right now. I need you to focus on what I’m saying. You’re not playing WOW or anything are you?”

“No,” Jason said, “I’m not raiding until tonight. I was just reading. What’s up?

“Okay,” Laura took a deep breath. “You remember how you’re always talking about how you wished you could be muscular and strong like Greg so those assholes that push you around would back off?”

Jason sighed, “Not my favorite subject, but yes. And I don’t think I’m always talking about it. Just every now and then. Besides-”

“Stop! Look, it’s going to happen. Over the course of the next year you’re going to grow muscles even bigger than Greg’s.”

“Laura, what the hell are you talking about?”

“I found this... application. And I know it sounds insane, but it’s, like, magic or something. It can change people’s bodies. I used it to input a growth profile that will turn you into a bodybuilder sized hunk over the course of the next year. I just wanted to let you know so that you knew what was going on when your body started getting bigger.”

There was silence on the other end of the line for a long time. Finally Jason spoke, “Have you lost it? There’s no such thing as-”

“A minute ago. Did you feel a strange warmth enter your body?”

This time the pause told her that she was right. It had.

“That doesn’t mean anything. It’s hot in here. You know my dad never lets us turn on the air conditioner.” Jason said, obviously taken aback by her knowledge. “If you really have some magic.. whatever then use it to do something to me right now. Make me taller or something.”

Laura looked at the screen and saw that the height button was dimmed out. “I can’t change your height now, I locked in an increase of that over the course of the next year along with your muscles.
