And he showed no sign of stopping or even slowing down. And always Emily was there. When at the gym she wore spandex shorts and bra set that looked as though it were a size or two too small. Her body was the only thing in the world that could have drawn eyes away from Greg’s bulging form.

Laura watched as Greg morphed into the monster he now was. She avoided him as best she could, working on opposite sides of the gym if possible, but at home it was harder. Greg seemed to go out of his way to make sure he could display his superior size and when Emily was around he was twice as bad. One day he blocked Laura’s passage through the hallway. All he needed to do was stand there, his bulk being more than enough to prevent her from going around. Before she could ask him to move he held one arm up and flexed. His bicep bulged to outrageous size.

“You keep lifting your little weights. You’ve done pretty good for yourself. But if you want to see real strength, real power, some real muscle, then you just come see me. This baby is 27 and a half inches around and still growing. You could never even touch that.”

Laura looked Greg right in the eye. “You just had a head start, that’s all. I’m catching up fast.”

Greg laughed his arrogant laugh then pushed past Laura. Emily was right behind him and grinning from ear to ear. Minutes later Laura could hear the smacking and thumping sounds that signaled that the two were having sex for about the fourth time that day.

It was now December and a full six months since she’d begun her muscle growth plan. Had she let the Alterations app work alone she would have only just now been a sleek 170 pounds. Instead, because her workouts supplementing her growth, she was a mass of female muscle that tipped the scale at 235 pounds. She was now bigger than Greg had been before beginning his steroid cocktail and also larger than any other female in the world. And, although Greg didn’t know it, she was closing in on his current strength level.

After her run in with Greg in the hall, Laura had gone into her room and stood before the full body mirror she’d had installed. She ran through a series of poses watching with awe as her huge muscles fought each other for room on her otherwise petite frame.

She grinned as she thought about the months to come. The Alterations app was set for its slowest growth in the first six months. Her body was about to go into hyper-drive. She was quite sure that she would be stronger than her brother in no more than two weeks. And there was a very good chance that no matter how fast he was able to pack on the pounds she would blast beyond his size in less than 2 months.
122311112221.title: Greg Blasts Ahead

choices: Laura reaches the ap size and stops
Laura grows even bigger and stronger
1223111122211.content:
Laura finally did some investigation on Greg’s girlfriend with help from Jason. As it turned out, Emily was from a rich family that owned a drug company that had allegations of creating designer drugs used by professional athletes, but there had never been any proof. Pictures of Emily from high school showed a thinner and less beautiful version of her current self. The boobs and face were obviously presents from her Daddy. And both Laura and Jason were convinced that Emily was using Greg as a test subject, but of course had no proof. And not that Greg would listen to anyone at this point anyway. He had moved in with Emily and quit school after the first of the year.

In order to keep her distance and not let everyone see her progress, Laura had talked Adam into giving her a key to the gym so she could work out after hours and avoid Greg. He wasn’t thrilled about her working those heavy weights alone, but Laura convinced him she’d be careful.

Laura continued to get updates on Greg as another six weeks passed. The increases in his lifting poundage had slowed once he bested some world record level lifts. His biceps too exceeded world record levels at nearly 29 inches around. Greg’s now volatile nature kept everyone but Emily clear of him even as he bragged up his achievements.

Laura nodded to Adam when she filled him in.

“So Greg’s benching over 1100 pounds now, huh.”

Adam shook his head. “Yeah. Sponsors have been showing up, but Emily is handling everything. She bothers me.”

“Well there’s nothing I can do about that right now. But perhaps it is time to come back to the gym and, well, lift with him.”

Adam looked her over. He was wearing very large baggy sweats, hiding her physique. But Adam could tell that her shoulders were barn door wide. “Are you sure?”

Laura smiled and nodded. “Uh-huh. Let him know I’ll be there around noon. I’ll call you later with details.”

Adam shrugged his shoulders. “Well OK.” He paused for a moment. “Am I going to need to call the National Guard?”

Laura laughed. “I hope not. But I’d keep their number handy just in case.”

Adam sighed. “You’re going to keep this a surprise aren’t you?”

Laura smiled. “Until noon tomorrow.”

Once Greg knew Laura was going to be at the gym, Emily made sure to shoot him up so by the time noon rolled around he had already broken his own bench press record. A small crowd had gathered to watch.

Laura walked into the gym in her baggy sweats and headed toward Greg. They hadn’t seen each other in over a month. Laura raised her eyebrows, surprised a bit at how large Greg looked up close. Greg wasted no time in shouting her over.

“So LITTLE sister. Just because you’ve been avoiding me doesn’t mean I’m not improving. If your idea of showing off is to challenge me to a lifting contest, then we can settle this immediately.”

Laura held her calm demeanor and looked over at the bench press area and the number of plates piled on to the bar. “You’re right Greg. Let’s settle this immediately. Is that your best lift?”

Greg laughed. “Damn straight little girl. 1180 pounds. Over one hundred pounds better than the previous record. What do you want to do, try and leg press it?”

Laura smiled at him and walked toward the bench. “No. I figured to add a couple hundred pounds.” She paused as she nodded at a nervous looking Adam, who had been helping spot Greg. He pulled up a hundred pounds weight and began placing it on the bar. Greg’s face turned red.

“Are you crazy? You can’t lift that! Nobody can lift that!”

Laura sat down on the bench and held her cool smile. “Why, because I’m a girl?”

Greg growled, “Exactly! Now quit kidding around before you hurt yourself. Then you can watch a real man go after the real records!”

Laura sniffed. “Humor me.”

She lay down and reached up. Four men lifted the weight off the stand and brought it to Laura’s hands. She let out a breath and readied herself for the upcoming rush. Her nipples pushed out in anticipation and her entire body tingled. To be able to crush her brother’s world record bench press cold was doubly exciting. She truly was growing stronger every day. And now it was time to prove it.

With a nod, the men released their grip, but held their hands close. The familiar pounding and warmth sizzled through Laura’s muscles and she gasped. Once she had control of the weight Laura shook the men off so Greg wouldn’t think she was helped. Just this feat of strength was staggering. But as the entire gym now watched in stunned silence, Laura brought the bar down to her massive chest that was flexing forth enough muscle to pull her XXXXX shirt taught. Touching the bar to her pectorals, Laura let out a feminine grunt and with a collective gasp from the on-lookers, steadily pushed the impossible weight up and with an excited yell completed her world record shattering lift!

A smattering of cheers of claps followed a the four men quickly moved in and placed the bar back on the rack. Laura jumped up and looked at her enraged, yet completely dumbfounded brother.

“And THAT’S how you perform a bench press. Don’t tell me what I can and cannot do! I’m stronger than you Greg. A LOT stronger! You think that was impressive. I can bench almost a ton! And by next week I will!”

Emily reached out to Greg, but he shrugged her off, too mad and embarrassed for comfort or words. Laura smiled smugly and stood up tall to her nearly 5 foot 7 inch height and ripped her top down the middle and tossed both sides to the ground.

The same stunned crowd let out another collective gasp. Her muscles bristled forth like pink steel boulders across her upper body. The XXXX large white athletic top was stretched across her chest like a second skin, leaving little of her massive, Herculean muscles to the imagination.

“And as for those so called World Record setting muscles of yours, get a load of THESE guns!”

Adam walked up with a tape measure as Laura held her stare on Greg and pulled her right arm into a bicep flex for the ages. The fact that her hands and joints were the same, small, girlish size only made the muscles blasting forth across her arm look even larger. With her hand in a fist, Laura pumped her forearm up and the bicep rose up like an angry volcano. Wicked veins pumped up across her arm, pulsing violently as the bicep peak pushed up her wide, incredibly thick forearm. One hard squeeze sent the bicep peak jumping as a deep chiseled split formed. And as Adam rapped the tape around the gigantic cantaloupe bicep and down to the deep, jagged football triceps, he quickly pulled the tape taught.

Greg leaned forward as Adam gulped. Laura, still staring at Greg hissed. “How big Adam?”

Adam cleared his throat. “Thir-Thirty inches. You’re biceps are thirty inches around!”

Laura smiled again at the confused and over the top enraged Greg.

“That’s right Greg. Your little sister now has bigger biceps than her so called big brother. Too bad those real man muscles can’t compete with these real girl muscles.”

Greg yelled out, his anger boiling over. He stared at Laura for a moment, his eyes ablaze. Laura released her flex, but held both her ground and her stare. Greg took a step forward, but then stopped.

“I don’t know what kind of steroids you’re taking, but the only thing this proves is that you’re some kind of freak! Don’t think this will stand!”

Laura smiled, ignoring his steroid fueled rage. “I’m not taking any. And I think I’ve proved just who the strongest and biggest one is in this family. And don’t you forget it!”

Emily leaned forward and whispered in Greg’s ear. He grunted loudly as a vein on his forehead throbbed. Turning around, he stormed out of the gym with Emily barely keeping up behind him. Once he left Laura let out a deep breath, happy that it didn’t get violent.

Adam walked up to her side. “That was beyond incredible. You truly are a pleasant natural oddity.”

Laura smiled and headed out the back door so she could run home. “Yeah. And a real strong one to boot!”

Adam laughed as Laura headed out the door. Laura ran home quickly, still excited from finally being able to show up Greg. She pulled off the baggy leg sweats and tossed them on the stairs. The pink biker shorts were as strained as her top and her gigantic muscles bunched and popped across her legs. Reaching for some water, Laura picked up the phone and pulled up her profile from the ap. She hadn’t bothered to check it recently, but began to think. She was already nearing the size she had programmed for herself. Now she had to wonder. Was she going to stop once she reached the end size or was she going to grow even beyond that until a year passed? Her strength and size had increased incredibly these past weeks and she had over four months to go until a year had passed.
1223111122211.title: Laura overtakes Greg's strength as planned....

choices: Brian to set up their training
Vanessa, looking rather sad
12231111222112.content:
As the next few weeks went by Laura continued on her blistering pace, growing stronger every day, breaking the one ton bench press mark and cruising to her current record of a ton and half. At this point she had eclipsed every record for every lift by anyone with no signs of slowing down. If anything, her strength was increasing ever faster. Adam had rigged a machine just for her with input from Jason and his mad engineering skills and it was enough to keep up with her needs. For now anyway.

Close encounters with Jason were all too infrequent, but were no less intense. The last marathon session resulted in a broken bed frame. Jason’s parent’s were upset, but knowing just how big Jason and Laura were, weren’t too surprised. And Jason was bigger too. Right on track as he still refused to work out. Too busy with school work, he’d complain, even though she knew he was gaming until all hours. Laura covered for him, telling everyone that he was a good partner in her off hours work outs. Fortunately, nobody bothered checking since Jason was obviously getting bigger.

Which led to their investigation into the ap that started this all. So wrapped up in themselves and the results of those long ago “Applies”, they failed to notice that nobody they knew, hell nobody else anywhere, was doing what they were doing. Turns out that was because the ap was supposed to be a fake. The testimonials were made up. The ap was a 3D modeling application that utilized the advanced camera, archived photos and a wicked GUI that displayed an incredible realistic model that plugged into an advanced morphing engine. The software could use pictures already loaded to set the baseline, then interpolate to display the detailed model. So just how the ap only worked for real only on Laura’s phone (to the best of their knowledge) was a mystery. One they didn’t see as a priority to solve, but one they now had to wonder. Would it even work again?

Greg hadn’t returned to the gym since he stormed out, humiliated. Laura hadn’t seen or heard from him at all and all Vanessa could get out of him was that he was staying at Emily’s. Laura decided that once she grew in strength to super human levels that she would head out to Emily’s and drag Greg home if she had to, as she was worried that Emily would push him until he was either seriously injured or the steroids started tearing him up.

Vanessa still greatly admired her “little” sister, even if it was now also with a bit of fear. Laura was more stronger and muscular than anyone had ever been already and was growing steadily bigger. But one thing that Laura was still happy about was her flexibility. Even though her muscles were huge, she could stretch like a gymnast. And she could run like an Olympian as she discovered. Borrowing a GPS watch, Laura ran as hard as she could for two hours along the paved paths that connected the beaches. Turns out she ran just over 25 miles. Looking up the results, she was on pace to break the world marathon record. For the men! Running so fast with her obvious bulk turned more than a few heads, but she was moving so quickly that they didn’t have time to really say anything.

And through it all her muscles grew bigger. She struggled to find anything to fit her and was special ordering just enough clothes to keep her going, knowing full well she’d outgrow the new clothes in no time. Everyone close to her suggested she find a sponsor to earn some extra money. Energy drinks, protein supplements, and athletic clothing reps had dropped by the gym; but for now Laura spurned them. The less press the best for now. If she went national and her huge gains were seen, much more suspicion that was already heading her way would have to be deflected. No, maybe with a month to go or so, then she’d see. Of course, just exactly how big and strong she’d be was still a bit of a mystery. But to Laura, she still loved every moment. As far as she was concerned the bigger and stronger the better!

So it was a mid-day visit to the gym when Laura knew it was really slow that she met with Adam.

“Hey Laura, how have you been? Is the machine holding out?”

Laura was now up above 5 foot 7, but also well over 350 pounds. She looked like a tank. Of course her face was still that of the same pretty 18 year old girl that walked into the gym 8 months ago. The new pink biker shorts hugged her massive quads like a second skin and the pink athletic top was doing no better. Even with the added padding in front, she had a hard time covering up. Good thing the next round of clothing was due soon.

“Yeah, so far.”

Adam was still behind a machine and Laura was behind a wall at the front desk, so he couldn’t see much more than her head.

“So how much are you benching now, girl?”

Laura smiled as he walked closer and she moved from behind the wall.

“Over 3000 pounds. 3050 just last night to be exact.”

Adam stopped once he stood six feet away and blinked. “Did you say 3050 pounds?”

Laura giggled. “You bet.”

Adam visibly shook his whole body at the thought. Letting out his standard sigh and shaking his head he walked around to the desk.

“So you wanted me to set you up with a martial arts expert?”

Laura nodded. “Yeah. I need some help controlling my strength to protect others around me. And hopefully learn some defensive moves to keep the potential big drunk guys who might challenge me at bay.”

Adam snickered. “I’d like to see how many boards you could break without any training.”

Laura rolled her eyes. “So did you find someone to train me one on one?”

Adam looked up the computer. “Yes. His name is Brian Gamble and he should be here any time now.”

Laura smiled. “Cool. I was hoping to set something up soon.”

Just then the door opened and it was….
12231111222112.title: Laura grows even bigger and stronger

choices: Tell Vanessa about the app and give her a muscle boost.
Confront Greg and Emily.
122311112221122.content:
The door to the gym opened and Laura turned to see her sister Vanessa standing before her. It was clear that Vanessa had been crying, her mascara was wet and a her cheeks red. She seemed a bit distracted upon entering but once she spotted her enormous younger sister her eyes went wide with shock.

“Laura! My god! Just when I think you can’t get any bigger...” It had only been a week and a half since the two had seen each other but the difference in Laura’s size was obvious.

Laura smiled and fought the urge to begin flexing various muscle groups as she normally would when complemented on her size.

“Thank you,” Laura said then decided to cut right to the chase. “What’s the matter?”

Vanessa looked over at Adam. “Hello,” she said blushing slightly. “I’m Vanessa. Laura’s big... well older sister.”

Adam stepped forward and extended his hand. “It’s nice to meet you, Vanessa. I’m Adam.”

Vanessa shook his hand and ran her eyes over his bulging physique. “It’s funny,” she said, “until recently you would have been the biggest person I’ve ever met. Now both of my siblings are true giants.”

Adam nodded, not really knowing what to say. Instead he turned to Laura. “I’ll leave you two alone so you can talk.”

Once he was gone Laura motioned for Vanessa to follow her. Laura made her way to the back of the gym while Vanessa watched her monstrous legs pumping with each step. Laura’s calves were each bigger than volleyballs and were bunching and flexing while the young girl walked. The two arrived at the back of the gym and went through a door that led to Laura’s private area. Nearly half of the room was filled with machinery, cables and huge weights that all connected to the various locations where Laura was constantly pushing her ever growing body further and further.

“Oh my god!” Vanessa said taking in the enormity of the muscle building machine.

“Like it? Jason and Adam built it for me. It’s the only way I can get any kind of a workout.”

Vanessa walked along one wall of the room that was covered from floor to ceiling with a posing mirror. The floor was lined with pairs of barbells of ridiculous size ranging from 500 pounds up to 4 tons.

“Can you lift all of these?” Vanessa asked.

Laura chuckled. “No, right now I can curl those but even that’s a bit tough.” She pointed to the 1000 pound weights.

“You can lift this huge thing with one arm?”

“Well, they are huge arms.” This time Laura couldn’t resist the urge and flexed her mammoth right bicep, the peak of which was even with the knuckles of her hand.

“Woah!” Vanessa said as her hand slowly rose toward the sinewy peak independent of her will. Laura remained still as Vanessa ran her slender fingers over the ridges and valleys of the younger girl’s thick arm. “Unbelievable,” Vanessa mumbled.

“Thank you again. So, why are you here? And why were you crying?”

Vanessa was snapped out of her reverie and pulled her hand back immediately. “Sorry,” she said looking to the ground as tears began to well up in her eyes once more. “It’s Greg. I called him to see if he was going to come to mom’s birthday dinner. He.. he didn’t sound like himself at all. He was, well, incoherent and rambling. Kept talking about how big he was getting and how the new stuff was working wonders. When I asked him what new stuff he said it was Emily’s and tip top secret. Brand new military grade super soldier stuff. That’s all I was able to make out. Except for the last part. He...”

Vanessa collapsed onto Laura’s shoulder sobbing. The older sister was taller than the younger by about 2 inches, but that was the only dimension that was greater. Laura overshadowed Vanessa in every other conceivable way. The musclebound teen wrapped her beefy arms gently around her older sister’s gently and consoled her.

“What did he say?” she asked.

“He said that Emily had given him the power to crush Laura once and for all. And he said that if he ever saw Vanessa he’d probably do the same. I don’t think he even knew he was talking to me. I’m so scared, Lulu. You’re so big and strong you can keep yourself safe, but there’s nothing I can do. I wish I had muscles like yours. I think he’s lost his mind.”

Laura was fuming. Veins were bulging out all over her body, but she made sure not to tense any muscles that would crush Vanessa. She was going to be better than her brother. She knew what she had to do. It was time to find Greg and bring him home. Then she could work on weaning him off of whatever chemical cocktail that bitch Emily had hooked him on.

But what about Vanessa? Should Laura try using the app again to grant Vanessa’s wish for the strength to protect herself? Or should she just head right to the source of the problem?

Laura decided to....
122311112221122.title: Vanessa's Woes

choices: Go ahead and take Greg, I'm done with him
You need to leave now.  Without Greg.
1223111122211222.content:
Vanessa released her hug, pulled in a quick sob and took a step back. Laura’s chin was pushed out as she ground her teeth with anger.

“Well then it’s about time I head over to Emily’s and take care of this problem.”

Vanessa’s eyes widened. “Are. Are you sure? We don’t know what he’s capable of or what’s going on in his head.”

Laura shook her head. “I don’t care. Greg may be a jerk, but he’s still our brother. That Emily bitch is turning him into a monster.”

Vanessa’s eyes look both sad and fearful, but she said nothing. Laura was certainly strong enough to do what she wanted. Laura turned and headed out from her personal gym and back into the main area. Adam was there with another man and stepped toward Laura, careful not to get in her way lest she knock him over.

“Laura, this is Brian.”

Laura’s eyes came out of her focus for a moment and she stopped and sighed loudly, putting on a weak smile.

“Uh Brian, right. Can you train me? Privately. I was looking to be able to control my strength around others.”

In her mind she was now thinking about learning various ways to punish Emily. Brian, taken a bit aback by her huge size and determined look, nodded his head, having already talked to Adam.

“Well OK. Normally I don’t provide private training, but if you were in a class, you’d likely scare anyone you had to spar with. How about we start tomorrow at 6:00?”

Laura kept her weak but distracted smile and nodded. “Thanks Brian, I’ll be at your studio. Now if you’ll forgive me I have to get going.”

Brian shook his head, still having a hard time taking in Laura’s form. “Sure, sure. See you tomorrow then.”

Vanessa had kept behind and smiled at Brian and Adam as Laura resumed her walk toward the door. Vanessa caught up as they headed out onto the sidewalk.

“Lulu. How are you going to get there? I think Emily’s house is at least 5 miles away.”

Laura, back in her zone of anger, stopped and looked over at Vanessa. She could run there of course and considering how fast she was, she could do it damn quick, but she needed to bring Greg home.

“Can you drive? I can pull up her address on my phone and get directions.”

Vanessa shifted uncomfortably. “Well OK. But I’m still scared.”

Laura attempted to suppress her anger and knew she needed Vanessa’s cooperation. Looking into Vanessa’s worried eyes; Laura held her hand and smiled. “No problem. You just need to stay out in the car while I go in and get Greg. If anything goes wrong, just call Jason, or maybe 911.”

Vanessa didn’t look comforted, but dropped her chin lower taking her eyes off of Laura.

“OK. I can do that.”

Laura released Vanessa’s hand and walked around to climb into their parent’s SUV. Laura opened the back door and put those seats down and climbed into the passenger seat. Vanessa didn’t comment about the seats and started driving. Both knew that if Greg were coming back he would be lying in the back seat.

With the directions set they approached Emily’s house, which could better be described as a compound. They pulled up to the gates and Vanessa put the car in park.

“I don’t think we’re going to able to get in unless Emily wants us to.”

Laura looked at the gate and could see the front of the house nearly a quarter of a mile away.

“No problem. I’ll be back before you know it.”

Before Vanessa could say anything Laura got out of the car and headed toward the 8 foot tall wall. Taking a quick run, Laura pushed off with her massive right leg and like something out of a superhero TV show propelled her massive body to the top of the wall. Placing her left on the top of the foot thick concrete, Laura deftly swung her body over the wall and landed in the grass on the other side. She then darted toward the front door at a pace that would shame Usain Bolt and was at the front door in 30 seconds. Vanessa’s eyes had nearly bugged out watching what her little sister was capable of.

Laura knocked on the door with brutal purpose, nearly cracking the large oak frame. Her ears were buzzing as a rush of adrenaline was pushing through her muscles, unknowingly making her ever stronger. Her muscles all bulged hugely as her veins rose to the surface across her body. Her top groaned under the pressure.

Moments later the door was opened by a butler, who looked surprised and curious as nobody should be at the front door unless they called at the gate. The 6 foot tall butler looked rather large and was dressed in a suit. His curious look changed to surprise at the sight of Laura’s massive frame. Before the butler could ask a question, Emily yelled from across the room.

“Julian! What’s all that racket?”

Laura looked around Julian quickly and moving with incredible speed, moved to the side and pushed Julian out of the way, sending him sprawling across the waxed floor. Laura stormed toward Emily with anger in her eyes.

“Where is my brother you conniving bitch?”

Emily’s normal control was momentarily shaken at the sight of the huge muscle girl. She had been keeping tabs on Laura; curious as to just how she could get so big and strong without any apparent help. But the pictures didn’t do her justice. Laura was beyond massive. As Laura approached, Emily didn’t move as she reached for her phone and quickly hit a few buttons.

“Laura. I’ll have to admit, I didn’t expect to see you here.”

Laura got close to Emily, but Emily didn’t back off from the much larger, though much shorter woman. Laura clenched her fists and waves of muscles audibly ground forward.

“I really don’t care what you expected. I’m here for my brother.”

Emily looked down and smiled, seemingly convinced that Laura wouldn’t do anything to her. Julian had recovered and was already on his phone. Emily glanced over to her left and out of the shadows Greg lumbered forward. Emily chuckled.

“Well you can speak to him yourself. Although I doubt he has any desire to go with you.”

Laura reached out and pushed a surprised Emily out of her way. Emily took a few awkward steps and fell to the floor. She let out an angry puff as she pushed the hair out of her face and got back up.

Laura moved quickly toward Greg, who looked like he was on more than just steroids. He looked disoriented and his movements were clumsy. But he was also huge. Large, freakish muscles protruded from his massive frame. He was only wearing boxers and socks so his nearly grotesque upper body could be fully seen. His mass looked to equal hers, but the huge muscles didn’t flow naturally and looked bulky. And he could barely move. Laura got close and her anger momentarily fell.

“Greg? Are you OK?”

Greg seemed to snap out his stupor and shaking his head slowly groaned. “Emily? I mean, um, what?”

Laura’s anger rose again quickly as her own massive muscle bulged to new heights.

“Greg, it’s me, Laura. Your sister! I’m here to take you home.”

Greg’s clouded eyes turned red and he clenched his large hands into fists.

“Laura! You’re not taking me anywhere! I’m much stronger than you now! I can bench press well over a ton! The only thing you’re going to do is get a taste of just how strong I am!”

Laura grit her teeth, not wanting to ask what he could bench. But since she was benching a ton and half, she felt that she was stronger. As the buzzing built back up, her body was reacting once again, growing stronger than she had ever been. And even though she was looking to improve her fighting skills, she had practiced enough on her own with some help from Adam to hold her own. So when Greg lunged forward with his hands outstretched to either push her down or choke her, Laura pulled one massive leg back for balance and pulled her own heavily muscled arms up to block. Everything would be decided in moments. Vanessa now watched with extreme interest even as security guards were already on their way.

Greg reached for her shoulders but Laura grabbed his wrists and pushed back. Both combatants held firm for a moment as their arms shook from the effort. Greg had the advance of leverage as he was pushing down. His arms moved forward momentarily, but were soon held firm as Laura grunted with effort. She had to focus hard as the buzzing, normally a welcome addition to her work-outs, was becoming a distraction even as her strength increased. After a few moments, Laura began to steadily push Greg’s arms up and away from her even as he yelled with effort. And as he pushed as hard as he could, his oversized and overstressed right bicep tore from the bone, allowing Laura to push Greg hard away from her. He stumbled back and fell onto the floor. Even though the steroids blocked some of his pain, he still reached out to his torn bicep and wailed.

Laura grimaced again and turned toward Emily, who was looking at Greg with interest, but little sympathy. Laura spat out in anger.

“Look what your steroids have done to him! His body is a mess. I’m taking him out of here now!”

Emily looked back at Laura, processing the events and what she wanted to do next. The security guards were here and although they were big and muscular, were no match for Laura. However, they also packed guns.

Emily looked at Greg and then over to Laura and smiled. She then told Laura…
1223111122211222.title: Confront Greg and Emily.

choices: Emily, sounding too happy
Jason, with news about Emily
12231111222112221.content:
“Go ahead and take Greg. I’m done with him. For now anyway.”

She then tilted her head toward the four security guards, who pulled their guns out. “But I’d do it now before I change my mind.” Still smiling with evil confidence, Emily looked over at Julian. “And Julian, please get the door and escort these two out.”

Laura looked at Emily with daggers, and then back down at Greg who was now barely conscience, rolling back on forth on the ground. Sighing, she walked over toward Greg and reaching down, hoisted his huge body into the air and held him in front of her like a huge baby. Laura had to look to the side to see where she was going, and then started walking toward the door. She stopped to look at Emily.

“Don’t think this is over!”

Emily chuckled. “No, I suppose not. But if you try and go to the press about any of this or spread any lies, I’ll come after you with a room full of lawyers.”

Laura sniffed angrily, but knew she was at a terrible disadvantage right now. Confronting Emily would have to wait for another day. “Don’t worry, I won’t.”

And with that Laura marched to the door with the semi-conscious Greg. Julian opened the door and quickly closed it behind her. The gate opened and soon enough Laura was placing Greg into the back and climbing into the passenger seat. Vanessa’s looked with near horror at Greg and then placing the car into drive, over toward Laura.

“This is terrible! Greg looks like a mutant.”

Laura sighed, the adrenalin rush now over. “I know. We need to get him to a hospital.”

Vanessa held back a sob and nodded her head, driving as quickly as she dared.

A special bed had to be found for Greg and he was placed into the intensive care ward. The doctors ran tests and kept Greg sedated, finding that not only was his bicep completely torn, but multiple other injuries were masked by the steroids and his kidneys were near failure. Whatever mix of drugs he had taken had given him near super human strength, but were destroying his body. Laura could barely listen to the prognosis and chose to leave before their parents arrived, leaving the explanation, and Emily’s warning, to Vanessa.


Two weeks later Emily visited the lab and was talking to the project lead.

“So now that we’ve tested out the advanced formula and seen the results, have you been able to synthesize something that won’t take out the subject?”

The project lead gulped nervously. Emily had essentially taken over her father’s company at this point and had given up most pretence of covering up the illegal generation of advanced steroids. The normal stuff would still be sold, but there was a lot of money to be made with the advanced formula.

“Uh, yes. We’ve been able to stabilize the mix and eliminated some of the worst side effects.”

Emily looked down at the intimidated manager. She clearly enjoyed the height advantage and she knew her looks and body kept most men off balance.

“What about the speed? I wanted it to be much faster. How quickly can the subject build up muscles and strength?”

The manager gulped. “Well we’re not sure yet. We were just now reviewing potential test subjects.”

Emily reached out and snatched the clip board from the surprised manager and looked over the names. She had handpicked most of them, but none were as blindly loyal as Greg. She considered going to get Greg once he recovered. Looking over the list and thinking longer than she needed to just to watch the manager squirm, she smiled and sighed, pulling her magnificent chest up to the point of spilling her breasts out of her low cut dress. This only made the manager sweat more.

“I believe I know what we need to do.”


Meanwhile, as another week passed, Laura had become a woman possessed. Her work-outs were nearly all consuming and her gains were now truly super human. So mad at what Emily had done and sure that she needed to be stopped, Laura was convinced that she needed to become a super woman to take her out. Her increase in strength was staggering, even for the conditioned Adam and Jason. The 3050 bench press had moved on to 4000 pounds in days and onto to 5000 pounds just as fast. More weight had to be ordered and Jason and Adam were able to modify the equipment to accommodate what they thought would be more than enough weight. It wasn’t.

Her bench presses were increasing at nearly 1000 pounds a day after the first week and by the end of the third week, were a ton a day. She had moved from cranking out 7 tons for reps after her last blistering work out was benching 8 tons!

The 1000 pound one arm curls increased just as fast. Vanessa visited often and was always surprised when she saw her younger sister hoist larger and larger weights with intensity. She was up to 2000 pounds in less than a week and was tossing the 4000 pound bars around in no time, pounding her biceps to seemingly impossible levels. Adam and Jason were now struggling to create larger weights as Laura now needed them.

While her muscle size wasn’t keeping up with her strength gains those massive muscles still grew larger, easily surpassing the ones Greg had sported and well bigger than anyone else had ever even thought was possible. And with the disproportional gains in strength, her muscles grew denser and denser.

So Laura’s days and nights were now full. School was nearly over for the year and while she was doing most of her classes remotely to avoid the stares in classes, she was barely keeping up since training was now taking priority. Laura was glad that finals were this week. The fighting sessions with Brian were incredible. Watching him go through motions once or twice was enough for her to pick them up. She progressed at a pace that Brian had never seen. She was learning as fast as he could teach her. And her speed was incredible. She was quite certain that she was the fastest person on earth, and her reflexes must have reached that point too. Once school was over Laura was going to rent as many fight videos as she could, convinced she could teach herself.

So it was on a warm day that Laura finished up her set with alternating 6000 pound curls with the newly created bars and Vanessa walked in. The loud gasp was enough to cause Laura to stop.

“My goodness Lulu, are those the 3 ton weights Adam and Jason just made for you?”

Laura placed them down carefully, not wanting to crack the floor. “Yeah, and by tomorrow they won’t be enough!”

Laura was covered with a light sheen of sweat and was wearing an athletic top that just a week ago fit fine, but now was straining mightily. She shook her arms a bit and noticing Vanessa’s wide eyed look, obliged her stare and slowly brought her right arm up into a flex than brought Vanessa’s hands to a familiar reach. The mighty bicep rose to new heights of massiveness, looking as if someone had placed a watermelon under her skin as the peak rose up nearly to the top of her head. Vanessa ran her slender fingers across the bicep and pushing with all of her might was unable to even dent the skin.

“I still can’t believe that you’re still growing. And your muscles, they feel like steel. Are you, uh.”

Laura pulled her eyes off her own gigantic bicep and looked at Vanessa. “Bulletproof? I think so, but we haven’t tested it yet.”

Vanessa sighed with a pang of jealousy and pulled her hands away. Laura saw this and now knew she was ready to talk about the ap and give Vanessa a muscle boost if she wanted one; assuming the ap still worked. Releasing her flex, Laura grabbed a towel and brought up the subject that started most conversations.

“How’s Greg?”

Vanessa looked down. “Doing better I suppose, but he still wants to blame you for what happened.”

Laura moaned. “Well hopefully now that he’s almost ready to head home and recover away from Emily we can work on that.”

Laura’s phone buzzed and she turned to pick it up, looking at the name on the screen. Keeping her emotions in check with Vanessa looking at her, Laura hit talk. It was…
12231111222112221.title: Go ahead and take Greg, I'm done with him

choices: Laura is ambushed and captured by Emily.
Laura meets with Emily as planned.
122311112221122211.content:
Laura held the phone to her ear. “What do you want?”

“Laura! How are you, girl? Still bulging, I assume? I’m so glad I caught you!” It was Emily and she sounded positively giddy. Laura had to contain her anger to keep from crushing her phone in her hand.

“Why the hell are you calling me? And why are you talking as if we were friends?”

“Don’t be silly. Why wouldn’t we be friends?” Emily asked without a hint of sarcasm?

Laura’s face was turning red and she could feel her control slipping. She steadied her voice and spoke as calmly as she could. “After what you did to Greg I-”

“Stop right there. Greg knew what he was getting into when he signed up. He knew the risks and was willing to chance it for the rewards. Which is why I’m calling you. We’ve finally been able to clear up all the red tape with our financiers and I’m able to give Greg what I owe him.”

Laura was confused. “What do you mean ‘signed up?’ What did he sign up for?”

“He never told you? He was a part of our research project. He took a paid role in it.”

Laura was speechless.

Emily continued, “I’m sorry, I thought you knew. Look, Greg kind of felt like he didn’t have a whole lot to offer in the way of... well, money making skill. The only thing he was good at was building his body and he planned to go after contest money. Then he found himself unable to get any bigger and you were just exploding to the top of the pack so he went another route with my group.”

“And you twisted him into a monster.” Laura tried to hold onto this fact, but this information about her brother went against everything she thought she knew.

“I didn’t make him do anything. He knew exactly what he was getting into. The biggest risks for the biggest pay. I would have rehabilitated him in our own facilities as well if you hadn’t insisted on taking him away from me. But no matter. I want to give you what he earned. Meet me at my lab in an hour. I’ll text you the directions. See you then.”

The call ended before Laura could ask any further questions.

“Who was that?” Vanessa asked as Laura put her phone away.

“That was Emily.” Laura said, still in a state of shock.

Vanessa looked panicked, “Emily?!? Why? What did she want? What did she say?”

“She said Greg earned money in her drug trials and that she has it ready for me to pick up.” Laura pulled on an extremely oversized tank top and some black shorts. Both clung to her insane bulges like paint.

“You’re not going are you? Are you crazy?”

Laura motioned to the 3 ton dumbbell on the floor. “What’s she going to do to me? I could take on a room full of Emily’s. You should head home where it’s safe.” Her phone buzzed as the directions to the lab arrived. It looked to be in a warehouse near the harbor.

Vanessa looked upset by this. “I don’t want to just go home and hide under the bed. Where’s Adam? I’m sure he could protect me.”

Laura smiled. Vanessa’s attraction to Adam had been evident right from the start. “I haven’t seen him since yesterday afternoon. It’s not really like him to not at least come by the gym, but he probably has other plans or something.” Laura wrapped her enormous arm around her sister and pulled her in for a hug. “Look, just sit tight. When I get back I’ll give you some... muscle building tips and let you in on a secret of mine. Who knows, maybe you’ll be able to bulk up even faster than I did. Then you wont need a little runt like Adam to protect you.”

“Really? Thank you, Lulu. Be safe.” Vanessa tried to return the hug, but even with her arms stretched out fully it was like she was hugging the side of a building.

Laura left the gym and began running in the direction of the harbor as fast as her super human legs could carry her.
122311112221122211.title: The Call

choices: "...me, of course."
"...your sister, Vanessa."
1223111122211222112.content:
Laura arrived at the lab. Upon entering she found that the warehouse was once used for storing shipping containers and there were several along one wall that had been left behind when the building had been converted to a science workshop. The expansive space was covered with equipment of various types that meant nothing to the giant teen, but it did look very impressive. There were a handful of people moving this way and that with purpose, and a few stopped to stare at her as they passed, but would quickly move on. The stare was something Laura really enjoyed, she loved the way her muscles made people stop dead in their tracks and stare with their jaws hanging loose.

She was just about to ask someone where she could find Emily when she heard a voice call out from her right. “Laura! So glad you came!” Emily was the only person Laura saw who wasn’t wearing a lab coat. On the contrary she looked like she was headed to a club. She wore knee high leather boots with a 6 inch heel bringing her already crazy height to a towering 6’ 8”. Along with the boots Emily wore matching leather pants that hugged her hips, thighs and butt like a second skin. Her top was also black, but a tube top that went only so high as to cover her nipples leaving the top half of her enormous breasts exposed. The tight top squeezed her soft breasts together to create a huge line of cleavage between the massive mammeries. Her hair was tied back and she wore a pair of dark rimmed glasses, the only part of her look that spoke of professionalism.

Emily ushered Laura into her office and offered her a chair. The large girl declined both because she had no desire to sit and because she doubted she could fit into the chair or avoid breaking it under her weight.

“You know, you’re here on a very exciting day. We’ve had so many breakthroughs just in the last 24 hours it’s staggering.”

“I don’t care.” Laura said.

Emily waved a dismissive hand, “Oh, don’t be such a spoil sport, this is exciting stuff.”

“Just give me what I came for and I’ll be on my way.”

Emily paused for a moment, then shrugged. “If you insist.” She opened a black portfolio and tore out a check from the pages within. She handed it to Laura who’s heart nearly stopped when she saw the many zeros. The check was made out to Greg in the amount of 2.8 million dollars.

In a daze Laura stood and began to turn toward the door. She folded the check to put in her pocket, but somehow felt strange doing so as if it were too much money to just fold in half.

“Wait a sec.” Emily said. “Since I’m feeling extra generous you can have this too.” She pulled a manila folder out of a drawer and tossed it on the desk. “I wont be needing it anymore.”

“What’s this?” Laura asked picking the file up.

“It’s you.”

Laura opened the folder and found document upon document relating to her. Her complete medical history, school records, photographs (some as recent as two days earlier), but most surprising of all was a staggeringly accurate growth/strength chart documenting how much Laura was lifting and for how many reps. Since Laura had been making those lifts in the privacy of her own section of the gym there should have been no way for Emily to have that information.

“How did you get this?” Laura demanded showing Emily the chart.

A sly grin slid across Emily’s lips. “A reliable source.”

“Who?” Laura’s chest and shoulders expanded to make sure Emily knew who was the stronger of the two. “I want to know!”

“Relax. He’s here now. Let’s go say hello.” Emily stood and led Laura back out to the main floor of the lab. They walked past several rows of machines and equipment to the back of the building. There Laura found an area filled with oversized gym equipment very similar to what Laura had been using except these machines looked cleaner and more advanced. There were several very, large men working out. Each was bigger than any Mr. Olympia. Each of them were making world record lifts and pumping their massive muscles to incredible size. Laura had them all beat both in size and strength, but they were still an impressive sight. Most of the guys looked to be about the size that Greg was a few months back when Laura had first out lifted him, but there was one guy who was much, much bigger. She was looking at him from behind, but she could tell he was a sheer monster. A few scientists stood around him as he did squats with an outrageously large weight on his six foot wide shoulders. Each time the big man stood his thick quads bulged larger than any of the observer’s chests. A digital readout over the brute’s head told everyone that he was lifting 5 tons. Laura was now able to squat nearly double that, but she’d never seen anyone ever come nearly as close to her as this.

Emily asked Laura to wait while she approached the beefed up giant. Even at 6’ 8” the buxom beauty was dwarfed by the huge man who was well over 7 feet tall. Emily said something to him then the man turned around and Laura’s world collapsed. The body was mega enhanced but the face was clearly Adam’s.

When he turned he was smiling, reveling in his great power, but when he saw Laura his face went into a look of shock and he dropped the 5 ton weight. Scientists scattered as the weight crashed to the floor leaving a crater in the concrete. Only Emily remained stationary, the smug grin still on her face.

Adam hung his head and approached Laura. She’d never seen anyone look so powerful and weak at the same time.

“Laura, I-“ he began but stopped when Laura held up her hand.

“You gave her information on me? Her!” She pointed over Adam’s shoulder at Emily.

“I know how it looks, but I only told her about your lifts and it’s not like that’s vital intel. And if I didn’t someone else would have, and they might have been more..... nasty about it.”

“But you worked with her! Her? After what she did to Greg?”

“I know. But it all comes so easy for you. You don’t understand how hard I had to work to get on top. Her formula was going to make it so I was left behind. I just wanted a taste of what you have: the size, the power.”

Laura was about to respond, but she was too hurt to speak. She felt so betrayed.

Emily came over and squeezed in between them and began gushing as if there weren’t two pissed off giants surrounding her. “Didn’t I tell you we’d made some incredible breakthroughs? Adam just came in yesterday afternoon for his.... uh, reward. By last night he had gained over a foot in height and several hundred pounds of supercharged muscle. And thanks to what we learned from your brother we’ve found no undesirable effects yet.”

Laura turned away, she’d had more than enough. “I’m leaving.”

“Wait!” Emily shouted. “You haven’t heard the best part yet.”

Laura stopped and took in a deep breath before turning back again.

Emily smiled, she was clearly very excited. “Okay, well, as you can see we have had plenty of male volunteers and successes. However, we didn’t know how our formula was going to work on women. It’s all very hormone based and the very foundations of the sexes are fundamentally different. So, we finally got ourselves a female volunteer and injected her with a dose. And nothing happened! Insane, right? So we gave her another. Still nothing. More and more was pumped into her body until she’d received 700 times as much as Humongo here.” She slapped Adam on the arm. “Still not a bit of change. But, and here’s the really cool part, this morning we give her a checkup. Still no change, but the drug is still floating around in her system.” Emily paused as if this revelation should speak for itself.

When Laura only shrugged Emily continued, “It should have flushed out of her system after an hour, two at most. But 16 hours later she was still flooded with it. We did some checking and found that her body is now manufacturing our formula!! She’s creating an endless supply that’s fully at her disposal. All she needs to do is learn how to use it. We have effectively altered her entire body chemistry and created something completely new.

There was a pause. Finally Laura spoke. “I don’t understand what this has to do with anything. Who is this test subject?”

“I’m glad you asked,” Emily said. “It’s...”
1223111122211222112.title: Debts Are Settled

choices: Laura gathers Vanessa, Jason and Adam for a meeting.
Laura spies on Emily to see what her plans are.
12231111222112221121.content:
“It’s me, of course.”

And with that Emily dropped her arms to her sides and closed her eyes. She then took in a deep breath and clenched her fists. Next her entire body tightened and, before Laura knew what was happening Emily’s body was erupting with muscle. Her bare shoulders, arms and chest exploded out in all directions instantly eclipsing the giants on the gym equipment behind her. Emily’s leather pants groaned for a split second, then split open along her hips and thighs. Her calves ripped through both her pants and boots creating matching tears along her backside that quickly ran the entire length of her long and expanding legs. After another few seconds passed Emily’s pants were far too shredded to hang on and fell to the floor leaving her massive quadriceps, hamstrings, glutes and calves fully exposed and fighting for room as they continued to grow and grow into and away from each other. Emily’s breasts were plowing forward on a thick shelf of pectoral muscle, her top had succumb to her expanding chest and ripped in half, but her lower torso, though clearly bristling with hard, ripped muscle, was still shrink-wrapped in her lycra tube top. Emily was now approaching and passing Adam’s size and sinew continued to build upon sinew in great slabs of meat.

Now Emily was not just growing out but up as her body began to stretch taller and taller. Her boots had already been ruined leaving her standing barefoot on the floor, but already her head had passed her previous aided height of 6’ 8” as was approaching 7 feet. Emily began to slowly curl her arms upward causing her still growing biceps to bulge in an attempt to rip through her skin. Laura could hear a low rumble and then realized that Emily was growling. Finally the portion of her tube top that was wrapped around her stomach had received all the strain it could handle and fell away followed by her black panties. Now the pumped up powerhouse was completely nude and spectacular.

The giant girl continued to expand as fast as ever. She’d now blown up bigger than Laura and showed no signs of stopping or even slowing for that matter. Emily’s head looked positively ludicrous dwarfed by shoulders the size of medicine balls and nearly 8 feet wide. Emily’s growl was growing in intensity and volume as she began to raise her arms up to shoulder height. She then curled her arms into a mind blowing double bicep curl with arms that were bigger around than Laura’s chest. Emily’s growl turned into a roar and she squeezed the last few inches (which translated into several hundred pounds) of muscle and height into her transformation.

Laura gulped and looked up at the newly birthed goddess. Emily now stood 9 feet tall and bigger than anyone had ever dreamed. She was more pumped up than the Incredible Hulk. Her thighs were 5 feet across each and were pulsing with untold strength as veins thick as ropes crisscrossed just below her skin’s surface. Her abs were packed together tightly and each individual muscle was roughly the size of a basketball, her sides were lined with obliques thick as gold bricks. Emily’s chest was a solid wall of pure female muscle 6 feet thick. The width of her shoulders was equal to her height, and her flexed biceps rose to peaks nearly a full foot above her head.

Emily released her monstrous flex and, laughing, turned toward the back of the warehouse. With booming steps that practically knocked Laura on her butt Emily sauntered to where a collection of massive shipping containers were stacked three high near the rear wall of the building. Emily walked up to one of the stacks and bent down. She shoved her hands underneath the bottom container causing the ground around her fingers to crack. Then she lifted raising all three containers above her head quickly and with little effort. The enormous woman turned with several hundred tons suspended above her head, a huge smile plastered to her face.

Emily pumped the trio of cargo containers up and down several times. “I hope you can now understand the full weight of what I was saying before.” Her voice was deeper and boomed out in several hundred decibels. “You should know that this is not even close to the full extent of how big and strong I can get. This is just the tip of the iceberg.” She turned back toward the remaining storage containers and, taking a step forward, threw the three she held at the wall of steel. Her projectiles collided with the containers like a bowling ball hitting pins. A thundering crash sounded through the room as a great hole opened in the wall and storage containers poured out into the open like bricks from a falling building.

Emily walked back to where Laura and Adam stood speechless. She towered over both of them then, bending forward flexed her chest and curled her arms in their faces. “Now,” she said, “you’ve both been paid what you were owed. It’s time for you to leave and never come back. If I see either of you, or your friends or your neighbors or your neighbors friends I will show you just how big I can get. Then I’ll crush you as slowly and painfully as I can. Goodbye.”

As Emily walked away her body began rapidly shrinking back down. She grabbed one of the nearby lab techs and pulled the white coat off of him. After about fifteen seconds of shrinking she was small enough to slip the coat over her shoulders. She rounded a corner and, just before disappearing out of sight, had returned to her original size.

Both Laura and Adam were in shock as they left the lab together. Laura’s mind was buzzing with fear over just what a power-mad and beefed up Emily could possibly have in mind. Maybe they’d all be lucky and size and strength was all Emily was after. Or perhaps it was time to try the app out again and see if the playing field could be evened out.
12231111222112221121.title: A Display of Power

choices: Vanessa becomes Super Vanessa
Something unexpected happens
122311112221122211211.content:
Once Laura and Adam got back to the gym, Laura called Vanessa and Jason. The conversation with Jason lasted much longer than the one with Vanessa as they had tech stuff to discuss. As they gathered in the work out area, Vanessa was back to near tears as Laura explained what had happened. Adam sat quietly, realizing that he was there to try and answer questions and was still not well appreciated. Vanessa sobbed.

“What are we going to do? That, that woman could kill us all!”

Laura sighed. “Yes, well perhaps it’s time to bring up how Jason and I have managed to get so big.”

With that Laura explained the ap and the events that led up to today. “So in actuality, I’ve greatly exceeded the setting I started out with and still have about two months to go. I’m growing stronger ever day and at an accelerated rate. But I’m not sure if even two months of exponential strength increase will get me to what Emily is capable of.”

Adam shook his head, but wasn’t about to condemn anyone. Vanessa seemed to improve somewhat in spirit.

“Well this is good isn’t it? Can’t you just make yourself stronger?”

Laura and Jason looked at each other with concern and then Laura looked back at the confused Vanessa. “Well, maybe. The problem is, we set the ap to complete our growth in another 8 weeks, so I’m not sure we can change anything until then.”

Vanessa looked even more confused. “Well, OK. Then what about making Adam stronger?”

Laura frowned. “Not with all the drugs he’s got in him. Plus, I don’t trust him all that much right now. If Emily hadn’t threatened him too, I wouldn’t even trust him with the information about the ap.”

Vanessa stood there, still wondering what to do. As the others all looked at her, Vanessa’s eyes widened. “What, you mean me? Oh, I don’t know. I would have been happy to add some muscle and strength before, but this sounds dangerous.”

Laura walked over to her and placed her hand on her shoulder. “It’s not dangerous. It worked wonders for Jason and me.”

Vanessa sighed. “Yeah, but that was before Emily turned herself into the Hulk. Now you want me to take her on.” Laura paused, not wanting to force Vanessa to do anything she didn’t want to. Vanessa looked at the hopeful eyes around the room and grunted lightly. She turned back to Laura and nearly groaned. “What did you have in mind?”

Laura smiled gently and pulling up the ap on her phone, had Vanessa put her thumb on the Press Thumb in Box symbol and within moments, a message appeared. Welcome Vanessa. A 3D model of Vanessa soon appeared. Laura pulled up the menus and tapped the “Muscle Tone” button and a pair of sliders. The top one read “Mass” while the bottom one was “Density.”

Laura smiled. “Well, the menu is the same. I only played with the mass slider. The density must have just followed. Or working out must have increased my density even if it wasn’t originally selected to change.”

Vanessa bit her lip nervously. “So if you slide those, I’ll add muscle?”

Jason nodded. “The mass one will. With the density slide, you can become stronger too.”

Vanessa shifted as her head buzzed. “What about height? I don’t want to be 9 feet tall!”

Laura sighed and smiled. “No, no. But do you want to be taller?”

Vanessa glanced over at Adam, who was now standing at his full 7 foot 3 inch height to get a look at the phone, but wasn’t about to add anything unless he was asked. Vanessa looked back at Laura and grinned sheepishly. “Welllll. I suppose a little height wouldn’t hurt. Especially if my muscles are going to grow really big.”

Laura chuckled for the first time in a long while. Seeing her sister excited about something again made her happy. “So does this mean you’re willing to give this a try?”

Vanessa shook her long blonde hair and stood tall. Her yellow summer dress shifted a bit as she did so. The dress was typical Vanessa. Simple, stylish, yet daring enough to showcase her large chest and firm legs. The matching yellow pumps helped to push her height to 6 feet to try and give herself some confidence. Placing her hands on her hips, she gave a determined look to Laura.

“Yes. Emily is going to regret the day she messed with us!”

Laura laughed and even Adam smiled. Laura motioned for Adam and Jason to leave. “Jason knows what we’re going to need to do. This is more than just making Vanessa our ace in the hole, you two have plenty of work.”

Adam protested momentarily. “But Jason is the computer expert. What can I do?”

Laura frowned again. “You know about the formula. After what you did, you have a lot to make up for.”

Adam sighed again and Vanessa gave him a weak smile. His heart skipped a beat and he knew that he would do whatever it took to re-gain their trust, especially Vanessa’s. Jason tugged on Adam’s arm and they left. Once Laura felt they were gone, she smiled at Vanessa again.

“Ok, so just how big did you want to be?”

Vanessa smiled weakly again, blushing. “I, um.” See looked away from Laura and then back. “I’d like to be bigger than Adam. I mean not as tall, but more muscular.”

Laura frowned. “You still like him don’t you?”

Vanessa dropped her head. “Yeah. I know what he did was wrong, but he’s so big, and well, oh, I don’t know.”

Laura sighed. “No problem Vanessa, we’ll make sure you put the steroid king to shame. But that’s only part of it. Let’s look at the density.”

Sliding the Density bar to the right showed numbers that steadily increased. Vanessa’s 3D model looked the same, but from what they could tell, her body tightened a bit and as they slid the bar to the right her chest pushed upward and her skin started to shine as her small muscles looked carved out of marble. Even her blue eyes brightened and her blonde hair looked even lighter. Laura continued to push the number passed 1000, in her mind trying to ascertain just how strong Vanessa would need to be to challenge Emily. As the number climbed to 10,000 Vanessa’s model looked even harder and brighter. And by the time they reached 100,000 Vanessa was nearly glowing. Vanessa’s eyes widen at the image before her and Laura sighed when she stopped at 1 million.

“That should make you 1 million times as strong as you are now. If you could bench 100 pounds, then you would be able to bench 50,000 tons.”

Vanessa’s body tingled at the thought of being that strong. “Really?”

Laura sighed, a bit jealous herself. “Well, let’s hope so.”

Moving the selection back to Mass, Laura worked to change the settings toward what Vanessa wanted and wasn’t too surprised at the results. After adding some height and putting a minimal delay on, Laura looked up at Vanessa.

“OK, are you ready for this?”

Vanessa took a step back, kicking off her pumps and momentarily closing her eyes, opened them again and smiled. “I think so.”

Laura paused. “Do you want to take off the dress?”

Vanessa smiled. “Nope. But, uh, just what am I going to wear?”

Laura pointed toward some clothes sitting on a bench. “Adam left some things he had gotten from Emily before she tossed us out. I told him to leave them, even if he didn’t know why.”

Vanessa looked at them. Not her style for sure, but she knew that soon enough everything would be changing. “OK, I guess I’m ready then.”

Laura gulped. She wasn’t even sure the ap would work again. If it didn’t, getting a hold of the formula would become much harder and challenging Emily’s might would be nearly impossible. This just had to work. So as Vanessa looked on with wonder, Laura pushed the “Begin Schedule applications” button. And…
122311112221122211211.title: A meeting of the minds

choices: Laura and Jason plan their next move
Laura plays with ap
1223111122211222112111.content:
As soon as the button was pushed Vanessa let out a satisfying sigh. She then opened her eyes and let out a quick “Oh!” as her entire body began to change. Muscles started growing across her frame and her height slowly moved up. The skirt pulled higher and her bra peaked out over the top of the dress as her back and chest expanded and the dress was pulled toward her midsection. Within moments the straps of the dress tore in half as the muscles began to pile up all across her frame.
