-NOW PARADOX FREE! No matter the change you make Alterations will follow along with you ensuring you're never stuck with your choices.

Her hands were shaking. This couldn't be possible, could it? Not 10 minutes ago she had been dreaming of changing her body to match her siblings but now she could create a world where she'd always been beautiful or strong or both. She could be rich, famous, popular, desired, the center of everything.

Laura flopped down on her bed with a huge grin on her face. She was dreaming of the lives she could live, the changes she could make. She knew she should take her time and think things through since this was a major alteration to the very fabric of the universe but she was so excited she wanted to do it now, right now.

She quickly formulated three possibilities. In the first she was a drop dead gorgeous bombshell even more curvaceous than her sister. She could then make herself a rich supermodel and actress. The idea of the entire world drooling over her hot body got her warm between her legs.

The second life she envisioned was as a world class female bodybuilder. Maybe even the biggest, strongest woman ever. Like her first fantasy she could create a life of riches and fame, perhaps she could even create herself as a sex symbol and change the world's perspective on female muscle. Imagining her body with slabs of massive muscles pushed the warmth in her sex to a fire.

Lastly she considered writing a world in which she was given superpowers. Perhaps an accident of some sort turned her into a being of unrivaled strength and power. Her head spun with the various powers she could give herself and what she could do with them. By now she was massaging her crotch and panting. She orgasmed hard and let out a shout.

She was pretty sure that superpowers were going to be the way to go, but as her head cleared she realized that she didn't really know the full scope of what was possible with the app. It was a huge leap to assume it really could rewrite history and another to imagine it could grant impossible powers. Perhaps it would be best to go with one of her other fantasies. After all, it sounded like she'd still be able to make more changes later if she got bored.

Laura decided she would...
1332.title: The life you knew is history.

choices: It works!!
Something goes wrong.
13322.content:
Laura decided that being a superhero would have to wait until she had a better understanding of the app and how it really worked (if it did at all). So that meant she would go with one of her more understated fantasies. Thinking about which she wanted more, huge boobs or huge muscles, left her at a loss for a time but in the end she decided that she envied her brother more than her sister. While Vanessa could get what she wanted by enticing others Greg could just up and take it himself without convincing others. Also, as nice a guy as he was, Greg could really be intimidating when he wanted to be. Vanessa was still vulnerable should someone want to hurt her or take without asking.

Laura began working on building her new life as a champion bodybuilder. The first step the app took her through was making adjustments to her own body. She was about to begin just piling on muscle when she decided that she wanted her body to appear extreme but also keep her physique in the realm of possibility. As much as it would be awesome to rival the Hulk in size the fact remained that she didn't want to look too freakish. Still, the desire to be the biggest remained, but what did that mean exactly?

She set her phone down and went to her computer. Laura spent the next hour looking up female bodybuilders, Ms. Olympia champions, statistics, measurements, even workout routines and lifting records. She took notes and slowly began to formulate her ideal body. She pulled measurements from the biggest women she could find like Iris Kyle, Renee Toney, Nicole Bass, Karla Nelson, and Jana Linke-Sippl and pushed them just a little further. Satisfied with what she'd written down she returned to the app and began adjusting her own body. She gave herself a chest that measured 55" above a waist that was a mere 28". She set her quads at 32 inches (she shivered at the thought that each thigh would be bigger around than her waist) and put her calves at 19". Then she pumped her arms up to 21" which, if her research was correct, would make them the biggest biceps of any woman in the world. Laura filled in additional details sculpting her prospective body into a statuesque monument to female muscle and beauty. She smiled at her handiwork awash in giddy energy.

She finished up by zooming in on her face and taking nearly half an hour making fine adjustments to maintain her femininity and cement her status as a complete goddess. By the time she was satisfied her face could have graced the cover of any fashion magazine while her body would outclass any woman in the world and quite a few men.

At long last Laura clicked on the "Next Step" button and was taken to a screen with a series of drop down menus and text boxes. The first several boxes were setting the ground rules for the new reality she was creating. Many of the options she didn't understand but there was an instruction at the top that only the bottom field was required. Deciding not to mess with more than she needed to she scrolled down to the bottom and found a large text field where she could write, in plain text, the details of her new life.

She thought for a few minutes then began writing. She detailed how, at age 10, she began following her older brother to the gym. Greg was 16 at the time and had just started making a serious run at building his muscles up. Laura had been intrigued by the idea of getting stronger and began working out with him. At first Greg didn't think much of her efforts, though he always helped her with her form and gave advice. He just decided that she would get worn out and give up. Laura didn't, though, and instead showed a real aptitude for weight training. As weeks went by she continued to increase the weight she was lifting at a fairly regular rate and not only that her body was changing. By the time she turned 12 Laura's body was packed tight with sleek muscle.

Laura grinned and typed faster. She wrote about a time in middle school when one of the kids from the basketball team made fun of her for her muscles and called her a freak. She let it go, deciding that he wasn't worth the effort but he continued his taunts for a solid week. One day after school Laura approached the bully on their way home and even though he stood nearly 2 feet taller than she did she used her tiny but powerful body to crush her tormentor. She never got called a freak after that.

She wrote that as the years went by her muscles continued to grow bigger and bigger as well as stronger by leaps and bounds. When she was 15 she entered her first ever Ms. Olympia becoming the youngest competitor ever. Though she didn't break the top 5 she used the loss to fuel her desire to grow even more and began entering more contests to get more experience all while continuing to push her body ever larger. She very quickly began winning contests and returned to take the top spot at Ms. Olympia the following year as well as the year after that.

"Now at 18 years old", she finished, "I have become the strongest and most muscular woman in the world. Despite my freakish size I have maintained my image as a sexy, gorgeous woman and have successfully bridged the gap between bodybuilder and supermodel.

Laura paused for a moment looking back over what she had written. It sounded good. Very exciting. Then a thought occurred to her and she added: "And I accomplished my great size and strength through hard work and good genetics, not with drugs or hormones."

Holding in a deep breath Laura tapped the button that read "Apply Changes" and waited.
13322.title: Research First

choices: Cruise the beach.
Check in with Jason.
133221.content:
The anticipation was so great that Laura didn't even dare breathe. She held her breath until her lungs burned and she was forced to let out a gasp. She looked at her phone and frowned. Of course it didn't work, how could it? She couldn't believe what a fool she'd been to think something could do the things the app advertised.

With anguish turning to rage she cocked her arm back to throw her phone into the nearest wall but just before she fired she spotted something out of the corner of her eye. She turned and saw nothing. Just her closet along one wall and her dresser nearby with a full body mirror in between. She then realized that she'd never had a mirror like that before. Where did it come from? Next she turned she found that her bed had grown from a twin into a queen sized mattress and moved to the corner of the room. In the space it had previously occupied she saw stacks and stacks of free-weights. Next her closet door opened revealing that it was now stuffed to overflowing with clothes. Moments earlier her it was near empty but now there wasn't room enough for the volume of garments she owned; several were even piled onto the floor.

Laura ran to the mirror and examined her body. She still looked exactly the same but there was no denying that things were changing. Her room was altering to accommodate her new past. In the reflection she could see more changes taking place all around her but she didn't dare take her eyes off her own body.

Any second now, she thought, it's going to happen!!

Finally she saw it. The veins along her forearms were beginning to press out of her skin. She tensed her fists and watched the muscles just below her wrists expand ever so slightly. She raised her arm and pulled the sleeve of her t-shirt up over her shoulder to see as much skin as she could. Now she flexed her bicep which should have been nonexistent but instead hardened into a lemon sized ball.

Laura broke into a giddy laughing fit as her muscles slowly grew. "It works!! Oh my god, I can't believe it actually works!!"

She watched with rapt wonder as the body of her dreams materialized before her eyes. She ran her hands all over her chest and stomach reveling in the spectacular hardness and deep grooves that now covered her torso. She lifted the hem of her shirt and counted 8 deeply defined abs surrounded on each side by a dozen piano key obliques.

Laura noticed that her pant legs were now filled to the breaking point and she eagerly awaited the feel and sight of her bursting out of her clothes. However, despite the fact that she was still growing ever larger her pants didn't split. Instead as she watched they began to slowly transform. The blue denim continued to stretch across her massive quads spreading thin while at the same time it darkened until it was black. She suddenly realized that she was no longer wearing jeans and was instead wearing black yoga tights. Her tights began to shorten little by little, the end moving from her ankle to just above her inflating calf muscles where it stopped. Laura turned and pressed her toes into the floor watching her calf harden into a shredded diamond. Then she slid her hand over her monstrous glutes, squeezing and finding no give whatsoever.

"Forget walnuts you could crack diamonds on this ass!" Laura called out.

She turned back to face the mirror again and noticed that her shirt had transformed just as her pants had. Her green t-shirt was gone and in its place was a white tank top that was glued to her huge chest. Across the top of the shirt was her own name and just below that was a cartoon caricature of her in a crab flex with insanely huge muscles. Laura grinned then mimicked the flex herself feeling an electric thrill surge out from her spine. She relaxed then hit the pose again her body surging even larger this time. She relaxed again and noticed that she was panting with excitement. She hit the flex one last time tensing her entire body as hard as she could letting out a roar at her reflection at the same time. Her roar turned into a moan as an orgasm flooded her body with endorphins, her eyes rolling back into her head.

Steading her breathing she whispered to herself, "I made myself come... just from flexing... I never even touched myself. Oh, this is going to be even better than I thought."

Her transformation took nearly 10 minutes from start to finish and Laura loved every second of it. By the time she was done she was a monster. She stood still, hands on hips, just admiring every bulge, valley, vein, sinew and swell of her incredible new body. She looked even bigger than she had expected and she quickly realized why.

"I didn't make myself any taller!" she laughed.

All of the bodybuilders she'd copied stats from had been several inches taller than she was, one was nearly a foot taller. But she'd taken their mass, increased it slightly, then packed it onto her 5' 4" frame.

"Oh well," she said raising an arm and flexing her 21" bicep. The muscle looked enormous on her short arm and she loved it.

Laura tore herself away from the mirror and noticed even more changes to the room around her. On the far wall behind her bed was a large poster of her holding an enormous trophy over her head. On either side of her were women with impressive physiques but it only took a quick glance to see that Laura was clearly the biggest, most defined, most sculpted of them all. Surrounding the poster were a dozen other smaller pictures taken from other contests that Laura had participated in over the years. In one she noticed that it was none other than Arnold Schwarzenegger handing her a first place trophy.

Against another wall was a bookcase and above it was another set of pictures, but this one was much more personal and Laura moved in close hoping to gain some insight into her new life. There were collages of her and friends hanging out at the beach or the park or just goofing around in random places. She didn't recognize any of the people which worried her a little; what if she met them and had to speak to them like she'd known them for years? She didn't even know their names.

"Brittany," she spoke out loud while looking at a picture of a statuesque blonde. In the picture the girl stood next to Laura and both were flexing their biceps. The difference was that Brittany was quite slender and flexed mere bumps compared to the melons on Laura's arms. She didn't know how she knew the girl's name but she knew it was right.

Laura moved to another picture of a tiny but mighty asian girl with jet black hair. She put her finger on the picture and spoke, "Suzy." This girl, though several inches shorter than Laura's small stature, was rather buff and clearly a bodybuilder as well. The tiny girl was hugging her impressive body against Laura's side, one leg lifted and pressed against Laura's stomach. Laura had an arm around her companion and her hand was grabbing a handful of Suzy's rear while the other hand gripped Suzy's thigh and held it in place. It was a very sexy picture and Laura could feel goosebumps spreading out over her skin.

Next Laura spotted an image of an incredible redhead. This one was taken at the beach and the beauty wore an emerald green bikini that contrasted with her fair skin and fiery hair wonderfully. She had the most perfect pair of C cup breasts Laura had ever seen and a body that wasn't as big as Suzy's but that was still very well developed. She looked like a fitness competitor with her chiseled abs and strong shoulders and her legs, oh goodness Laura couldn't believe this girls legs. They were long and thick but perfectly sculpted with flawless skin. The girl was standing near the waterline with an enormous smile on her face. As far as Laura could tell it was the only picture on the wall that Laura wasn't in.

"Nicole," she said. She shook her head, "Nikki."

She still didn't know how she knew these names but she felt better about her new life. It seemed that some information was coming to her and perhaps more would follow.

Laura scanned more photos but most of these seemed to be random shots of her and other female bodybuilders, perhaps at shows or contests, some at hotel convention centers and several on the Las Vegas strip. In every single case her mass put everyone else's to shame and there were more than just a few shots in which the person she was posing with was pointing at Laura's incredible muscles.

Laura followed the trail of pictures to her doorway where she found another new addition. A large refrigerator now sat right next to the bedroom door and alongside it was a microwave. She opened the front and found the inside stacked, from top to bottom, with tons of large tupperware containers each packed tightly with food and marked with the date and time that it should be eaten.

Laura laughed. "Oh, I should have expected something like this." She did a quick count and saw there were at least 40 containers packed into the fridge but incredibly it looked as though she was scheduled to have eaten through all of them within 3 days.

"Obviously it takes a lot of fuel to keep my body growing bigger." Her stomach growled in agreement so she removed one of the containers and ripped the lid off. Inside were 4 boneless chicken breasts and a pile of kidney beans. She heated the food and before she knew it she was looking at an empty tupperware container.

She tossed the container on her dresser and flopped down on her bed which groaned under her considerable bulk. Laura loved how heavy her body felt while also being incredibly easy to move. It was a strange sensation that she hoped she never got used to. She began wondering what she should do next. On the one hand she wanted to go show off her body but she also wanted to visit her best friend Jason and perhaps even ask him about her life now. She felt she could trust her nerdy friend with the secret of her incredible growth in exchange for information about herself.
133221.title: The Champ is Here

choices: This Jason is as scrawny as ever.
This Jason is a bodybuilder just like Laura.
1332212.content:
Jason had been Laura's best friend since the two were in preschool together. They had both grown up in the shadow of more popular siblings (while Laura had both a jock and a beauty to look up to Jason had his twin sister Jasmine who was both a beauty and a jock) and had followed similar paths enjoying the nerdier things in life: science fiction, roll playing games, anime, comics, and so on. Jason and Laura had spent countless days talking about what they would do if they ever found themselves with bodies like those that they envied and now that Laura had accomplished exactly that she had to go see him.

Of course she knew that the muscles that were so new to her were old news to Jason, but she even considered the idea of telling him about her old life as a wimp. Perhaps she could even share her new reality bending ability with him, but caution was a must. She'd already messed with the fabric of reality once, best to wait at least a little while until she did it again, right? Besides, she wanted to take her time and enjoy the new life she'd built so they could share the excitement of her growth.

Either way, though, Laura decided she was going to pay Jason a visit. At the very least it would be worth it to hang out with a familiar friend before diving into a life she knew nothing about.

Laura leapt to her feet and approached her closet. She didn't want to wear workout clothes and wanted to find something else comfy and casual that still showcased her gorgeous muscles. She was shocked by just how many garments were stuffed into her closet. There was hardly any room to move clothes around and see what she had. There were tons of dresses of varying degrees of sexiness ranging from "everyday wear" all the way to "turning every head in the club." She found quite a few suites and other business casual clothes, oversized slacks and giant button up shirts, and wondered what she used those for. There was a section that looked like a huge jumble of bungee cord that turned out to be dozens upon dozens of bikinis. As Laura searched through them she found that they were all sequined or jewel encrusted, or tied with strings of pearls. She decided that these must be her collection of posing bikinis for her competitions since they all seemed far too fancy to just wander around the beach in.

In fact for all the clothes in her closet there wasn't much that looked like clothes she could just lounge around in. Abandoning her closet for the nearby dresser she found what she was looking for. The top drawer was filled with socks and underwear on one side and swimsuits for actual swimming on the other. The middle drawer held her tops, t-shirts, tanks, halters, and undershirts. And below that drawer were pants, shorts and tons of lycra garments in every color of the rainbow.

"Now this is more like it," Laura said pulling out a pair of cut off shorts with frayed denim hanging down. Laura then picked out a t-shirt (a purple one with She Hulk on the front her muscles pumped up and one hand in the air holding a barbell with several giant plates on either side) and then opted to go with a red bikini with black stripes in place of underwear.

Laura quickly stripped off her current clothes keeping her eyes away from the mirror because she knew that were she to catch a glimpse of her naked form she'd go right back to staring at her own reflection again and she didn't know if she'd be able to stop any time soon. Getting the bikini top on was a bit more cumbersome than she'd expected with her extra bulk but she actually really loved that she had trouble, it just meant that she was than damn big. She had similar trouble with the t-shirt, though it was a bit easier. Finally once she had pulled her shorts over her giant quads she allowed herself a peek at the mirror.

She was glad she'd opted for the bikini since the shirt was so tight across her chest that she could make out the triangular shapes beneath the fabric, she preferred that look to a bra or even her nipples poking through. The bottom of the shirt ended a few inches above her shorts showing off a hint of her incredible abs and she was a bit surprised to find that the shorts were cut so high they fit her somewhat like a bikini themselves. She put her hands on her hips and flexed her muscles listening to her clothes cry out in protest. Thankfully they held and she felt confident that she could go outside without fear of bursting a seam unless she really wanted to.

Laura found her collection of shoes in the bottom of the closet behind a pile of clothes and picked out a slightly worn looking pair of flip flops. The sandals were super comfy telling her that they must be a favorite of hers. She was about to leave her room when her stomach gurgled again.

"This is going to be a serious problem if I can't stray more than a hundred feet from my fridge," she told her musclebound reflection. With a shrug she collected her next two meals (several fish filets, a brick of cheese, a container with half a dozen raw eggs, a large pile of green beans, and 2 pounds of ground beef) and consumed every last bit within minutes. As she finished her second and third lunches of the day Laura began to wonder about her daily routine. Was she supposed to be working out today? What would she do when she had to go to the gym? Would the power of the phone app keep her big and bulging or would she have to work extra hard to keep her size up? She supposed this was why she needed an ally, someone who knew she was clueless about her own life. More than ever she knew she needed Jason's help.

She bounded down the stairs from her room to the entryway then out the front door with such momentum that she nearly plowed right through it. Jason's house was just a few blocks down from her own so she walked with a confident strut. She couldn't help but grin at the heads that were turning in her direction and for the first time in her life she loved being the center of attention. She even winked and waved at a pair of cute guys who promptly turned beet red.

A few minutes later she was at Jason's door. She knocked, banging on the door harder than she'd intended and for just a moment she realized that she didn't really know just how strong she was. Before she could contemplate her power any further the door swung open and the Jason of this reality stood before her.
1332212.title: Preparing to meet an old friend for the first time

choices: Laura does a historical change to either herself or Jason to "fix" this reality.
She leaves it alone for now and goes elsewhere until she can talk to Jason later
13322121.content:
Laura had been more than half expecting that the Jason of this reality would have bulked up simply by being associated with her but apparently that hadn't happened. The Jason who now stood before her wasn't a musclebound beefcake like the one she had found herself hoping for. He did look different though, his hair was longer, splitting the difference between being unkempt and spiked out, he was also wearing a tight black t-shirt for a band Laura didn't recognize which was different than his usual baggy superhero shirts. Maybe he wasn't quite as scrawny as he had been, he looked good in the shirt Laura decided, if he wasn't actively working out he was at least eating better.

"What do you want?" The coolly delivered question snapped Laura out of her inspection of her friend and she brought her attention back to his face, which didn't look happy to see her.

"Well, I," Laura began uncertainly before she was interrupted.

"Jason who is it?" Laura's attention was drawn over Jason's shoulder as a girl she didn't recognize appeared behind Jason. And if Laura had ever seen this girl before she would have remembered her. The girl was tall, almost as tall as Jason, and thin. She was generically pretty enough to not be considered plain, her only stand out features being her eyes, which were strikingly green and mostly shrouded by her long dark hair. Her eyes and her breasts. Laura actually did a double take and had to stop herself from doing a triple take at the sight of the massive breasts this girl had stuffed into her tank top. They were large to the point of being improbable but the way they moved as the girl put her arm possessively around Jason's waist and held him tight made Laura pretty certain they were real. The strange girls eyes hardened as she regarded Laura. Laura was struck speechless by the sight of this girl and she struggled to say something.

"Nyah, you remember Laura." Jason's expression was still distant and his words were carefully neutral sounding.

"I remember," Nyah said softly, her gaze becoming even more steely. She buried most of her head behind Jasons shoulder, only her eyes were visible, glaring at Laura as though over a fence put up between feuding neighbors.

"Look Laura, I'm about to head out to practice," Jason said, picking up a bass guitar that had apparently been leaning up against the wall near the door.

"Colin and Wendy are waiting," Nyah said in agreement, nodding her head.

"So whatever you have to say, please say it quickly." Jason finished.

Since when did Jason play an instrument? Laura's mind reeled and suddenly it hit her, Laura couldn't remember seeing any pictures of Jason on her wall with all of her new friends. And Laura also suddenly realized she hadn't seen any of her comics, or for that matter any of her favorite geeky, nerdy stuff anywhere in her new room. The realization seemed to create a cascade of new (old?) memories. She could remember drifting away from Jason as he stayed as he always had and she had began to seriously pursue bodybuilding, she could remember him timidly trying to ask her out as more than a friend once, something she apparently refused to consider because she was focused on her next competition and because he was too scrawny to interest her and hadn't outgrown "nerd stuff" yet. More memories came pouring in and Jason was in very few of them. At some point she had recollections of Jason joining a band and her going to see them perform once, maybe to patch things up between them but it had apparently ended with a fight between her and Nyah, whom she could now remember saying horrible things to. "I'm so sorry," Laura finally said, tears threatening to flow. She felt overwhelmed by the rush of new memories

Jason's expression softened slightly. "So am I, but I don't have the time right now to get into this with you. If you want I'll text you later," Jason brushed past Laura with his bass and Nyah in tow, closing the front door behind him and getting into a beat up compact car, presumably Nyah's, and drove away.

Laura stood on his front porch for a few moments lost in thought, sifting through her conflicting memories, trying to make sense of how much she had really changed from the person she could still remember being this morning. She wasn't sure she wanted a reality where she has lost touch with her geeky pursuits the same way she wasn't sure she wanted a reality where her and Jason weren't best friends but on the other hand, Jason appeared to be doing well for himself without her, he was in a band and was with a girl who not only seemed devoted to him but was rocking a supermodel/porn star figure. And thinking of Nyah's figure gave Laura a massive pang of jealousy. She had thought Vanessa had big boobs but holy crap. Where had Jason found this girl and how had the two of them gotten together? Would things have worked out differently between Jason and Laura if Laura's boobs had been that big? Maybe the phone could fix things somehow so their friendship wouldn't have been wrecked, or maybe she should leave it alone until she explored this reality more.
13322121.title: This Jason is as scrawny as ever.

choices: Things at the club go well.
Things at the club do not go as planned.
133221212.content:
Laura walked back home lost in swirling thoughts and conflicting emotions. The spring had definitely been taken out of her step and while she had basked in the glow of admiration from the general public on her way to Jason's house she didn't take notice of any of the many people who stopped to stare at her muscular body on the way back home.

The excitement she'd felt earlier over her new life was fading and she was now realizing that while some elements of this reality were far superior there were some consequences that she didn't like at all. Had she really compromised a huge piece of who she was on the inside in exchange for her giant muscles? Did she really have to live with the pain of being such a bitch to her best friend? Most of the way back she was trying to think of how she would use the phone to correct what she'd done and repair the bond between her and Jason. It seemed possible based on the way the Alterations app described its features, but there was a voice in the back of her head telling her that things could get much worse and that she should wait and see more of this world before erasing it and trying again.

Once Laura stepped inside her own home she was assaulted by an angry voice. "Where the hell have you been? We're late!"

Instantly Laura was snapped out of her doldrums and put on the defensive. It was Vanessa that was angry with her and while Jason's body hadn't gone through any real changes in this reality as she'd hoped, it was clear that Vanessa's had. Laura was used to seeing a Vanessa that was curvaceous but still fit from years of track, cheerleading, and dance. While "curvaceous" was still an apt descriptor "fit" was no longer strong enough a word to do the job. "Buff" was the first word that came to Laura's mind upon laying eyes on her older sister. Vanessa was clad in tiny terry cloth shorts and a sports bra under a tight tank top, and this gave Laura a clear view of Vanessa's plump thighs, wide shoulders, and thick arms. Vanessa had not yet crossed the threshold into bodybuilder territory but she was dancing very close to the line.

"Well?" Vanessa demanded.

Laura was shocked by her sister's dominant demeanor and totally forgot about her complete physical superiority, once again becoming that scrawny and lost little girl she'd always been. "I.. uh, Jason's house."

Vanessa frowned. "Jason's house? What were you doing there? I thought you guys weren't speaking."

"We're not." Apparently, Laura said in her mind. "I guess, I don’t know, I was hoping to patch things up."

Now Vanessa smiled. "Oh my little Lulu. Don't worry about him, he'll come around when he's ready. But seriously we're late for your workout, you're never late for chest and arms day. It's so unlike you."

Laura chuckled. "I haven't been very much like me at all today." Suddenly, though, Laura felt much better. A good workout was just what she needed to clear her head, plus it was a good opportunity to feel the strength her new body possessed. She smiled and nodded at Vanessa.

"Atta girl!" Vanessa gave Laura a hard slap on the ass then sucked her breath in. "Why do I do that? It hurts every time."

Laura bounded up the stairs to her room and began changing into workout clothes. This time she opted for lycra shorts and no shirt over her sports bra. As she was tying her shoes her phone chimed indicating a text message. It was from Jason:

we r doing a show @ 8 tnite @ the chiller. i'll put u on the list. can talk after if u wnt.

Laura felt a bit of a weight lifted from her heart. Maybe this reality wasn't so dismal after all.

"What's that smile for?" Vanessa asked as Laura descended the stairs.

"Jason invited me to see his band play and says he wants to talk after."

"That's good news," Vanessa handed Laura a duffel and a huge sipper cup filled with some sort of shake. Laura took a big sip and decided that it didn't taste bad but it didn't taste all that good either. "What time?"

"The show is at 8:00."

"Great, that means I have five whole hours to turn you into a whimpering puddle of goo, let's go."

Vanessa drove them to the gym while Laura sucked down the odd shake. Inside Laura was glad to find that Vanessa seemed to be her trainer and led her through a series of warm-ups which she seemed to read off from a big black binder she carried around. As she was finishing the warm-up routine and getting ready to begin her workout proper Laura felt a massive surge of energy fill her body.

"Good god, what was in that shake you gave me?" Laura asked without even thinking that this could be a strange question.

Vanessa laughed. "You always ask and I always tell you the same thing: it's my own special, carefully researched formula and you should mind your own goddamn business."

"The way you avoid the question leads me to believe that you're slipping me illegal substances."

Vanessa feigned outrage. "As your manager do you really think I would jeopardize your career and thus my money stream like that?"

Or had she ever known the name of Jason’s band?

Laura was saved from her momentarily brain lock by the arrival of a thin blonde girl. “Relax Tony, princess is with us.” The girl was an inch or so shorter than Laura if you discounted her wild hairdo which could only exist with the aid of more hairspray than Laura had ever used in her entire life. The girl eyed Laura with an air of bored detachment and an undercurrent of disdain.

“OK Wendy, keep her out of trouble.” Tony waved them through and Laura followed the other girl wondering if the warning was generic or specifically aimed at her based on something she had done in the past.

“C’mon, you’ll be sitting at the sound board with me. Back stage is off limits during the show, he hasn’t said it but I don’t think Jason wants you and Nyah alone together and she’s back there,” Wendy sat down at the mixing board and gestured to a stool next to her. She slipped a pair of headphones on and turned her back to Laura. Laura looked around at the crowd, which was now milling around the stage and again felt out of place. Jeans, t-shirts, leather and denim jackets, long hair, tattoos and piercings, this was not the sort of place she ever would have thought Jason would have anything to do with.

Laura was snapped out of her contemplation by the house lights going down and the curtain opening. The long haired guitar player strode up to the center microphone and addressed the crowd with an accent that was vaguely British, “Good evening mates! We are The Marauders!” And with that chaos erupted. The band was shockingly loud and the crowd reacted with over the top excitement. Jason was on the left side of the stage with his bass and Laura could feel the thunder of it deep in her gut. This was not the Jason she knew. The Jason she knew was quiet and shy in public. This Jason was obviously enjoying being in the limelight, head banging, singing backing vocals, parading around the stage, stoking the crowds enthusiasm to a fever pitch and enjoying every bit of it. Laura wasn’t really into punk or metal or whatever kind of music it was they were playing but the energy was infectious and she found herself on her feet, unable to keep from tapping her feet or even jumping up and down periodically.

Time passed quickly, the band kept up an almost constant barrage of sound, pausing just long enough to shout out song titles before launching into the next number or to briefly whip the crowd back into frenzy. This constant, frenetic pace made the slight pause while Jason and the guitar player (who had introduced himself to the crowd as Colin) switch places really stand out. Jason strode confidently up to the center mic. “I want to dedicate this next song to a very special lady, it’s one of her favorites and I know she’s here tonight. Just remember baby, I’ll always be here for you.” For a moment Laura wanted to believe that Jason was talking about her but then she followed Jasons gaze to the sidestage and caught a glimpse of Nyah gazing back at him with absolute adoration in her eyes. Jason grinned back at Nyah and again Laura felt a pang of jealousy, she and Jason had been friends for years and he had never looked at her like that. Jason set his bass down in a stand next to the microphone and whipped his shirt off over his head, tossing it offstage to Nyah and putting the bass back on in one smooth motion. The girls in the crowd screamed their approval and pushed closer to the stage and Laura sucked her breath in sharply. Jason was ripped. The jealousy pang came back again even stronger as Jason started pounding out a throbbing bass line. “Lucretia, my reflection. This one’s for you Nyah,” Jason intoned.

The crowd erupted as Jason growled his way through this song as well, once again surprising Laura that he could make his voice sound like that. But apparently it came at a price. “OK,” Jason laughed hoarsely as the song ended. “That’s about all I have in me, back to you Colin.” They switched places and played two more songs before bidding farewell to the crowd amid deafening applause.

Laura found herself with too much time to think and feeling too many emotions while she waited for Jason to come talk to her. What was she was going to say? Why was she even here? “So,” Jason said, clearing his throat after a moment of silence went by. “What was it you wanted to talk about?”

"Because kiddo, you're a lightweight, I don't need you yakking all over the living room," Vanessa set the bottle down on the coffee table, just out of Laura's easy reach, and leaned back. "What did you say this show was called? It's better than I was expecting."

Laura didn't even glance at the TV. Was Vanessa spending time with her? Was this a bonding moment? Holy shit it was! "I love you so much," Laura threw her arms around her sister tried to give her a bear hug. She sat up again realizing that the taste in her mouth must be wine. "How much did I have to drink?"

Vanessa laughed. "Probably too much, you can NOT tell mom and dad I let you do this." Vanessa's tone softened and she put her arm around her younger sisters shoulders. "And I love you too. I am really sorry I ever you made feel this way but I'm glad we talked about it. You can't keep stuff like that bottled up, it'll make you do something stupid eventually."

Laura say in a thoughtful silence, wishing she knew what they had talked about. Apparently it had been a good talk. Memories from her alternate life swirled with her "real" memories and jumbled somewhere in there was the day she had lived today without the amazing body she had given herself? Or was that just something she imagined because of the alcohol? "Where's my phone?" Laura asked when she realized it wasn't on her. She needed to check the app. She needed to know if that had been real.

"Charging in your room I think," Vanessa took another swig of wine then turned to look at her sister more closely. "Are you OK? You look worried about something."

"I think so," Laura felt disoriented and confused, she didn't want whatever moment she having with Vanessa to end but at the same time she had to know whether any of the stuff with the app had really happened or not. "I think I need to go to bed," Laura attempted to stand and Vanessa had to quickly catch her as she wobbled unsteadily.

"Probably, let me help you upstairs." Vanessa shut off the TV and helped Laura get to her bed. Before she left she made sure a trashcan was at Laura's bedside. "I'll check in on you but if you have to puke this will help. Laura lay back and nodded, the room felt like it was swaying. "Get some sleep, we'll hit the mall tomorrow and get you some new clothes and makeup."

"What?"

"I never realized how you felt, you always seemed so happy and comfortable with who you were, you have a great friend, you have no reason to feel like this." Vanessa gave her a peck on the forehead. "My sister is NOT an ugly duckling."

Laura was speechless which Vanessa took as her cue to leave. That's what they had talked about? Laura's feelings of inadequacy and jealousy? Laura felt tears begin to roll down her cheeks, she wasn't sure if it was tears of joy because she apparently had a better bond with Vanessa than she realized, or were they tears of shame for how she felt about herself? Maybe both. Laura could feel sleep closing in, whether it was the emotional release, the wine she had drank or just the fact it was almost one in the morning she couldn't stay awake any longer, not even long enough to check her phone. Her last thought before finally passing out was still whether or not the app had been a dream.

=====================================

Laura's eyes opened to sunlight stabbing at them painfully. She sat up and looked around, her head still felt fuzzy but she no longer felt like puking was only seconds away. She fumbled around her nightstand and found her phone. She had a short text from Vanessa, "you were still sleeping when I got up, I had things to take care of but if you can meet me at the mall around eleven I'll still take you shopping like I promised." Laura checked the time, it was a little after nine in the morning. That should be plenty of time to meet Vanessa. She quickly texted her sister back that she would meet her.

Her phone buzzed again, this time from Jason. "I'm bored u doing anything?"

"About to head to the mall, want to come?"

"Sure, when?"

"Meet me at the bus stop in a half hour?"

"K."

Laura crawled out of bed and rubbed her head. Jason reminded her a fuzzy memory. Had they had a fight yesterday?" Suddenly the memories of her day as a muscle goddess came rushing back. The app! She snatched her phone back up again, and unlocked it. Was the app real or had yesterday been a dream?

13322121212211.content:
Laura quickly found the Alterations app and opened it, she was immediately greeted be her profile. A quick review showed that her profile was set at Revision 0 and was safety locked. A small exclamation mark notation was next to "Revision 0" and she tapped it. "Reactivation of a previously applied revision will disable the safety lock feature. Do you wish to proceed?" Laura quickly clicked "no" for now. She wasn't ready to mess the app again at the moment, it was more powerful than she first realized and she didn't have time to mess with it right now anyway.

Laura quickly showered, dressed and wolfed down some food before jogging to the bus stop. She could see Jason standing at the bus stop as she approached it. She could also see the bus pulling away and she cursed at her timing. She gave up jogging and walked towards the bus stop instead, suddenly stopping as recognized one of the people who had just got off the bus. It was Colin, who had been in Jason's band yesterday. Colin walked past Jason without a hint that either one of them recognized the other. Colin pulled a cigarette out and lit it as he walked past Laura, also without a glimmer of recognition. Laura hesitated as they passed each other then looked back over her shoulder at his retreating back. It was so weird seeing someone she had met and recognized in what was apparently an alternate reality but that here they apparently didn't know her. If she did this much more often would her mind be able to keep track of this sort of thing?

She resumed walking slowly then looked back over her shoulder at Colin again, he was turning up the walk to red house on the corner down the street from the bus stop just as a car Laura also recognized pulled up to the same house. The unmistakable figure of Nyah exited the car and followed Colin up to the house. Nyah was dressed in baggy unflattering clothes but it was still impossible to fully conceal the mammoth size of her breasts. Laura literally stopped in her tracks to watch Nyah until she entered the house. The posture and attitude of this Nyah was a night and day difference from what she had seen yesterday. Yesterday Nyah had been wearing tight, flattering clothing and had looked confident and self assured. Now she looked like she was trying to hide from the world.

Laura pulled up her phone and opened Nyah's profile. Nyah's physical stats looked the same as yesterday but that was the only thing that was the same. Relationships had no friends, romantic or otherwise, only family at which point Laura realized she was Colin's sister. What had changed? Had Jason been the positive influence in her life that had led Nyah to open up? Laura stopped wondering about Nyah's life and instead wondered about her own life, specifically how different it might be if she had Nyah's breasts? Laura could see that Nyah's profile was still safety locked but she could at least copy what the other girl had couldn't she? Nyah was a thin girl, according to her information Laura had the same bra band size as her, which made her snort incredulously. She wouldn't have thought the two had ANYTHING in common in their chest areas. Laura hesitated then selected Nyah's breasts and hit "copy" on the clipboard icon, then opened her own profile and hit "paste." Laura gasped as the avatar on the phone screen swelled to the point of bursting out of her t-shirt. The breasts looked even more dramatically large on Laura's frame and it took her a moment to realize that Nyah was six feet tall. The height difference helped make her look at least slightly more proportional. A series of warnings about muscle tone and probable back pain appeared on Laura's screen and she read through them before choosing "see recommended alterations." Laura gasped as body subtly changed to accommodate the massive breasts. Her muscle tone in her shoulders and stomach dramatically improved and her hips widened to better match the proportion of her upper body. "Oh my God, I look unbelievable,' Laura breathed.

The roar of an approaching bus caught her attention and Laura looked up to see that Jason had noticed her and was waving. "Laura come on, you're going to miss the bus!" Laura put her phone away and ran to join her friend.

133221212122112.content:
Laura broke into a run to reach the bus managed to breathlessly board it right behind Jason. The two took seats toward the back of the nearly empty bus. Laura let out a sigh as she sat down, "thanks for getting my attention, I was zoned out."

"No problem," Jason looked out the window as the bus pulled away. Laura noticed that Jason was looking in the direction of the house where Colin and Nyah lived. Was that a coincidence or did he already know Nyah somehow? After a moment he leaned back and pulled out his own phone to begin playing a game on it. "What are we going to the mall for?" He asked without looking up from his screen.

"Vanessa is taking me shopping for some clothes and stuff."

"Really?" Jason sounded mildly surprised since Laura and her sister had rarely spent much time with each other since the older girl had graduated high school.

"Yea, I'm actually kind of excited about it," Laura admitted. Laura realized she really was legitimately excited about it. Both because she was looking forward to spending time with her sister again and because beyond "geek" t-shirts for comics, TV shows or movies she didn't usually think much about clothes and makeup was something she almost forgot existed. She felt as though she was about to learn some next level piece of forbidden knowledge. Jason grunted something that was probably supposed to be some sort of agreement and continued to play his game.

Laura sighed and pulled out her own phone, she hadn't intended to mess with app anymore for now but the sight of her potential new body when her phone unlocked caused her pulse to quicken. She glanced guiltily in Jason's direction but he was lost in his own world. She returned to regarding her digital self. The version of Laura on her phone screen was naked from the waist up, the enormous breasts having outgrown both the t-shirt and bra she had been wearing. Her shorts looked they were about to suffer the same fate due to her widened hips. While her body had been far more muscular yesterday this version was a very sexy level of sleek musculature, her abs were noticeable and her shoulders and pecs were well rounded and strong looking without a shredded bodybuilder look. Laura spun the model around to look at it from all angles and was appreciative of the finely muscled back. "All the better to lug those boobs around," she thought to herself. She was pleasantly surprised to notice that her backside had received a considerable upgrade, her hips had not only been widened, her ass had become well rounded, to the point her shorts had split open revealing panties that were straining to not do the same. Her legs had been tweaked to fit the new hips as well, not overtly muscular but well shaped, they narrowed down to shapely calves. Laura desperately wanted to push the "Apply Changes" button and start living life in this new body, it looked incredible. But how would she change it? She was kind of afraid of using the historical option again, she'd didn't like the idea of potentially waking up in a new reality where she had changed into a person she didn't like or losing her friends again. Applying instant changes seemed like a bad idea, how would she explain to anyone how she had transformed so dramatically? She dug through the options and found a progressive setting that looked like it would incrementally change her body from what it was now to what she wanted it to become over a period of time but that had its own problems. Too fast and it would still seem weird. Waiting a long period of time not only seemed horribly frustrating, she'd also be buying new clothes and bras constantly in the meantime.

She let out a sigh of frustration and decided to put off doing anything with herself for now. She was about to close the app when she remembered something from last night. Guiltily sneaking a glance at Jason she switched to his profile instead, remembering how good he had looked naked the last time she looked at him with the app. She kept sneaking glances as Jason as she worked on his profile, she didn't want him to catch her at what she was doing. The first thing she figured out how to do was remove his digital clothes. It didn't take long to find "Display options" and toggle between "real time clothing" and "nude." Laura was both happy to see Jason's surprisingly large member again and disappointed that his body in this reality was scrawny rather than the gorgeously well cut body he had yesterday. Laura played with the muscle slider, nudging it all the way up to almost four hundred pounds. He looked incredible at any size, did he have a natural affinity for muscular development that was currently untapped or did the app automatically synchronize things like proportion? She reverted him back to his normal size and switched tabs to take her mind off of it, she was starting to get worked up. Laura found herself in Jasons mental tab. She glanced down at his relationships. Like the Jason of the other reality this one had a healthy selection of girls in the "sexual fantasies" column though more of these were actresses or models than people Laura actually knew. She was mildly surprised Nyah wasn't anywhere to be seen, apparently Jason didn't know who she was after all. Laura wasn't very surprised that Vanessa was high on his list with tags like "strong sexual attraction" and "crush." She was surprised though to find her name with both "long term friendship" and "conflicted feelings." What the fuck did that mean? Laura went back to Jason's main profile page and re-enabled his clothing display. She was about to exit the app and put her phone away when she noticed that unlike Nyah, Jason's profile wasn't locked in this reality. What had been different in the other reality that Jason's profile was locked there but not here? And what did that mean for Laura? Just because she could change her friend should she?

Laura looked up from her phone, the bus wasn't far from the mall now, if she was going to do anything with the phone now would the time, otherwise who knew how long it would be before she had the opportunity again?

Laura laughed, recognizing the old game. Jason must have downloaded an emulated version of it for his iPhone. "That man is playing Galaga! He thought we wouldn't notice, but we did!" Laura elbowed him in the ribs again.

"Ha-ha," Jason elbowed her back as he tried to evade incoming enemy fire.

"What? No quippy Tony Stark quote in return or anything?" Laura continued jostling him with her elbow and laughing, now concentrating on his arm instead of ribs for maximum game disruption.

"Uh, I have a plan, attack," Jason said with obvious distraction, he began trying to jab Laura back with his own elbow without dropping his phone.

"Your game is weak," Laura giggled. "Both of them." She stopped with a squeak of surprise as one of Jason's elbow attacks slipped past her and hit her directly in the boob.

Jason immediately realized what he had done and began turning beet red with embarrassment. "Oh my God, I am SO sorry," he put his phone down and reached towards Laura as though to help then realized he had no idea what to do, how to do it or where to put his hands. "Shit, I am so sorry," he repeated as he picked up his phone again.

Laura laughed "It's fine, I'll live. It startled me more than it hurt," she rubbed her boob and tried not laugh as Jason turned even more red. "And good aim, it's not like they're big targets or anything."

Jason's mouth dropped open and Laura couldn't help but laugh at the expression of horror on his face. With the air of a student saved by the bell Jason looked relieved when the bus stopped and the announcement that they had arrived was made.

Laura texted her sister after they got off the bus and only a few minutes later Vanessa joined them outside the mall entrance. "Hey Lulu, I already got you some stuff but the rest you need to try on." Vanessa greeted Laura with a hug.

"Ooh, what did you get so far?"

"Hey Jason, I didn't expect to see you tag along. Laura warned you we're shopping for girly stuff and you'll probably be bored right?"

"I was bored anyway, might as well be bored hanging out with people I like." The easy exchange between the two took Laura by surprise. Usually Jason seemed very subdued around Vanessa. But then usually Vanessa didn't usually talk directly to him. Momentarily Laura had a feeling like a half forgotten memory that Vanessa and Jason had been a couple. But that hadn't ever happened had it? But at the same time Laura could clearly remember once being of the strongest women who had ever lived and that hadn't technically happened either.

"You OK Laura," Vanessa touched her arm and leaned in close to look at her eyes. "You're over last night right?"

"What happened last night?" Jason asked before Laura had a chance to answer.

"Nothing of course. We are two well behaved girls of less than legal drinking age so of course nothing happened," Vanessa winked at Jason and put her finger over her lips in the universal sign of "shh."

"I'm going to head over to Game Stop and see if Ray is working today, text me when you're done doing your "girly stuff."" Jason made quote marks in the air when he said "girly stuff."

Laura expected Vanessa to laugh but instead was surprised to see her sister looking thoughtful. "You're not interested in Jason are you?"

Vanessa shrugged. "I don't know, I never really thought about it. He's tall, his complexion has cleared up a lot in the last year or so, he could stand to dress a little better and maybe wash his hair more often though. Hmm."

"Are you fucking with me right now?"

Laura, thought back to the odd memory/vision of Jason and Vanessa as a couple she had experienced earlier. "But why would a guy be interested in me if you're around?" Laura blurted out, then immediately wished she could take it back. "I mean..." all the feelings of inadequacy and jealousy she had felt yesterday morning came rushing back, "I don't know what I mean," she finished lamely.

"Oh Lulu..."

"Stop calling me Lulu, I'm not a kid anymore," Laura snapped. "I'm sorry, I didn't mean it like that. I don't know what's wrong with me."

"Nothing." Vanessa said firmly. She stopped walking and grabbed Laura by the shoulders, turning her so they were face to face. "There is NOTHING wrong with you. Not a thing." Laura opened her mouth and Vanessa shook her head. "No, listen to me before you say one more word. You are a good looking girl. You have put me above you on some pedestal and are comparing yourself to me and you're hurting both of us by doing it. You're wrecking your own confidence and you're going to make yourself resent me which isn't fair to me because I love you. I. Love. You." Vanessa emphasized. Laura was suddenly afraid her sister was going to cry and that she'd have one more thing to feel bad for. "C'mon, let's go sit down." Laura allowed Vanessa to lead her to a nearby bench.

Vanessa set down her shopping bags and turned to face her younger sister. "Do you want to know a secret?" Vanessa finally asked her.

Laura looked confused. "Sure."

Vanessa leaned in close and said in a conspiratorial whisper, "There are prettier girls than me out there."

Laura immediately bristled, "but..."

"But nothing, there are. There are girls with prettier faces, bigger boobs, better butts, whatever. I work with what I have, you need to work with what you have. And don't even tell me that what you have isn't good."

Laura wanted to feel angry, to complain about her lack of assets but at the same time she felt like there was a glimmer of hope. "What do I have that's good?" She asked finally.

"Oh kiddo," Vanessa brushed Laura's hair away from her face. "Do you really not see it? You have big beautiful eyes. When you smile they light up and you have a very pretty smile. You have nice teeth, nothing is missing, crooked or snaggly, you have a good clear complexion, you have nice hair, you're not too skinny, you're not too fat." Laura began to shake her head with frustration and Vanessa stopped her again. "It's about presentation and it's about attitude," Vanessa said. If I had thought you cared about this sort of thing I would have taught you a long time ago but I thought you liked the tomboy thing you had going on."

Laura rolled her eyes. "I'm not a tomboy."

Vanessa laughed. "You don't wear makeup, you don't do anything with your hair except maybe put it in a ponytail," Vanessa tugged on Laura's ponytail for emphasis, "you wear jeans and t-shirts all the time."

"I'm wearing shorts right now,' Laura said indignantly.

"Jean shorts," Vanessa snorted, poking at the hemline that was just above Lauras knee. "Laura, trust me. I will show how good you can look and how plain I can look and I will make you understand how superficial all this is if I have to beat it into your stubborn head," Vanessa was chuckling as she rapped the top of Lauras head with her knuckles but Laura wasn't sure whether or not she was joking.

The next couple of hours went by quickly as Vanessa led her younger sister from store to store, all the while expounding on the theories behind body types and clothing choices. By the end some of it was actually starting to make sense to her. "You're not very curvy," Vanessa said at one point, "there's nothing wrong with that, it just means you have to pick out clothes that draw the eye to the different parts of your body as though you were." Or makeup color choices, or hair styling tips, or just general advice on posture and attitude. "There are girls who could be amazing if they didn't dress and act like they were trying to hide from the world," Vanessa said at one point. Laura immediately thought of the world of difference she had seen between Nyah today and yesterday. One was obviously insecure and self conscious, the other had been like a barely contained force of sexual nature. And Laura had seen for herself that there had been little difference in her physical statistics. Laura began to feel a flicker of real hope and confidence about herself.

True to her word Vanessa was demonstrating how plain she could look. She had brushed her hair into a plain ponytail, washed off most of her makeup, bought a loose fitting t-shirt and a pair of jean shorts that weren't skin tight. She finished it off with a pair of Chuck Taylor's, the first shoes without heels Laura had seen her sister wear in a long time. She looked... normal. Non-threatening. Like someone Laura could spend all day hanging out with and not feel self conscious around.

Laura looked at herself in a full length mirror as Vanessa put the finishing touches on her makeover and she almost didn't recognize herself. Whatever Vanessa had done to her hair looked amazing. Even though Laura still didn't fully understand things like volume and body and how to use them to her advantage Vanessa had made her hair look like a shampoo commercial with a full and wavy cascade of hair framing her face. She was wearing a loose fitting short sleeve top that was cut off at her midriff. Vanessa had looped a thin gold chain around Laura's waist and apparently she had just enough hips to keep it from falling straight off of her body. "This is one of the areas you want draw the eye," Vanessa had explained. The top was cut with a v-neck that was both wide and low and in that gap, hanging down to where she would have cleavage had she been better endowed, was a necklace Vanessa had helped her pick out. "It helps draw the eye this way also, seriously kid, you look really good." Laura fidgeted and plucked at the hem off her denim mini skirt. "Stop that," Vanessa scolded with a chuckle, "it's covering what it needs to, you're supposed to show off the rest." Vanessa gave her a playful swat on the butt and in response Laura wobbled slightly on the low heeled sandals Vanessa had picked out for her. A small charm bracelet hung from one ankle. Laura had to admit, she looked good, better than she thought she would. Her face broke into an unrestrained grin. The minimalist makeup Vanessa had artfully applied to her lips, cheeks and eyes really did make her features "pop."

"Look at you, all decked out from head to toe," Vanessa finally said with a smile.

"Thank you," Laura said, wrapping her arms around Vanessa in a combination between a a tackle and a hug.

"No sweat Lu... Laura. Anytime you need me, I'm here for you. Now don't cry, you're going to smudge your makeup. Don't make me cry either," Vanessa added after a moment.

"No promises," Laura said with a sniffle. Finally Laura let go of her sister. "OK, let's collect my wayward nerd and head back." She began texting Jason to meet them at the entrance.

"You're not who I am anymore," Laura said as she crumpled the photo into a ball.

Laura shook her head. "I'd prefer to go solo if you don't mind, I was going to call the girls and bring them with then decided not to. I need to find new toys to play rough with, I'll probably break them and I really don't feel like sharing tonight."

Vanessa shrugged, "next time then. You must be over whatever was bothering you earlier, you sound like your old self again. Did you get what you were after with Jason?"

Nikki smiled warmly. "You know, Steve is a great guy but he has one disastrous flaw. As nice as he is sometimes he can be completely inconsiderate and self absorbed."

Laura nodded.

"It's too bad he doesn't have a twin brother who was just like him but more compassionate." Nikki gave Laura a quick hug then left the room.

Laura laughed out loud. "What a great idea." Even though they'd only just met and had hardly spoke Laura was really liked Nikki, and as much as erasing Steve sounded like a good idea it would mean severing that connection too. She didn't know who Nikki was in her own world but she and Jason seemed happy and it'd be a shame to ruin things for them. But there was another way.

Taking her phone back out she canceled the deletion request. Next to the trash can icon was a button labeled "copy." Tapping on that Laura was taken through a series of menus that allowed her to create a twin brother for Steve whom she named Bobby. Because they were identical twins and shared the same DNA Laura was a little more limited in how she could customize Bobby without also effecting Steve but found she was able to amp a number of his personality traits independently. She raised his kindness and empathy stats way up then increased his sensitivity a little as well. She also wanted to make sure not to let this one get away so she raised the relationship meter until it read "true love." There was still more room on the relationship slider, but only a quarter or so remained.

"Let's see Vanessa steal this one." Laura laughed.

She was about to press "Apply Changes" when she realized there was something else that could be different about the twins. "Perhaps Bobby is just more dedicated than his brother when it comes to working out." She moved the muscle slider up until Bobby had packed on an additional 60 pounds and outweighed his 360 pound brother.

"Alright, if this becomes another monkey's paw wish I'll just delete both these assholes and try something else entirely." Laura said as she pushed another person into the real world.

Moments later things went dark and Laura passed out.

Laura opened her eyes. The left side of her face was cold and she realized this was because she was lying on a tile floor. She attempted to stand but her body and brain started to protest. Realizing that she was still at the movie theater and on the bathroom floor, however, was enough to get her motivated. She closed her eyes and forced herself to stand feeling around for the counter to help support her.

She steadied herself with hands on either side of the sink then slowly opened her eyes.

"HOLY SHIT!" The words were out of her mouth before she even registered what she was seeing. Laura looked around to make sure she was still the only one in the bathroom then returned to her reflection. "I'm big!"

Somehow her body had changed and was now exploding with muscle. Earlier when she had first seen Jason's new body one of her first thoughts was that he had outgrown her bodybuilder brother; now she too was bigger than Greg. Perhaps she was bigger than Jason too, it was hard to tell since he was 6 feet tall and she was till just 5' 4" but even if Jason carried more mass Laura's shorter stature made her look far more buff.

She was now wearing a black cami dress that looked like it had been tailored specifically for her, it was snug around her chest which probably measured a good 40 to 45 inches around but also curved inward at her slender waist which was a mere 28 inches. The dress ended high on her thighs and showed off powerful quads which were each nearly as big around as her waist. Laura extended her right arm out to her side and ran her left hand from her forearm up to her bicep. The entire limb felt solid as rock, then when she bent her arm and flexed down her bicep exploded with crazy ropes of sinew.

"God I wish I had a tape measure," Laura said looking at her monster bicep. "I'd bet this thing is a good 23 inches."

She flexed her other arm and it grew just as big and hard as the first. "GGGRRR!! I FEEL SO STRONG!!" She switched to a most muscular pose and watched with excitement as her shoulders, traps, arms and chest came to life and bubbled forth. A series of snaps and pops from her dress informed her that while the garment may have been made for her size it could still rip if she pushed it too far. "Perhaps I've grown even bigger since this was made for me."

Suddenly Laura realized that she was feeling very horny. Somewhere in this world, hopefully waiting for her in the theater, was a monster of a man with an enormous cock and she wanted him and it now. She turned and left the bathroom and entered the theater once more. She spotted her friends sitting exactly where she had left them except now Vanessa and Nikki were together between Steve and Jason. To Jason's right was a gap of two seats then another person. Laura's heart leapt when she figured this must be her Bobby.

As she approached him she could see that he was exactly what she had programmed, his face was an exact duplicate of Steve's but his body was even more engorged with muscle. His shoulders were wide enough that they nearly spanned the width of two seats and his traps nearly reached his ears. Laura rounded the aisle in which he sat and her eyes fell over even more of his immense body. He wore a muscle tank top that was open down the sides and even in the dark theater Laura could see the thousands of groves, bumps, and valleys that lined his side. His pecs stuck out in a shelf a full foot beyond his chin and his legs were so thick he had to spread them out to his sides as he sat.

Before Laura could take her seat Bobby turned and saw her. He smiled brilliantly and stood up, and up. He was more than a full foot taller than Laura and her eyes roamed all over his torso. Then she realized the torso was bending down toward her.

Bobby put his lips to her ear and whispered. "I already checked with the others and I was kind of hoping to get out of here. I want to take you somewhere, is that okay?"

Laura tried to speak but the words weren't coming. Instead she just nodded.

"Great," Bobby said and took Laura's hand. As they left together Laura noticed that Nikki and Vanessa were both smiling and waving their farewells. Something was different about them, but Laura didn't have enough time to figure out what before she was pulled back up the aisle and into the lobby.

Outside the theater Bobby led Laura to an SUV that was fairly similar to the one she rode here in except this one was black. She spotted Steve's white one a few spaces down. Laura climbed into the passenger side while Bobby just managed to squeeze behind the wheel.

"I know I've said it before," Bobby said with a chuckle, "but pretty soon you're going to have to drive everywhere."

"Sure," Laura said finally finding her confidence and voice, "but what happens when I get to big to fit over there? Are you going to hire a chauffeur?"

Bobby laughed. "Maybe I will." Then he slid his hand around the side of her head and ran his fingers through her hair. "I can hardly wait to see that, by the way."

"There's something I wanted to show you at..."

Laura was intrigued to try out her new app even though it's claims seemed impossible. She wanted to try it out but was afraid to use it on herself until she could find out if it really did the things it claimed it could.

"I need a test subject," she said. She tapped the "Search" button and saw that she could put someone's name in or use the camera to find a subject. This gave her an idea.

She found that any person that appeared on the screen had a red outline around their body and when she tapped on them she was shown a display of their name and physical stats. She spotted her siblings off in the distance and zoomed in on them. Amazingly the app could zoom almost infinitely while maintaining perfect clarity. As usual Vanessa was sunning herself on her towel while several guys nearby stared at her incredible body. At the same time Greg was chatting with a few of his friends, each of whom were quite buff.

Jason wore baggy jeans and a loose fitting t-shirt while Samantha had on pink sweatpants and a matching jacket. Both of them must have been extremely hot and uncomfortable but they enjoyed being on the beach and hated showing off their bodies. Jason hid his figure because he was tall and skinny at over 6 feet tall yet hardly 150 pounds. Samantha hid for the opposite reason, her Japanese blood gave her a height of 4 foot 10 and yet she weighed a little more than Jason.

Laura knew that Samantha had a huge crush on Jason, the girl had told her as much, but Jason, like many guys, was completely oblivious. Perhaps she could give them bodies to be proud of or even kick start a relationship between them.

Laura scanned further and her heart fluttered a bit when she happened upon Eric Rodgers sitting by himself on a bench near a bike path. Eric was a boy that Laura had been infatuated with for some years. He used to be close friends with her brother and would hang out at their house often. When Eric was in high school he was a runner and had an excellent physique. When Greg had taken up bodybuilding Eric instead discovered beer and while one friend grew stronger and more muscular the other softened and gained a gut. Laura still thought Eric was a bit of a hunk and though his body was no longer a sculpted masterpiece his face was still beyond handsome. Perhaps Eric would appreciate Laura returning his fit form to him with some extra size as interest. Heck, maybe she could even use the app to make Eric feel for her the way she felt for him.

With muscles on her mind Laura turned northward where, a quarter mile up the sand, there was an outdoor gym right on the beach where only the biggest and strongest bodybuilders hung out. Even Greg, large as he was, didn't have the size to hang with the others there. Laura zoomed in and was not disappointed by the collection of muscle gods and buff bunnies she spied. As he chatted the girls up he was casually curling a very large dumbbell in one arm, switching hands after a handful of reps. The readouts on Laura's small screen told her that the dumbbell weighed 100 pounds and that Dan's arm was pumped up to 23.26 inches around.

As Laura watched Dan flirt with the two girls (which Laura also looked up: a tall redhead with amazing muscular legs named Nicole and a shorter blonde hardbody named Sara) she was overcome with the desire to make the big man grow even bigger right before their eyes. Then another possibility occurred to her that also sounded fun: make the girls outgrow Dan. Laura giggled at the thought.

She sighed. So many test subjects but only one to pick. Who would be the big winner?

“So uh, where is Vanessa now?”

Greg chuckled. “Down at the beach of course, likely holding court. With her being in the off season, her cuts are down a bit, but her strength has grown to new levels.”

Laura’s heart raced and she gulped. “Oh yeah, what was I thinking. So just how strong is she now?’

Greg shook his head. “Well not that we all don’t obsess about it, but last I checked she’s benching over 700 pounds. I think she’s added another inch to her pecs. The woman is a machine.”

They wouldn't even let you in the door if you weren't a pro or about to earn your pro card. In the center of the room was a huge plaster statue with a plaque that identified it as the Greek goddess Nike, goddess of victory and strength. Nike wore a robe that was hardly covering her body at all and showed that she, just like the paintings in the hall, was impossibly muscular.

She wore a black suit with a white button up shirt and form fitting pants that ended a few inches above her ankle. The girl was tall, especially since she wore shiny black 4 inch heels. Laura guessed that between the shoes and her incredibly long legs the girl stood 5' 11 or maybe even 6'. She had a thick mane of gorgeous red hair that spilled down over her shoulders which made her brilliant green eyes pop. The girl's face was very pretty and made even more so by an incredible smile that even made Laura's stomach flutter.

Strangely, the girl look bereft of confidence and actually looked down at the floor almost ashamed. "I mean, of course, I know you know that. Iris Kyle, the winningest Ms. Olympia ever before they discontinued holding the event. I just can't get over the work you've done and how incredible your body is." She pointed around the room at the various silhouettes on the mirrored walls. "Lenda Murray, Kim Chizevsky, Juliette Bergmann, Cory Everson, Valentina Chepiga, you've got them all beat."

Laura's head was spinning. She was familiar with the names that were being rattled off, she'd followed the sport through her brother even though he tended to focus much more heavily on the men's division, but to think that someone could compare her to a list of bodybuilding champions was insane. Laura's natural introverted nature kicked in, "Well, I'm alright." But when she turned back to the mirror and compared herself to the outline once again she recognized that her dimensions were nearly identical to the 10 time Ms. Olympia and on a frame that was shorter, no less. Laura's shyness faded a bit and was replaced with pride.

The girl entered the room and walked up behind Laura, towering over the muscular girl. "I mean it. And now that they're finally letting women back into the Olympia you're a shoe in to be the next champion."

Laura was about to speak when she was cut off.

"I know, I know, the statuesque redhead said. "You keep telling me not to get my hopes up because the industry has finally changed and started to accept bigger, more muscular women so lots of girls are bigger than they used to be. But you're only 19 years old and look at you! Your brain has done so many wonders for your brawn and you're only getting started. I know it! And, no, this isn't just me being your assistant and pumping up your ego. I'm your friend and I truly believe in you."

Laura couldn't help but smile at the kind words but she felt frustration that this woman who was apparently a friend was still a mystery to her. She didn't even know the girl's name.

"Now come on," the mystery woman spun and began walked for the door, her high heels clacking on the hard floor. "Everyone is waiting for you." The Greg that she was used to was around 230 pounds at his biggest, this beast, however, was probably over 300 pounds at least. It was clear by the layer of fat coating his giant muscles that Greg was deep into a bulking phase and that he would definitely shrink down once he dieted.
