Something about that struck Laura as strange, though. Greg had always been a fanatic when it came to muscle building so why should he be any bigger now than before? What else changed when Vanessa became a homebody and Jason and Laura had become jocks?

There was a tiny blonde girl hanging onto Greg (tiny in stature only, her physique was very impressive) that Laura recognized as Greg's girlfriend Sara. While Sara's body had been altered much like everyone else's Sara perhaps had changed the least. She had always been a hardbody but now she had gained perhaps 20 pounds of muscle crossing the gap between fitness model into bodybuilder territory.

Sara grinned, "Thank god you found her, Nikki. Once Laura starts staring at herself in the mirror almost nothing can rip her away."

Nikki. Was that the redhead's name? The tide of memories that had been so constant the past few hours had ebbed and nothing new was coming. Laura grew frustrated and more lost.

"Enough chit chat," Greg said in a voice that was a full octave lower than normal, "we need to get to work."

143211222.title: Laura

choices: "I feel amazing!!"
"I feel the same. I guess it doesn't work."
14322.content:
"Sam, it landed on four." Laura said looking at her Asian friend. Samantha was short and stocky but that was soon to change. Or at least Laura hoped it would. She opened up the Alterations app and navigated to Samantha's profile. A 3D rendering of Samantha clad in her pink sweats and jacket filled the screen and along the side were various bits of data, sliders, and menus.

"So, what do you want me to change?" Laura asked.

Samantha opened her mouth to speak but her words caught in her throat. Then she blushed bright red. "Um, Jason? Would you be willing to wait outside?"

Jason looked confused but then shrugged and left to go watch TV in the living room.

Once they were alone Samantha sighed. "Okay, first of all I'm sick of being so short. Can you make me taller, like five foot eight or nine?"

Laura nodded and began tapping on her phone's screen. She was surprised to see that as she made Sam nearly a foot taller her clothes stretched out as well keeping her body properly covered. The outfit did change a little, though, she saw as it became a little more form fitting which allowed her to see that Samantha's weight was now more evenly spread out across her taller body giving her a more slender figure. Playing around further Laura discovered that she could adjust Samantha's torso to leg ratio giving her longer legs without adjusting her height further. Once she took her finger off the screen the image of Samantha blinked for a moment then her sweatpants changed into tiny pink shorts.

Laura tilted her head to the side. I wonder why her clothes changed.

"Something wrong?" Samantha asked.

"Nope. I've got your height dialed in at five foot nine with legs that go all the way up. What else?"

"Maybe some boobs, I guess," she said putting her hands on her chest. "Nothing too big. Maybe like a C cup or something."

Again Laura made the change on the screen plumping Samantha's avatar's chest up a bit. Just like before there was a quick update to her outfit. The jacket vanished and her sweatshirt was replaced with a tight t-shirt that outlined her new bust.

"Looking good," Laura said. "What else?"

"Well..." Samantha blushed again, this time even brighter than before. "You know how I feel about Jason."

"Sure."

"Are you aware of how he feels about girls with... muscles?"

Laura shook her head. "Muscles? I don't think it's ever come up but with all the meatheads in this town it's not too surprising. You want me to beef you up, girl? Make his head turn?"

"Yeah. Well... yeah, big. I mean, not too big but like obvious. Strong, you know? Sexy, I want-"

"Relax, Sam. I'll make sure you'll leave Jason drooling. I just want to be sure that this is what you want, not just something he wants."

"I want it too."

"Good enough for me." Laura began adjusting the muscle sliders watching as Samantha's body expanded on her phone. She increased her friend's physique little by little watching as muscles developed across her entire form. Her shoulders and chest swelled out while her arms plumped. At the same time her thighs and calves grew at an accelerated rate compared to the rest of her. Laura stopped when Samantha's impending body crossed the divide between athletic and bodybuilder. The readouts told her that Samantha's chest would now measure 38 inches around with 16 inch arms and 25 inch thighs. Her body fat levels were so low that individual strips of sinew were clearly visible giving her an incredibly shredded look. Just like earlier there was another quick update to the avatar's clothes which removed the sleeves from her shirt and pulled the hem up exposing a deeply defined six pack.

"Okay, did you want to take a look at what we have here before I finalize everything?"

Samantha was about to take Laura's phone but then reconsidered and backed away. "No, I'd better not. I might panic and back out. Better if you just do it."

"You're the boss." Laura tapped a button labeled "Apply Changes" and suddenly felt a buzz of electricity crackly through the air. She was about to announce that it seemed to be working when she found herself unable to move. In fact everything around her seemed frozen as well as if time itself had ceased to move. A few moments later Laura could see Samantha's body changing. She grew in all directions at once getting taller, thicker, wider, and bigger by the second. Despite being frozen excitement rushed through her mind now that she realized that the phone actually worked just as it said it did. This was incredible, her life would never be the same again. She could have anything and everything she ever wanted!!

When Samantha's body mirrored the once on her phone her clothes morphed into her new super tight shorts and shirt. Laura marveled at how incredible her friend looked. She even noticed other subtle changes that she hadn't made like Samantha's jet hair was fuller and shinier than before while her face had a new thin layer of make-up despite the fact that she rarely every applied any. She also noticed several additional ear piercings all along Samantha's earlobe and what looked to be a hint of a tattoo on her side just barely poking out beneath her shirt.

An instant later the energy that filled the room seemed to dissipate and Laura was able to move again. At the same time Samantha looked down and gave her arms a cursory flex.

Laura couldn't help but gush. "Oh my god, you look incredible!! How do you feel?"

Samantha looked at Laura and said...
14322.title: Samantha Plus

choices: Laura runs one more test.
Laura decides to change herself.
143222.content:
Samantha flexed her arms, eye popping16 inch biceps swelled into rock hard masses. Then she gave her new boobs a soft squeeze through her shirt. The Asian amazon frowned, "I feel the same. I guess it doesn't work."

"What are you talking about, you're totally different!" Laura shouted. How could Samantha think she was the same after such a drastic transformation? "I mean look at you."

Before Samantha could respond there was a knock at the door. "Can I come in?" It was Jason.

"Sure," Samantha called. "But don't get your hopes up. It looks like this whole thing was a bust."

The door opened and Jason entered. Laura expected him to back up her claim that Samantha had just changed from short and stout to tall and built but she could see on his face right away that her new appearance was old news to him as well.

What the hell is going on? Laura thought to herself. Then she spotted her dresser which had about two dozen photographs taped all around the outside of the mirror. There was one with her and Samantha on the beach, knee deep in the surf, hugging and laughing except it was the new Samantha that was pictured, the one that stood several inches taller than Laura and more than a few pounds heavier. In fact now that she looked around Laura noticed that all of the pictures featuring Samantha had changed to feature the new version.

"Didn't work, huh?" Jason said standing in front of Samantha and putting his hands on her shoulders. He gave a squeeze then moved down to her biceps and squeezed again.

"Nope," Samantha flexed her arms fighting back against Jason's grip. "I guess you're stuck with me looking like this."

"Good thing I love you looking like this." Jason put his hand into the waistband of Samantha's skintight shorts and pulled her towards him. Their bodies collided and they began kissing while Jason's hands grabbed fistfuls of her copious rear.

Laura was smart enough to figure out that the phone must have altered history right along with Samantha's body to account for the changes. This was even better than she could have imagined, she could make whatever change she wanted and the past would go right along with it. She wouldn't have to explain it to anyone as it would just be normal.

As Jason and Samantha continued to make out right in front of her (clearly they were a couple in this reality) Laura noticed that Samantha wasn't the only one who had changed. Jason's clothes had transformed from an overly baggy pants and shirt to a much more properly fitted pair of shorts and a t-shirt, and Jason's muscles had grown as well. Not by very much and he was still pretty skinny but Laura could see some slight development in his calves and his arms. Plus she thought they way his shoulders filled out his shirt was pretty impressive.

Whatever historical change got Samantha to be a bodybuilder must have put Jason in the gym along with her, at least a little. Her attention drifted back to the jumble of photographs looking for further clues. Instead she happened upon a picture of herself in a skimpy bikini. She had to try very hard to keep her jaw from hitting the floor.

I'm sexy! She too was different, more muscular. Her stomach in the photo was etched in tight abdominal muscles while her legs were shapely with plump thighs and bulging calves. Her upper body was still lacking in breast tissue but had beefed up enough to amplify her hourglass figure. She had to admit it, she looked really good.

Laura's hand drifted to her stomach where her fingers found hard bumps beneath her shirt. Her heart leapt with excitement. She discreetly curled her arm and felt the surprisingly large and quite hard bump that formed. This was all too good to be true.

Samantha and Jason ended their embrace. "C'mon baby," Samantha told Jason, "looks like I'll have to grow my muscles the old fashioned way."

Jason nodded. "Sorry to run, Laura, but we've fallen behind on Sam's Instagram feed. We're going to hit the gym to get some new photos to upload. Wanna come?"

"Maybe I'll meet you there later." Laura said. "There's something I want to work on first."

The happy couple said their goodbyes and left at which point Laura went straight back to her phone.

"IT WORKS!!" Her mind raced with the possibilities. Now that she knew it would also change the past she could do whatever she wanted. But she also knew she should remain cautions since she didn't seem to have control over how the past was changed. Maybe another test was in order.
143222.title: Success... in a way.

choices: The test was a huge success.
The test made things worse.
1432221.content:
Now that she was alone Laura took off her shirt and stood before the mirror above her dresser.

"Oh my god!" She looked even better than the picture on her wall would suggest. Six perfectly cut stones lined her stomach, her shoulders were broad and strong, her chest had a faint line bisecting her pectorals. She pressed her palms against her nipples and frowned, she would have liked to have some breasts too but all in good time. Her smile returned when she raised her arms and flexed her biceps. Small but mighty rocks hardened beneath her skin.

"Who would have thought that just a few changes to one person could affect so much? I wonder what else has changed." Laura pulled her shirt back on and looked around her room. Most everything seemed to be about the same, same geeky posters, same video games, even the same mess of clothes on the floor. However when she looked closer there seemed to be a few interesting additions: a pair of free weights on the floor by her bed, workout clothes mixed among her dirty clothes, even a tub of protein powder in the corner by the door.

"Unbelievable!" Laura scooped up her phone and opened her own profile and was greeted by her new body. She was just about to set to work modifying herself when but she paused.

She took a deep breath and steadied her shaking hands. "This could cause some more crazy ripples. Perhaps I need to be scientific and run another test." She desperately wanted to push her body beyond the sexy goddess that Samantha had become but she also knew that lustful frenzy could be her undoing.

Laura sat on her bed at a loss for what to do. She almost didn't trust herself to even make a good decision, her desires could too easily get in her own way. That's when she spotted the die on the floor right where it had landed before Samantha's transformation. Laura picked it up and thought about how strange it was that some things in this reality remained the same while others had changed. She sort of wished she had some way of accessing more of the past here but then she thought the might lose touch with the changes. Sure Samantha was happy with her body but she wasn't as over the moon as she would be if she could remember how short and stubby she'd been just a little while ago.

Laura tossed the die into the air and watched it fall to the floor and roll. It stopped with a single pip on top.

"Alright, Jason. You win this round." Laura opened Jason's profile and was greeted with his new and slightly improved body. "I wonder if there's a way to figure out what he would want to change."

Laura began searching through menus taking time to look over the various features of the app. She eventually came upon a menu that listed various components of Jason's mind including his likes and desires. Though she felt a little like she was prying where she didn't belong Laura dug through Jason's mind, fascinated by what she found. First and foremost she discovered that Samantha had been right: Jason liked muscular women. In fact it seemed that for Jason the bigger the better even up to and beyond what was humanly possible. Similarly he liked huge boobs and super strength. There were lots of other things on the list but they all seemed more normal like "scalp rub," "legs," even "blow job" but scattered throughout were "bodybuilding," "muscle growth," and "penis growth."

Laura grinned, "I have to say I love your kink, Jason." She found a list of Jason's relationships and was not surprised to find that Samantha was right at the top next to the words "intense sexual desire" and "girlfriend." Just below Samantha was Laura's sister Vanessa who was listed as "sexual fantasy" and "crush." Surprisingly Laura even found her own name on the list as "sexual desire" among many other names she didn't recognize like Wendy Lindquist and Shannon Courtney.

On a tab marked "body image" Laura found that even though he was a bit more developed Jason still was not pleased with the way he looked. He considered himself too skinny and wished he could bulk up significantly. He was rather proud of his penis which, Laura discovered, was an astounding ten inches long but he even wanted that to be bigger.

Laura went back to the main page of Jason's profile and was just about to increase his muscle mass just as she had done for Samantha when she paused. Instead she tapped on a menu called "aptitude" and selected "muscle growth." A scale appeared on the screen which showed Jason's natural ability to build muscle. The scale went from 0 to 100 with Jason's natural setting on 12.

"No wonder you're so skinny." Laura said. "You must be working your ass off just to have as much muscle as you do in this reality." For reference she pulled up her brother's profile and found his aptitude for muscle growth was 51 which was listed as "above average." She flipped back to Jason and began increasing his growth ability watching as the heading changed as the number rose. At 40 he was "average," then "above average" like Greg, the 60s were "top level athlete" and the 70s were "extreme." Laura stopped at 85 which was listed as "superhuman growth ability."

Is that too much? What if I went all the way? What's this going to do to him? Should I back up? Questions swirled through Laura's mind. Before she could let any more doubt enter her thoughts she stabbed the "Apply" button.

Just like before the air crackled with electricity then she found herself frozen and unable to move. With no one too watch change Laura tried to focus on changes that were occurring around her as her room altered again but it seemed the changes were more extreme and hard to watch, everything was blurry and out of focus. Finally the energy faded and she was able to move again.
1432221.title: Testing... testing...

choices: Laura puts her strength to the test.
Laura leaves to find Jason.
14322212.content:
At first Laura thought something was wrong with her eyes since it was quite hard to see. She waited several seconds before realizing that the room was simply dark. Looking to her bedroom window she found that her blinds had been replaced with blackout curtains. She opened them enough to let a thick shaft of light in then returned to the mirror.

"Holy shit!" Once again her body had transformed, this time much more dramatically than before. In fact she wasn't sure if she was happy with what she saw. To say she had bulked up was an understatement. Laura's body was enormous but no longer cut and defined she was now big like a powerlifter. Muscle and fat together made her look huge but also soft. She was reminded of her brother when he was going through his bulking phases complaining about how fat he would get after weeks of eating and eating all the time. She hoped that's what was going on here, that she was just in her offseason mode and that cutting calories would bring out the stark definition of the huge muscles that she knew were in there somewhere.

Laura raised an arm and flexed, the 14 inch rock she'd had minutes earlier was now replaced with a much bigger yet much softer-looking 20 inch monstrosity. She gave the muscle a squeeze with her free hand and found the layer of fat to be surprisingly thin and a boulder-like muscle lay just beneath. This gave her reassurance of her might and she found herself welling with power and strength. She tightened her fist and flexed harder causing the sleeve of her t-shirt to scream in protest against her ever swelling arm which drew her attention to her clothes.

Her shirt was shoddy and worn and far too small while her pants were so old and tight they had actually split in a few places succumbing to quads that looked like too much meat stuffed into a sausage casing.

It wasn't just her clothes that were unkempt, though, it was clear that in this universe Laura didn't really bother to take care of her own appearance much. The fact was that she never really did in her own reality but this was much worse: her hair was unwashed and hung down in greasy tangles, her skin was shiny with oil and there were patches of acne across her forehead.

She frowned at her reflection. "One step forward and a few steps back. Still, I'll bet I can do something with this." She thought to herself about how strange it was that she would change so dramatically after altering her friends but not herself.

With thoughts of her friends, and Jason specifically, in the front of her mind Laura's attention was drawn directly to a collection of pictures and magazines in the corner of her room near her bed that seemed to be arranged into a shrine of sorts. The subject of this alter was a man of ungodly muscular development and size. He was impossibly large, each muscle group on his body was swollen to enormous size but none so much as his arms the peaks of which, when flexed, nearly spanned the length of his forearm and touched the fingers of his clenched fist. Laura approached the end table which held a large stack of muscle magazines and was surrounded by carefully cut and pasted pictures up and down the wall. It didn't take long to confirm her suspicions: it was Jason. His body was completely transformed but the face was unmistakable.

Laura picked up the magazine that sat atop the pile and examined the cover. Jason was dressed in a toga that fit snug across his massive chest, keeping his shoulders and arms bare. He was surrounded by muscular women in skimpy string bikinis who pawed at his chest, arms and legs, looking at each other in disbelief. Bold letters across the bottom declared "The God of Muscle Has Arrived!!"

In shock over what she had created Laura drifted to her bed and sat down. She flipped through the magazine until she found the interview with Jason that was advertised on the cover. She quickly devoured the article glad to have found at least some exposition to her new reality. She discovered that Jason had, at an early age, been diagnosed with a rare genetic condition that caused his body to develop muscle at an incredible rate.

"Superhuman," Laura said out loud remembering the label on the Alteration's app.

Jason described a life in which he was always the biggest and strongest kid around even though he wasn't very active. "I've always been pretty lazy," he said in the interview. "Mostly a nerd, really. I mean why workout anyway when my body just gets huge on its own, right?" He went on to talk about how during his high school years his body developed faster than ever before. He said that when he entered high school at 14 he was 5' 5" and right around the 200 pound mark but by the time he graduated he was 6' 1" and 360 pounds.

"You workout now, don't you?" the interviewer asked.

"Yeah," Jason replied. "I actually started in my senior year which is why I got so massive by the end. I'm still pretty lazy, though, so I only hit the gym a few times a month. That along with my diet are more than enough to keep my body growing bigger and bigger all the time."

"How big to you plan to get?"

"I don't think I'll ever stop."

Laura closed the magazine and set it down. She realized that she was covered in sweat and her breathing was shallow and rapid. She moved to stand up but was distracted by a fire in her crotch that turned her legs to jelly. She closed her eyes and moaned while pressing her thighs tightly together. She couldn't remember feeling so horny in all her life, it was dizzying. In fact her hormones felt completely out of control. All at once she felt horny, excited, sad, angry, and thousands of other feelings at once. What was wrong with her?

Laura stood and left her room. She went down stairs with the intention of going to the garage to use Greg's exercise equipment. She wanted to see if the power she felt in her expanded body translated to actual strength. At least then she wouldn't mind looking like a fat lump. As she walked she absentmindedly tensed the muscles of her upper body pushing her shirt to the breaking point then relaxing. She rubbed her hand across her chest and shoulders feeling the stone beneath the blubber.

"Oh! Lulu!"

Laura stopped. She was standing in the kitchen surrounded by her family. Everything had stopped in mid motion and they were staring at her. Something about the look they were all giving her made something deep inside her chest stir. It was her sister that had spoken but no further words came. Laura's parents, off to the side, could hardly look at her while Vanessa and Greg's expressions seemed filled with pity and sadness.

"What?" Laura asked sounding overly annoyed. The fact that she couldn't get her feet under her for more than a minute was aggravating. They were looking at her like she was a freak which only compounded the feeling she already had at her oversized form.

"Nothing," Vanessa said. "It's just… just…" Silence.

Laura huffed and stormed through the kitchen toward the door that lead to the garage. She went in and turned on the light but before she could attack the gym equipment and test her strength a voice spoke from behind her.

"I found your stash."

Laura turned to find Greg's large body nearly filling the doorway completely.

Laura's annoyance grew. "What are you talking about?"

"Don't play dumb, we need to talk about this. We're all really worried about you."

Laura knew this was her chance to glean some information about her new reality but for some reason she no longer had any interest in knowledge. Her muscles were begging to be put to the test, yearning to be pushed to the limit and grow even bigger, stronger. Greg's supposed concern was putting a stop to her. "Look, just leave me alone," she barked.

"No!" Greg had never shouted at her before but instead of being afraid it only boiled Laura's blood further. "Mom and dad are worried. I'm worried. I found the stuff you're taking to bulk up. There's some really dangerous stuff in there. Hell, there's stuff I've never even heard of. Why are you doing this?"

"I said. LEAVE. ME. ALONE." Laura's body was tensing all on its own. Her clothes groaned and snapped from the pressure of her enormous body.

Greg continued. "Do you think this will make him notice you? Do you think he'll suddenly like you if you do this to yourself?"

Something inside Laura snapped. Faster than she would have thought possible she shot forward grabbing Greg by the throat. His 250 pound body was in the air, feet dangling, his face turning red. Laura, not even realizing how easily she was manhandling her big brother turned and slammed his body against the garage wall. It felt so good to use her power she did it again causing cracks to form in the drywall. Greg began to pull at the hand on his throat but couldn't get it to budge. Instead he began to beat on Laura's forearm but the blows did nothing.

Laura spotted a look in Greg's eye that was a mix of fear and confusion and a realization came to her. Words began to flow from her mouth but it was as if someone else was speaking for her: "You didn't know I was stronger than you, huh? Well I am!" To prove her point she squeezed Greg's throat and pressed him harder against the wall. Her shirt could take no more and began to split open across her shoulders, arms and chest. Tears welled in Greg's eyes and began to flow down his face.

She continued to tell him off, "I don't care what you found or what you think any of it means. I've become more powerful than you can imagine and there's no chance I'm stopping now. Those dangerous drugs you've never heard of are turning me into a goddess so don't come in here thinking you can push me around. I'll make you wish you were never born."

Greg's eyes rolled back in his head as he passed out. Laura let go of him and he slumped to the floor in a heap. Part of her was terrified of what she had just done but the delight over her strength overwhelmed any and all concerns.
14322212.title: Defying Expectations

choices: Provide Jasmine with upgrades
Searching Samantha to see what she looked like
Upgrade herself to overcome Jason
143222122.content:
Laura’s mind was racing as she stared at Greg’s unconscious body lying on the ground. Part of her wanted to ignore him and start working out to see how strong she really was. But another part of her now desperately wanted to find Jason. His super human muscles turned her on and she just had to get closer. After all, from the profile she pulled up on Jason previously, he was really into muscle women. And she was a really big girl now! Part of her wondered about Samantha, but for some reason she felt a tug toward Jason and apparently unresolved desires. Pulling up her phone, a note had popped up, showing Jason’s schedule. Scrunching her face, Laura opened it up, realizing quickly that she was already obsessing over Jason, keeping track of his every move apparently. Smiling, her breath quickened when she saw it was one of rare days at the gym, but was also acting as a photo shoot.

Shooting a parting glance at Greg, Laura found a bike that she somehow knew was hers and was soon peddling toward the gym, enjoying the feeling of power that came from legs that propelled her forward quickly. Several stares came her way along the route and they weren’t happy looks. Some were dumbfounded and others leaned more toward disgust. Laura saw them, but didn’t care. By the time she made it to the gym, she could tell by the video trucks that Jason was on schedule and already in the gym. Parking her bike, she strode in, but was stopped at the front desk. A fit man, likely a trainer and someone who obviously knew her, spoke loudly.

“Laura! The gym is closed for Jason’s shoot. He’ll be done in about an hour.”

Laura paused. She must be a member. That made sense, since this was Greg’s gym. Anger rose up and she was about to pounce all over him, but she paused momentarily and let out a labored breath.

“I was just hoping to watch and maybe talk to Jason.”

The trainer gave her a blank stare, but then seemed to soften. “Alright, fine. You can watch. But don’t get in the way of anything or you’ll be asked to leave.”

Laura nodded. Why was her wanting to simply watch such a big deal? She saw other people milling around. Not wanting to wait in case he changed his mind, Laura moved quickly toward the bright lights, certain that was where the shoot was happening. Moving carefully around several people and bumping a few, most everyone gave her curious and then slightly disgusted glances. One who gave her a longer look was Jason’s twin sister Jasmine. She was done up nicely as well and was very fit, but not up to Laura’s frame. She had an outfit that appeared to have something about Jason on the front. Laura smirked briefly. Jasmine had always been fitter and stronger than Jason and generally gave him a very hard time. By changing Jason, Laura had obviously changed that dynamic. Now he was the one lording his superior physique over her and she did not appear thrilled. Not really wanting to interact with Jasmine right now, Laura took another path toward the lights.

Finally getting close, Laura stared at Jason, all 6 foot 1 and 375 pounds of gigantic muscles. He was at a cable machine; performing hero curls as the cameras ran. Two bikini girls were on either side behind him. Laura grunted with anger at their high heels, overly done make-up and hair and their lack of muscle tone. They were barely fit enough to enter a bikini contest. As Jason completed another curl, Laura stared over at the weights, apparently modified for him. He was using about two thirds of the stack, but was curling 600 pounds with each arm! That really DID make him super human! Laura watched as he struggled to complete the curl, bulging his arms to 36 inches of glory, or maybe even a bit larger! Quickly Sara tried the front door and found it locked. Playing a hunch she gripped the knob tightly and began pushing down with all of her might. It was mere seconds before the knob surrendered and broke off. Sara shook the lock mechanism loose and pushed the door open. The door to the basement weight room was also locked, but the knob on this door was even weaker than the previous one. She opened the door and began descending the stairs.

She could see Greg and Laura struggling against each other, and neither seemed to have heard Sara breaking in. Sara let out a gasp as Laura moved aside and Sara could see that not only was her boyfriend now chained to a weight bench with duct tape, but his body had been reduced to that of a child.

Sara watched as Greg crossed his legs over a member that was far too large for his body.

“Yeah,” Laura laughed, “that huge thing you gave yourself looks a bit ridiculous on you now. I’ll fix it though.

Sara quietly reached the bottom of the stairs and slipped her shoes off. Then she took slow steps toward Laura preying that the young girl wouldn’t turn around or that former big lug wouldn’t give her position away. Laura was deep in her villainous monologue trying to make Greg understand just how much Greg had ruined her life and now she was going to have her revenge - blah, blah, blah. All Sara knew was she had to get that phone away from Laura who was already about to set up a password lock to keep others out of her phone.

”I’m going to make you watch me grow bigger than you just were because I know it will hurt you to see it.“ Laura was telling her shriveled brother.

Laura shrugged, ”I don’t know, probably whatever I feel like.”

“That’s what you think, runt,” Sara said from behind Laura. Before the smaller girl could even turn around Sara’s meaty python arm was wrapped around her chest, pinning her arms to her sides. Sara easily plucked the phone from Laura’s grip and slid it into the waist of her skirt for safe keeping.

Once the phone was out of her hand again Laura went ballistic. Once more her dream was slipping away. She was screaming, spitting, and biting but Sara’s grip was far too strong. Sara picked Laura up off the ground and carried her under one arm easily. She used her free hand to pick up the duct tape and, biting the end in her mouth, pulled a long strip away from the roll.

Sara set Laura on the floor next to her brother and bound her hands to the weight bar next to Greg’s.

“Awesome job, babe.” Greg said in his new higher voice. Seeing his expanded girlfriend with her new muscles still didn’t quite convince him that she should have gone as far as she had, but her increased strength proved more than useful. “Now cut me loose so I can change back.”

15311221211.content:
Jason was crossing the hall from the bathroom to his bedroom while checking Laura's phone. The message he saw made him stop, though:

HEREDITY ADJUSTMENTS CALCULATED.
COMENSING HISTORICAL ALTERATIONS

Before he could even begin to wonder what that meant Jason's vision became blurry. He put his hands out to steady himself on the hallway wall but even the material of the house around him felt like it was in flux. He tried to focus on what was in front of him which was a family portrait from two years ago. If he stopped and stared really hard he could make out his mom and dad standing just behind him and his sister who sat on step stools. Another wave of haziness washed over his eyes and Jason blinked several times trying to keep the photo on the wall in focus.

His sight cleared slightly but something was different. It took him longer than it should have to realize that the family pictured were now all bodybuilders. And not just any bodybuilders, all four people were far and away the largest and most muscular people Jason had ever seen. Jason's will power fled from his body and he collapsed into unconsciousness but just before he fell he noticed that it was still a family portrait: him, his sister and his parents were the bodybuilders pictured.

As Jason slept shockwaves emanated out around the world and back through time as Laura's magical phone rewrote Jason's family history to account for his new size and strength. Going back dozens of generations on his father's side genetic codes were altered and enhanced to include a predisposition to muscle density and size that was borderline superhuman while his mother's lineage was composed of super athletes with perfectly sculpted physiques and uncanny abilities. Jason was now a descendant of gold medal Olympians and circus freaks, monsters and champions. In the distant past on his father's side of the family was a man so large he was though to have been the basis of the Paul Bunyan myth while on his mother's was a prima ballerina so powerful and adept that she had pulled off combinations of moves previously thought impossible, moves that had never been replicated now nearly a century later; and she had done it all with ease.

Everything around Jason was changing to account for what he had done to himself. His parents were now quite famous; his father was an action movie star who had hit the scene riding the coattails of actors like Arnold Schwarzenegger and Sylvester Stallone but who had surpassed both in terms of box office gross as well as physical size and strength. In fact Jason's father now, at the age of 44, was larger than Arnold had ever been. Jason's mother had grown up competing in numerous sports and excelling at each. When she was 16 she won 6 gold medals at the Summer Olympics in track and field events, then won 11 gold when she was 20. She soon turned to modeling then opened a network of gyms across the world.

The house Jason now slept in reflected this new level of fame and wealth; no longer merely a house it was now an estate that sprawled across the hills overlooking his old neighborhood as well as the ocean. His bedroom was now a bit larger than the living room of his former home and overlooked the property behind the family mansion which consisted of a sprawling garden and topiary, an enormous pool with a fountain in the center, tennis and basketball courts, and, of course, a state of the art gym.

The was the world that Jason awoke into minutes later. He rolled out of his king sized bed and stood. Though his surroundings had drastically a floor-to-ceiling mirror on the far wall which reflected his naked body and showed him that his monstrous physique remained. Unable to resist the urge Jason flexed a few more times practicing triggering his expansion ability and giving his muscles that extra 25% swell.

Still unsure of exactly what had occurred Jason began exploring his new surroundings. Beside the mirror was a door that led to an oversized bathroom. The walls and fixtures were made of solid marble and also seemed to have been made a bit larger or higher to compensate for his abnormal size. Inside the bathroom was another door that led to a huge walk-in closet filled with outfits for any occasion all matched to his current size. Jason dressed himself in some red cotton shorts and a blue t-shirt with the Superman "S" across the chest. It seemed an appropriate outfit and though it was definitely his size the shorts were still tight at the hem over his thighs and the shirt felt snug across his chest and arms.

Back in his bedroom Jason opened another door. This one led to a rumpus room with giant couches and easy chairs, a projector aimed at a huge screen with several gaming consoles nearby. There was a pool table and a bar and on the far end large glass doors opened on a balcony that overlooked the ocean. Jason stepped in and found the walls were lined with framed posters of himself from what were likely magazine shoots. In each his oiled body was pumped to insane size and almost all of the images had him being groped or embraced by one or more gorgeous women. The poster directly to his right caught his attention. In it he was dressed up as Wolverine, the Hugh Jackman version, with denim pants that somehow fit his massive legs (though just barely) and a dirty white tank top that was torn in various places. His fist was raised in front of his body and Wolverine's trademark claws extended from Jason's knuckles. What really caught Jason's eye, though, was the girl that was clinging to his body. She was a drop dead sexy redhead who was dressed as Jean Grey in her Phoenix costume: green bodysuit with the gold phoenix symbol, gold thigh-high boots and a matching sash around the waist. The girl was tall, and the boots added a good 4 inches to her height but the top of her head still only came up to the upper half of Jason's chest, and though her body was completely covered the suit was tight enough for Jason to see that this girl was busty and buff. Packed into the suit she had large D-cup breasts atop a shelf of thick pecs and surrounded by broad shoulders and thick arms.

Glancing around the room one last time he realized that the sexy redhead showed up in several of the posters, there was even one that featured her by herself. In that one she sat in a red leather chair and wore black lingerie. Her wild red hair spilled down over one shoulder while her eyes smoldered with sex. Now that Jason could see her exposed flesh he saw just how incredibly developed her muscles were. The girl was shredded; washboard abs, vascular arms, and defined quads that fought to split her black stockings open. Why did this girl appear in so many photos? Was she a friend? Perhaps just someone Jason worked with often. Either way he hoped he'd get to meet her.

"I don’t know what that phone did but I like it!" Jason said. The phone! Was it still around? Jason rushed back to his bed and began searching for Laura's magical iPhone. Suddenly a chime caught his attention from the far side of the bed. He looked up and spotted an iPhone on the night stand. Rushing around to pick it up he discovered it was…

153112212111.content:
Jason rushed around to the other side of the bed and picked up the phone. His heart sank when the model and wallpaper revealed it was merely his own. The screen displayed a calendar message: "GYM TIME!!"

He looked out through the giant picture window in his room at the family gym on the far side of the garden. "I guess I shouldn't be too upset that Laura's phone is gone. My life is looking pretty awesome as it is."

There was one last door that Jason hadn't opened yet and as he suspected it led to the hallway. He navigated the enormous house eventually finding his way down a large stairway in the foyer then going through the back out to the patio. Along the way he passed a photo of his parents and saw the new versions of them for the first time. This particular picture was taken at the beach on the pier. Jason's father was shirtless and clad only in tight swim trunks. His body was massive and pumped while his mother, rather a voluptuous and buff version of her, clung to his chest.

"Way to go, you guys!" Jason said aloud to the picture. His brain was beginning to connect the pieces and suddenly the strange message he'd received about a "heredity feature" was making a lot more sense. The idea that a simple phone could alter history on such a crazy scale was incredible but he had no choice but to believe since the evidence was everywhere around him.

Inside the gym Jason was surprised by how sparse things were. There were only a select few stations and even they were like no gym equipment Jason had ever seen before. Everything was very minimalist and seemed to be stripped down to its bare essence. Seats and benches were crafted from huge slabs of steel or some other metal that seemed to form out of the floor. There were no weights at all and instead all the equipment was attached to super thick cables that ran into holes in the floor. They didn't even have any free weights but instead had a pair of bars off to the side with similar cables vanishing into the ground.

There were large HD screens all around the room, several on each wall so that where ever you were you had a clear view of one. These screens lit up with the words:

"E.M.M.A. Online
Please verify ID"

At the same time a sultry female voice spoke from speakers all around the room. "Welcome. Please log in to verify identification."

Jason glanced around but didn't see any terminal for him to log in at. Instead he looked closely at one of the screens. "Emma?" he read aloud.

The disembodied woman spoke again. "Voice ident confirmed. Welcome back, Jason. You're looking bigger than ever." Letters flew around the screen so that "EMMA" now lined the left side of the screen going down. Each letter completed with a word so that Jason now saw:

Enhanced
Muscle
Management
Assistant

Next a computer generated woman appeared in the space on the right side of the screen. She was a long, limber blonde that looked modeled after a Barbie doll except with copious amounts of muscle added in for good measure. The virtual workout assistant was clad in a pink halter top that showed off copious cleavage and matching workout shorts that extended maybe an inch or two beyond her crotch.

"Uh, thanks… um.. Emma." Jason couldn't help but wonder who in the world cold have programmed this sort of vixen as an assistant.

"You're welcome, of course. How about we pump you up even more?" Emma placed a hand on top of a cantaloupe sized breast. Was she actually excited at the idea of Jason getting bigger? Maybe this was all a part of a motivation routine. If so it was working; even though she wasn't real Jason wanted to show off for his new friend.

Jason chuckled. "Sure, why not?"

"Today is chest and shoulders. Maybe if we have time we can give your arms a good pump too. Ready? How about we start with the bench press?"

Jason made his way to the station that most approximated a bench and lay down on the metal slab. There was a gel covering for added comfort but not much. Fortunately his invulnerable body didn't mind. He slid up under a bar that, like all the others, was attached to cables that went directly into the floor.

"Let's just start with a warm up. I've got you set to 6,500 pounds. How about you give me 10 good reps?"

I'm warming up with more than three and a half tons? That's insane! Jason gripped the bar and pushed. To his amazement he was able to press the weight with relative ease. Emma counted out a rhythm for Jason to follow to keep him from pounding out the reps too fast and then he re-racked the bar.

"Great, but now let's try something more challenging. How about another set at 5 tons? Think you're man enough?"

Jason felt like he could bench press a mountain. "Bring it on!" Jason heard a whirring of gears below him as whatever mechanism was hidden beneath the floor increased the resistance to 10,000 pounds. He sucked in a deep breath and began working. This set was much tougher but still manageable. Emma worked him through set after set constantly increasing the weight to work Jason to maximum effect. It was quickly clear to Jason that Emma was programmed to work his body with maximum efficiency; she knew exactly what he needed even more so than he did.

"Alright, big guy. Think you're ready to set a new personal best? Let's do one last set to fail with 15,000 pounds."

"What's my previous best?" Jason asked between gasping breaths. He was really sweating and he could feel his pumped up chest ready to rip his shirt apart.

Emma's face filled the various monitors around the room. "Getting forgetful are we? Or are you just stalling?"

Jason couldn't believe the personality Emma had. "How about forgetful?"

Did she look skeptical? Whoever programmed her must have been a genius. "Okay, stud. Your previous best is 7 tons. We're going to tack half a ton onto that, deal?"

Jason lay back and took hold of the bar once more. "Sure, if you'd stop your gabbing for one minute."

Emma shook her head. "You're lucky you're so sexy; otherwise I'd be mad."

Jason made it to 3 reps quickly but felt fatigue set in immediately after. His arms were shaking as he forced himself through the 4th rep. As he began the 5th his muscle expansion ability triggered on its own causing his chest and arms to swell ripping through his shirt as if it were paper. The feel of his muscles growing gave him the energy needed to power through another 2 presses, but he was sure that was all he had.

"Come on!" Emma was yelling all around him. "You can do it, one more. You're a fucking beast!"

Something about hearing a computer swear gave him the encouragement he needed to complete 8 before racking the bar one last time. Jason stood and approached the nearest mirror. His chest was a heaving, quivering mass of muscle. He pulled the remnants of his shirt off of his torso and ran his hand over his engorged pecs.

"I don't know why you even bother to wear a shirt." Emma said.

"I wear shirts so I can burst out of them." Jason said.

Emma moaned with approval. "Alright then. Take a quick rest then I'm really going to work that body of yours."

"Sounds good to me." Jason said.

The next 3 hours flew by in a blur of sweat, grunts, and thousands of pounds lifted. In the end Jason felt both more powerful than he'd ever felt in his life and also like he wanted to melt into a puddle on the floor. He toweled the sweat from his body and thanked Emma for the workout.

"My pleasure, of course," she purred. "I've taken the liberty of synching our next appointment to your phone. In the meantime I've notified the chef that you're ready to eat. Will you take your meal in the grotto, as usual?"

Jason's stomach grumbled at the mention of food. He hadn't realized just how hungry he was. But where was the grotto? Perhaps he should shoot for someplace he'd actually be able to find lest his meal never be found.

"Um.. actually I was thinking about eating poolside today."

Emma raised an eyebrow. "Ooooh! Thinking of taking a dip? Remember to wait after eating. You wouldn't want to get a cramp, would you?"

"I wish you could join me," Jason said, truthfully. He was beginning to miss the company of a real person and decided that after he ate he would head out into the real world, perhaps he could even find Laura. Or the redhead.

"Me too," Emma said, "but I guess-"

The virtual woman stopped as the door to the gym opened and someone else entered. Jason looked and saw it was Jasmine. Just like the rest of his family in this new reality she had also received quite a boost to her physical appearance. She took after their mother and then some and came complete with radical curves and a bosom even more ample than she'd had before. G-cup breasts were smooshed into a black sports bra and she wore black lycra pants over insanely thick thighs.

Jason still had the height advantage by a foot but that now put his sister at a statuesque 6' 6" in height. Her build was bordering on bodybuilder but despite her height and broad shoulders there was a sleekness about her that made him think of a swimmer or a gymnast. He realized that if he weren’t so tall he probably would have a different impression of her but he loved that he was still the physically superior sibling.

"What are you still doing here?" Jasmine practically spat at him.

"What does it look like?" Jason said. He was still feeling the high from dominating her earlier as well as from his workout. How dare she question him. "I'm building my awesome manly muscles even bigger. You're not jealous are you?"

Jason hit a double biceps pose and expanded his 41 inch arms to their full 52 inch glory. "Don't you wish you could pump up muscle like this, you runt?"

Jasmine's face turned bright red.

Seconds later Vanessa's response came back: "Cool. Don't move, I'll be right there! :D"

Jason stared at his phone, his brain was going a mile a minute trying to put the pieces together. Why in the world would Vanessa come to his place? When did he even get her phone number entered into his phone?

Two minutes later Vanessa came walking around the side of the house to join Jason on the patio. Immediately Jason noticed something was different about Vanessa, actually several things were different. He had never seen her in glasses before but now she wore a thick rimmed pair. She also wore no makeup and had her hair pulled back in a simple pony tail. "Yeah," Jason had no idea what she was talking about.

"Have you read that Swamp Thing trade I let you borrow yet."

Jason's confusion grew. "You didn't lend that to me, Laura did."

Vanessa furrowed her brow behind her glasses. "Why in the world would Laura lend out my comics? She never even reads them since she spends all her time with Captain Chunkhead."

Jason was at a loss. "Who?"

Now Vanessa looked concerned. "What do you mean 'who?' Major Musclehead. Lunk Rockhard? Greg? My brother? The muscle phenom and Gods gift to bodybuilders everywhere?"

They sat in silence for a moment while Jason tried to wrap his head around what was happening.

What if he really had changed things? Maybe things had changed enough to where Laura hung out with Greg and Vanessa was somehow the nerd of the family. Did that make sense? Was it possible? Here she was looking the part and talking about comics, should he wait and see what he could find out? Maybe he should just come clean about Laura's phone and see if Vanessa had any answers.

"Found what?" Vanessa asked.

Jason knew what he wanted to do.

"Jason, what are you doing? You're killing him. Stop!"

Jason turned from the slumped body of Brad with his teeth bared and his fist cocked back. The owner of the voice was a cute girl, probably six inches shorter than Jason with frizzy red hair pulled back in a ponytail. She flinched away from Jason and he blinked before lowering his fist.

"Oh my God what happened?" She rushed to Brads side.

Jason sniffed and wiped at his nose with the back of his hand. He could tell he was smearing blood on his face. "It was self defense," he said finally. He sneered at two jocks that were standing uncertainly at the end of the sidewalk leading up to Laura's porch. "Real manly of you fellas to send the girl first."

"Self defense? You don't have a scratch on you."

"Brad said he was going to kick my ass, look at me. If I didn't taken the first swing I wouldn't survive one hit from that meathead." Jason sniffed again. For some reason his nose was bleeding he noted. Or maybe it was just runny and it was mixing with the blood he had smeared on his face. It was hard to tell.

The girl shook her head and pulled out an iPhone. "I'm calling an ambulance," she declared. Jason stood uncertainly wondering if he should stick around or leave. Before he could decide what he was going to do Laura's front door flew open and Laura stood there with an expression of horror. Her eyes went from Brads limp body cradled in the redheads arms to Jason and before he could blink Laura had dashed across the porch and lifted Jason off the ground by the front of his shirt. His feet swayed inches off the ground and he sniffed again. He was pretty sure it was a nosebleed, he could taste blood in the back of his throat.

"Jason, what the fuck did you do?" Laura was growling like an animal. Fine, that made it easier to hate her. Jason was pretty sure he wanted to come out of this hating her. It would make what felt like her betraying him easier to deal with.

"He threatened to kick my ass and I decided this time I wouldn't let him. I've had enough of him and his jock bullshit." Jason wasn't sure what jock bullshit specifically he was referencing but if it involved him getting his ass kicked then he was dedicated to the concept of having had enough of it. "Speaking of which why don't you tell those two hiding behind your mailbox that it's safe to come out now that you're here to protect them."

"Have you gone insane?" Laura shook Jason hard, his ears were ringing and his neck ached like he had suffered whiplash when she stopped. "It looks like you tried to kill him."

"That's right, you're bigger and stronger than me, might makes right doesn't it?" Jason slapped Laura across the face hard, leaving a bloody handprint on her cheek. "Don't ever shake me like that again Laura or I'll make you kill me."

Laura dropped him and Jason stumbled as his feet hit the ground. She stepped back, balling her fist and Jason braced himself for the inevitable punch but the squawk of sirens nearby distracted her. "Nikki, stay with Brad," Laura hissed. "If you don't walk away right now Jason you will regret it."

Jason sniffed and rubbed at his nose again. "I already regret ever having come here." He spat a gob of bloody phlegm on the ground between him and Laura before he turned and walked slowly away. He glared at the two jocks as he walked past, relishing how they flinched away from him. His sneer dimmed as he realized that in addition to an ambulance a police car was also pulling up to the scene.

15331111211211.content:
Jason sat alone in the holding cell staring down at his bloody hands. He felt numb; he truly didn't care that he was in jail. He'd lost his best friend, he'd lost his incredible muscles, he'd lost his ability to give a damn.  Frankly he was fine with that. Loosing all hope brought a certain freedom with it. He was surprisingly anxious to find what was coming next for him, this was fun. Really it wasn't even his life after all and it wasn't like things could get much worse. 

Jason lay sideways on the bench and closed his eyes. He thought back to the beating he had delivered to Brad. It had felt so good to let loose and wail on that asshole. It had been so easy, too. Brad had gone down with practically one punch. And Jason didn't even think it was a very good punch, sure it found its mark, but his form was terrible. He knew almost nothing about fighting except that he wasn't very good at it. 

A few hours went by and Jason was awakened by the sound of an officer opening the cell door. Jason slowly got to his feet. He saw that the officer was holding a pair of handcuffs so Jason held his hands out. The cop shook his head and told Jason to put them behind his back. 

"Oh," Jason smirked, "you want to do me from behind. Sure thing boss." Jason turned around and stuck his butt out with his wrists together.

"You're a punk," the cop said and pushed Jason against the wall. "And you'll get what's coming to you. But not from me." he cuffed Jason making sure to get them nice and tight. 

The officer lead Jason down a hall to an interrogation room where a very serious looking detective was waiting. The cop shoved Jason into a chair across a table from the detective. Jason eyeballed his reflection in the one-way glass that ran along the wall and wondered if they had an audience. 

"The boy you beat is in intensive care." The detective told Jason. "He's bleeding internally and his doctors aren't sure they can stop it."

Jason considered this for a moment. "He threatened me."

"So you came at him with a weapon? He was unarmed."

"A weapon? What are you-"

"What did you use, a baseball bat, a golf club?"

"I didn't use anything. I punched him and kicked him. That's it!"

The detective stood up. "Then explain to me how you managed to break 22 bones in his body and leave him bleeding to death on the ground with just your hands and feet! Look at your hands, they're not even bruised. I've worked here 20 years and I've never seen a beating that bad that didn't involve some kind of foreign object. No scrawny kid like you could ever do that to Brad without resorting to cowardly tactics. I knew Brad, I know how tough he is, and no runt like you could ever take him down with your bare hands. Unless, of course, you're hiding some pretty big muscles in those twiggy arms of yours."

Jason didn't like where this was going. Clearly this guy had some connection to Brad Taylor, perhaps he was even a relative, and he was looking to exact some kind of revenge. Thats when his last statement rang in Jason's ears. Was it true that he'd administered a beating far beyond his own capabilities? Was it possible that he did in fact have hidden muscles? The iPhone app said he was creating a paradox, what if this was a part of it and his body was small but still carried the strength of the massive muscles he had given himself before everything went wrong. That could really change things. But maybe he'd just gotten lucky and was able to get some good hits in. He had to test his theory and find out quickly before this detective lost control and decided to put him in the hospital too. 

Jason grabbed the cuffs around his wrist and began pulling his hands apart with all his might. He put began twisting and straining the short chain that kept his hands bound together.

Jason nearly gasped when the chain between the handcuffs snapped. He hadn’t even begun to try very hard either. He kept his hands together and tried not to let his expression give away his emotions while inside his heart was doing backflips.

I’m strong, he thought. Not just strong, super strong! This is gonna be good. This asshole is going to be sorry he ever picked on me. He’s just like Brad, he thinks that just because I’m smaller than he is he can push me around. Oh, this is going to be good!

The detective stood up and walked around the table to where Jason sat. Then he leaned down and put his face right up to Jason’s.

“I’ll tell you what I think happened,” the man said. Jason smelled hints of alcohol on his breath and began to wonder if this guy was even supposed to be here today or did he just show up when he learned that they had the guy who had put Brad in the hospital. “I think you snuck up on Brad and clocked him with a baseball bat. I don’t think he ever saw you coming. I think you’re a goddamn coward.”

Jason laughed loudly in the detective’s face. “You’re calling me a coward? You’re the one threatening the skinny kid in the handcuffs. But that’s ok because I know something you don’t know.”

‘Oh yeah? What’s that?”

“I am stronger than anyone you’ve ever met, and I’ve already broken out of these pathetic shackles.”

The detective gave Jason a quizzical look then Jason reached up, grabbed him by his hair, and slammed his head into the metal table. The force of the man’s skull left a deep crater in the table’s surface. His eyes rolled back in their sockets and a spurt of blood ran down his temple. Jason then gripped his would be attacker around the throat and, standing up, lifted the man into the air. Jason felt good. This was so easy; he could overpower anyone. No one would ever be able to take advantage of him again.

“I didn’t sucker punch Brad.” Jason told his victim. “He saw me coming. But he didn’t know what he was getting into. Just like you didn’t. You thought you’d just come in here and teach me a lesson. He’s just a scrawny little kid, I can take him, right? Wrong. I’m guessing no one is watching since what you’re doing is very illegal, so there’s no one to help you now. Not that they could.” Jason tossed the 220 pound detective across the room and into the far wall like he was tossing a rag doll.

“I’m going home.” He told the nearly unconscious man on the floor. “If you’re smart you’ll just let this go. If you come after me you’ll be sorry.” Jason walked up to the locked door and gave it a solid kick. The lock shattered and the heavy door swung open.

Jason made his way down the hall. He didn’t really know his way around the police station, but he wasn’t too concerned. Most police officers he’d come across were arrogant and he figured they would assume that anyone walking the halls couldn’t be a prisoner. He just kept his head up and tried to look like he knew where he was going. On his way out he passed three different groups of police officers and not one of them broke conversation to ask him who he was or where he was going. With a huge grin Jason walked right past the front desk and out the door.

Jason strode down the street a free man with superhuman strength. His brain was working overtime thinking about what he should do next. There were so many people he wanted to pay a visit to, so many who had made fun of him or bullied him over the years. In the mean time, though, he thought it would be best to go home and clean up first and maybe get some rest. He suddenly felt very tired.

A few minutes later his path home took him past the local gym. Looking in he could see a group of guys at the back pumping iron. They were all friends of Brad’s and most had bullied or tormented him at one time or another. Perhaps a little payback would feel good.

The following morning Jason awoke groggy and sore as if he'd been working out hard all night. He stumbled out of bed and into the bathroom. Once he flipped on the light and caught a glimpse of himself in the mirror all the tiredness swept out of his body and his eyes opened wide. 

"Woah!" he said taking in his reflection. "First I'm strong and now I'm buff." Somehow his body had expanded overnight and he was now sporting the physique of a middleweight bodybuilder. His nightshirt, usually large on his thin frame, was now plastered to his expanded pecs and sinewy shoulders. Jason raised his arm and laughed when his bicep bursted out giving him an arm 17 inches around. "What the hell is going on?"

Jason went to the bathroom and returned to his room. Everything looked exactly the same as it had the night before. So why had he grown? Jason pulled some of his clothes out of his closet hoping that perhaps the historical function of the iPhone app was working and had given him some bigger clothes to go with his bigger body but alas, no. He went through article after article looking for something that would fit him finally settling on a pair of gym shorts he'd never worn and a promotional t-shirt for the movie "Serenity" he'd gotten but was always too big to wear. Now it fit just a little tight around the chest and arms. 

Jason admired his physique in the mirror. In one night he had outgrown Brad or any of his bully buddies. He was a little bummed that they would no longer underestimate his power, but he had to admit he looked good. He lifted the right leg of his shorts and flexed his thigh. Thick, powerful quads swelled forth brimming with untold strength. "Well," he said aloud, "I may not be as big as I was before this whole paradox thing began, but I'm not about to look a gift horse in the mouth." Jason thought for a second then continued, "Maybe that's what's going on. Maybe the paradox is righting itself and the other reality, my reality, is bleeding through. That would also explain why I was much stronger than I looked yesterday. And I have to admit, I feel even stronger today." Jason put his hands on his hips and flexed his chest. He smiled when a symphony of pops and snaps erupted from his strained shirt as the seems were overtaxed by his thick chest. 

"Well, whatever's going on things seem to be turning around for me." Jason looked out his bedroom window at the beach. It was still early and people were just arriving and laying out their towels. "Well, no sense in sitting around inside all day." He slipped his shoes on (a little snug, but still fit) and left the house.

He curled the car's back half a few times watching as his biceps leapt to attention, the large vein running across the peak was bulging out ready to burst through his skin. "I am stronger. This just keeps getting stranger."

Just then a shadow fell over him and a voice spoke from his right. "Jason! Is that you? How did this happen?!?"

An angry Nikki takes Jason away
15331111211211111111111211112.content:
Nikki and Jason walked along the beach slowly, enjoying the moment. Jason couldn’t help but feel that he was now big and strong enough to match Laura and her students. In fact, he had asked one of the men from the gym to check Laura out; and while she had grown larger, Nikki was now as big as Laura and from what he knew, as strong as well. This gave him even more confidence as they walked forward. He had wanted to have the strength advantage. Then when he apologized she would see it wasn’t from fear.

He had also heard that Laura had set up some new weight machines as her growing legion of girls needed larger weights and more area to work out. The spy had told him of a large machine with cables and 10 ton plates mainly used for chest and bicep workouts. Jason smiled at the idea that he could now lift twice as much as Laura.

But in the back of mind he was still worried, as if his actions from before the last shift were still unresolved. Memories flashed in and out too quickly to make any sense, but it would always affect his attitude momentarily as if the old Jason; the cocky, too proud Jason, was looking to get out. Jason sighed, his nervousness of confronting Laura mounting. He wanted it to go well. Nikki tossed her long, gorgeous red hair over her massive shoulder and smiled up at Jason.

“You’ve been awfully quiet.”

Jason’s sullen expression softened a bit. “Well it is Laura.”

Nikki smiled weakly and nodded. “I know. But you’ll be fine. And I’m here to back you up.”

Jason sighed and his apprehension built. He smiled back and released his hold of Nikki’s hand as they neared the work-out area. He could see several large figures ahead and the large weight machine towered above anything else on the beach. As they drew closer he felt a familiar and unwelcome trickle from his nose move down his upper lip. His head hurt as he could hear Nikki say something, but the words were muffled. Her voice had a troubled sound instead of the calm, steadying one from moments earlier. His brain told him to turn around, but his legs kept moving forward until they finally reached the small group of girls.

One of the girls said something that he couldn’t quite make out. She looked young and pretty, with long brown hair and clean, youthful features. A familiar voice from off to the side said something that was still a bit muffled, but he could make out the words. And they didn’t sound all that sincere.

“Look girls, it’s the strongest MAN in the world. And he’s been working out! Look how big he is.”

The teen-age girl, who looked to be all of 5 foot 2 walked up and pushed her hand out with a bright smile on her face. Her blue eyes sparkled. Her figure was still shimmering, but he could see that it was large and full of muscle. Blinking his eyes he absently reached out and took her hand.

It was then that he realized that the girl wasn’t just looking for a handshake, but was testing her strength on the strongest man in the world. He wasn’t sure what this new reality held, but he still believed that he was strong enough to at least handle this girl. So as she squeezed down, he did the same and for a moment he felt he was more than holding his own. But as the shimmering cleared the girl’s body morphed forward into the biggest, most muscular form he could have ever imagined for a girl that tall. She had on a tight pink athletic top that looked strained against the raging muscles pumping out from her massive pectorals and incredibly wide back. He grunted as she increased the pressure and it soon felt like his hand was in a vice! She smirked as Jason was slowly driven down to one knee.

“Come on Jason, at least give me a challenge! How does it look for the strongest man in the world to be out muscled by a 14 year old girl?”

Jason grunted as he flexed all of his massive muscles in an attempt to fight back. He could hear Nikki complain behind him, but he also heard Laura step in between them and laugh, giving encouragement to the girl.

“Keep going Taylor, show him who’s boss.”

Jason sunk lower and then yelped in pain as the girl squeezed down harder and started cracking the bones in his hand! With a laugh of her own, Taylor pulled her arm back hard. Jason’s 780 bulk jerked to the side as she yanked so hard that his shoulder was dislocated with a terrible tearing sound. He fell onto his side, but Taylor held her grip, pulled him back up and shot a wicked punch to his side with a dull crack. Jason groaned in pain. With a girlish giggle Taylor finally released her death grip and allowed Jason to fall to the sand. As Taylor backed up, Nikki ran to his side, gently pulling him up so he could sit.

Taylor stood there with a wide grin on her beautiful young face as she flexed up her muscles into a raging mass of Amazonian might. Her arms were off to her sides as she clenched her fists, pushing out mounds of obscene muscles across her fantastical arms so big that they didn’t look real! Her biceps ballooned out like two watermelons, with her peaks pushed out well beyond her flexed fists. Her shoulders and gently flexed back had to be five feet wide and her chest bulled out over two ungodly feet in front of her with huge slabs of muscle writhing, surging and pumping up larger with each breath! Her top strained and groaned against the super powered muscles raging against it. Her exposed abs were uncannily narrow, yet etched with thick, detailed muscle blocks. Her legs mashed against each other with overloaded muscles that engulfed her knees and bloated out as large as his mighty quads in what should be an impossible display of supercharged muscle. Jason could hear her muscles crackle as she tensed them and twisted her small bare foot in the sand to jut out her calf as big a basketball!

Jason could hear Laura off to the side as he stared up at the teenage powerhouse.

“Why don’t you show him how much you can curl Taylor.”

Taylor smiled and took a few steps over toward the machine. Jason gulped as he got a look at the weights. They were no longer the 10 ton plates, but were now 50 tons plates! Another gigantically muscled girl who he recognized as Hanna set the machine and smiled as Taylor reached down with one small hand and gripped the bar. Jason’s eyes widened as he watched 4 plates sail into the air as Taylor curled 200 tons! Her bicep shot up into a mountain of girl muscle up as the peak pushed up over her fist, over the top of her head and six inches beyond that! And as she pumped the weight a few times her massive muscle crystallized harder as the muscle fibers pushed to the surface into jagged chunks of steel. Her bicep was as large, if not larger than his 80 inch monsters! And just when he thought he had seen enough Laura spoke again.

“Add more weight Hanna, let’s see what Taylor can do. After all, that’s only twice what the strongest man in the world can curl. And Taylor’s biceps are barely up to his size.”

Taylor held the hand down as Jason could hear the additional weights clank loudly. Taylor looked up worried, but from behind him Laura must have given her a confident nod as Taylor’s expression changed to a determined look. Apparently if Laura thought you could do something, you could do it! With a look of pain, Taylor began to pull upward, causing large veins to blast to the surface across her overloaded arm, pushing more and more super strength into her muscles until she was pulling up 6 plates! She was about to curl 300 tons with one arm! And as she did so her bicep expanded up to seemingly impossible height and her tricep bulled down a foot and half deep. As the weight rose higher and Taylor let out a short yell her bicep pushed upward and outward as more and more muscle blasted forth! Her watermelon sized bicep had added a bowling ball sized muscle on top as thick veins and additional slabs of muscles ground outward until her gigantic bicep pumped up into a wall of girl muscle 3 and half feet tall and over 100 inches around! Taylor screamed out as she completed the curl and then let the weight drop back down.

Other girls cheered around Jason as Hanna moved over to congratulate Taylor. Jason felt the ground shake as Laura finally moved around and stood in front of him. To call her gigantic didn’t do her justice. The Hulk would look small next to her! The only things she had on was a tiny black bikini bottom and two black skull and cross bone labeled pasties on her twin beech ball sized chest as if to indicate that there weren’t any clothes that could contain her raging muscles. With her arms out wide it was clear that her back and shoulders were as wide as she was tall. And she wasn’t even flexing. She smiled down cruelly.

Jason could only imagine what else Laura had in store for him. He was about to find out as..
