choices: Already making decent gains
Making super human gains
153311112112111111111112111122.content:
Laura stood over Jason and Nikki, casting a humongous shadow down on them.

“Thanks for coming down Jason. I was having some trouble motivating Taylor, but you were able to push her to the next level!”

Nikki looked up with daggers. “That wasn’t why he came down here!”

Laura laughed. “Always defending him. Always holding back your own gains to make him look and feel good. I really don’t care why you two came down here, but as you can see, he’s never going to hold ME back again!”

Laura pulled her right arm up and her bicep exploded up to the top of her head just by raising her forearm a bit above horizontal. Her bicep then expanded up and up and up with bursts of superhuman expansion until her mighty arm was 120 inches around of the biggest, strongest muscle ever dreamed. Her bicep had unnatural terrifying mounds, cuts and grooves that throbbed outward in disregard for all known biology. Jason’s eyes widened with fear. How could he ever compete against that?

Nikki grunted and pulled Jason up as he groaned in pain. “Well that still doesn’t give you the right to have one of your girls do this to Jason!”

Laura chuckled. “Ha! Don’t worry Nikki, we’re done with Jason. You two are free to go.”

Nikki reached around Jason’s bulk as best she could and forced him to walk away as quickly. Jason gasped with pain and soon Nikki was carrying him like a child toward a nearby hospital as the jeers and laughs of the girls mocked him from behind. Nikki was near tears as they entered the emergency room and the doctors and nurses took x-ray and wrapped up his hand, shoulder and upper body. She sat next him in the small emergency room area as they waited for him to be discharged. Nikki had hardly said anything since she had pulled Jason up from the beach. He looked at her sad face.

“Have I been holding you back?”

Nikki sat up straight, her large figure tensed and her muscles swelled, pushing her massive chest out to stress the front of the sun dress.

“Why would think that?”

“Laura said that as though it were a well known fact. If that’s true; if the, uh, old me was making you feel uncomfortable or if my ego was getting in the way, please don’t think that I still feel that way now.”

Nikki looked down, tears forming in her eyes. Jason smiled softly and continued.

“I’m a giant Nikki. I can work out and grow these incredible muscles and pump super human weights. But it seems that the more I do, the greater Laura and now even her crew seem to grow in response. And you’ve stood by me throughout.”

He paused as Nikki looked back up with a smile on her face. She wiped away a stray tear. He reached out with his good hand and gently held her soft, narrow chin.

“I had good intentions. You know I did. But there is no way I can work out for a while now.”

Nikki reached up with own hand to gently take his. She smiled as her eyes narrowed.

“But I can.”

He nodded his head. He now knew that everything he said was right. Nikki did hold back to please him. Likely even to the point where she wasn’t even aware she was doing it. In this new reality, she was a bit bigger, but still not as big as he was. He also suspected that she wasn’t as strong. But that was about to change as Nikki stood up, her muscles rolling across her body in waves, shifting and pulling the large sun dress to the point of rupture.

“Nobody messes with my boyfriend and gets away with it!”

Jason chuckled and then winced in pain. Nikki quickly sat back down, feeling a bit embarrassed.

Once he was discharged, they ordered a taxi, which for them had to be a van. They stopped by the drug store to pick up his prescription and were soon home. Nikki mothered over Jason to the point where he gently asked her to take care of herself. She smiled and stood back up.

“Don’t think you’re going to get away from my care Jason!”

Jason snickered. “The doctor said I need rest, not 24 hour nurse service.”

Nikki placed her hands on her hips and gave him a not very convincing angry look. “You’ll take what I give you mister!”

He put his good hand out and laughed. “OK, OK! I’ll do whatever you say.”

Nikki chuckled. “You’d better!”

She sighed and pulled off her sun dress. Justin shook his head as he admired her fantastic curves and her equally fantastic muscles. Muscles he was quite sure were about to the get the biggest workout they had ever seen. Nikki smiled and climbed into bed, gently snuggling up to his good side.

“We’ll have to cut down on the sex for a while too I’m afraid.”

Jason sighed. “I know. But you can put that energy into your work-outs instead.”

Nikki stared at the ceiling for a while before responding. “Yeah. Work-outs.”

Sleep for Jason was difficult even with the pain pills. When he woke up in the morning he wasn’t surprised that he slept later than usual and that Nikki was gone. He sat up gingerly and getting up he saw a note tacked to the door.

“Off to the gym. Relax and I’ll be back by the afternoon.”

Jason smiled. There was no way he was going miss watching her work out. The shower was slow and painful and getting dressed was even worse. By the time he was ready to leave he needed another pain pill. He sat down and relaxed for a short while and then slipped on some shoes and headed out the door. As long he walked slowly he didn’t put any extra stress on his cracked ribs. Once he reached the gym he opened the door and saw Nikki working out. A quick glance at the weights told him that she was.
153311112112111111111112111122.title: An angry Nikki takes Jason away

choices: Nikki continues on her previous day's pace
She can't find a supply of her protien drinks.  Is someone sabotaging her?
1533111121121111111111121111222.content:
A large gym bag full of protein drinks sat beside the weight bench, a weight bench whose bar was loaded down with 10% more weight than he remembered being her max for bench press. The huge weights caused the massive bar to sag heavily at either end. Beneath the bar, lay the heaving mass of muscle he referred to as his girlfriend, and while she wasn't nearly as big as any of Laura's students, let alone the behemoth that Laura had become, she was clearly packing on muscle at an incredible rate.

Her dainty hands grabbed the bar and cleanly pushed up with only the softest of grunts and then slowly the weight lowered to her bulging chest and pushed back up. The motion was clean, smooth, practiced, and seemingly without great stress. As he watched, she repeated the motion fourteen more times and only on the last couple did she show any real strain, having to pause briefly before pushing back up. Each rep, he swore he could see her chest swell ever so slightly, see her sports bra strain slightly more with each rep to contain her massive pecs and heaving bosom. In spite of his pain, he felt turned on by the display.

A hand reached down and grabbed one of the protein bottles, popped off the top and brought it to her lips. Seconds later, the 64 oz container was empty and her hands were back on the bar pushing, working her arms and especially her chest. Another 18 reps later and a second protein drink disappeared, then 21 reps and a third bottle disappeared.

She sat up seemingly oblivious to Jason's presence, a steely gaze of pure determination on her face. Bringing her arms together, she flexed her chest causing the mountains of pectoral mass to erupt in thick grooves and veiny striations. Nodding to herself, she moved over and grabbed a massive dumbell and began doing arm curls, pumping her biceps thicker and thicker with each rep.

As she worked, Jason carefully maneuvered and grabbed one of the massive empty bottles. On closer inspection they looked a lot like one gallon milk bottles, but the label showed that each one contained nearly a kilogram of protein and well over 2000 calories of pure carbohydrates. Her heard a loud clang as one of the massive dumbells hit the ground and she walked right by him and chugged another gallon.

He watched her for hours repeating this same procedure with exercise after exercise, stressing every muscle group with superhuman exercise, always drinking her protein solution after every set. At long last, she was out of her drink and seemingly snapped out of her trance. Every muscle on her body was pumped to insane proportions, denser, harder, larger by incredible margins compared to where she was when she left him this morning. She finally seemed to take notice of Jason, now sitting on the bench in the corner.

Strolling over to him, her workout clothes strained through small rips and tears to contain her expanding form. "Sorry, I didn't notice you. How long have you been here?"

Half-smiling, he answered, "A few hours. You looked ... possessed."

"I kinda was, in a sense. Anyway, tomorrow I'm bringing more protein drink. It's nothing but 12 hours a day of workouts until I'm satisfied."

"When will that be?"

"When I can show Laura that she can't treat you like that."

Jason helped her clean up, pack up, and together they went home.

The next day ...

choices: Laura forgives Jason. Friendships are reborn!!
Laura doesn't forgive Jason. Hannah, Kim, and Laura attack Jason and Nikki.
153311112112111111111112112.content:
After much thought Jason decided that he had to apologize to Laura. It may not do any good, but it felt like the right thing to do. He kissed Nikki on the forehead. 

"Honey," he whispered, "there's something I have to do."

She sat up and looked at him. 

"I have to apologize to Laura for being a jerk."

Nikki sat quietly for a long time looking into Jason's eyes. Finally she nodded. "If that's what you think is best. She probably won't be too happy to see you."

"Oh, I'm sure she would love another chance to humiliate me."

"That's what I mean. If you apologize you take the wind out of her sails and steal her fun. I'm coming with you." Nikki got out of bed and pulled on a pair of spandex shorts and a red bikini top. 

Jason pulled his shorts back on and found a shirt to replace the one that had been torn off of his body. When he threw the ripped shirt away he saw several other torn garments in the trash and laughed to himself; it seamed that it was a common occurrence to rip clothing off in this house. 

The super sized pair left the apartment together and strolled along the beach. Jason had asked if Nikki knew where to find Laura and she had assured him that she would still be at the beach work out area. 

"She camps there all day. Even if she's not working out she'll be training her followers." Nikki had said. 

As they walked Jason soaked in the stares from passersby. He loved the way he and Nikki commanded such awestruck looks and he didn't even mind that he was the smaller of the pair. As they walked he moved closer to Nikki and wrapped his arm around her middle (as far as he could, anyway) and held her warm body tight. She smiled at him. 

"You don't have to do this. I mean, you don't owe her anything." Nikki said. 

"It's the right thing to do. If she wants to hold a grudge beyond this that's on her. But I'm going to clear my conscious."

They walked together enjoying the afternoon sun for almost half an hour. Jason didn't realize how far he'd run this morning, but the work out area was farther away than he had thought. Finally he spotted Laura and her two friends standing in the fenced off area surrounded by enormous weights. 

As they approached Jason recognized Hannah, the 16 year old who had shown him up earlier. Now the blond beauty was off on her own doing leg lifts with steel plates the size of monster truck tires. Her quads were pumped to obscene size and as she moved through each repetition she let out a guttural yell that echoed across the beach. Jason could hardly believe that the huge girl was only 16.

Meanwhile Laura was working with the other girl who had been spectating earlier. She had dark hair and olive colored skin and was no less beautiful than Hannah. She wore a black tank top that had been torn off at the bottom revealing deeply etched washboard abs. Her lower half was clad in a black bikini bottom that was pulled tight over thick glutes. The dark haired girl stood with her eyes closed and her arms straight out away from her body. Laura was walking around her speaking and occasionally whispering in her ear. 

"What's she doing?" Jason asked. 

"She's teaching that girl how to expand her muscles. So much of it is a mind over matter thing. It comes down to the proper genetics coupled with the right knowledge. It was just a fluke that Laura learned how to do it, now she'll teach anyone if she thinks you're worthy."

As they watched Laura stopped and stood in front of the girl. "Now, do it!!" Laura yelled and the girl tensed her fists and curled her arms inward flexing her biceps. 

Jason was impressed with the girl's musculature. She was not nearly as large as Hannah, but could still out muscle any professional bodybuilder out there. When she flexed her arms 25 inch biceps sprouted to life. Laura wasn't pleased, though, because she yelled for the girl to try again. 

The girl straightened her arms and flexed again, but there was no change. Again Laura ordered the girl to try again. And again. And again. Over and over Laura barked at the girl who was beginning to sweat and a worried look crossed her face. She kept trying becoming more and more frantic until her eyes opened wide and Jason recognized the look of clarity. With a monumental scream the girl curled her arms once last time and this time they expanded well beyond 25 inches. 

"Whoa!" Nikki said. "I've never seen anyone with that much expansion ability right off the bat. Not even Laura, not even close. I don't think she can grow that much now!"

Jason was speechless. The girl's arms had exploded with so much muscle that it had nearly doubled in size. This girls arm looked like it had even outgrown Nikki's 45 inch bazookas. The girl examined her monstrous arms with satisfaction and pride. She allowed them to shrink back down again before flexing them back to ridiculous size again. She relaxed her flex once more and then closed her eyes again. A moment later every muscle on her body expanded all at once in a symphony of muscle growth. Her shirt split open revealing a bikini top to match her bottom, but even that was having trouble hanging on as her chest plowed forward until it was a wall 2 feet thick. The girl went from being really big to beyond enormous. Even Nikki, in her expanded form, couldn't compete with this giant. The girl held her body in its expanded form and walked around the work out area with a devilish grin on her face. As she completed a full circuit she passed Laura who slapped the girl on her butt. 

"That's my girl! I knew you would be a beast." Laura shouted. 

"This isn't good." Nikki told Jason. "I've never seen anyone gain full control so quickly and her baseline expansion is incredible. If she works at it she can up her expansion ability to untold extremes."

"What are you trying to say?" Jason asked. All of this was so strange to him. 

"I'm saying that Laura has created a monster. This girl will be bigger than anyone before you know it. She is more of a genetic freak than Laura is."

Jason sighed, he was tired of worrying about just how big these ladies could get. He just wanted to get on with his current mission. "Good for her. Let's get this over with." He approached Laura who greeted his arrival with a glare. 

"Well," Laura said with a smug grin, "I didn't expect you back so soon." Then she looked at Nikki, "And you, I didn't think I'd ever see you at all. I see you've outgrown tiny here. Does he give you shit about it? Does he beg you to slow down so he can keep up?"

Nikki spoke slowly and through gritted teeth. "Not once."

"Hmm, well I'm sure he'll get there. To what do I owe the honor?" 

Jason stepped forward and look Laura square in the eye. "I'm sorry."

Laura seemed surprised by this. "What?"

"I was a real jerk to you in the past. You didn't deserve that. I was wrong, I feel awful. And I'm sorry."

Laura looked suspicious. She glanced to the side at Nikki, "Did you put him up to this?"

Nikki shook her head. "This is all him. I tried to talk him out of it."

Laura chuckled at this. Just then her dark haired student approached. For the first time Jason got a good look at her face. She looked Japanese, and had hazel almond shaped eyes. Her facial features were delicate and perfect, she was an astounding beauty. She had allowed her muscles to relax back to their original size, but she still commanded respect with her movements. 

"Is there a problem here?" she asked. 

Laura smiled at her. "We're fine, Kimberly. Can you go spot Hannah? I don't think she's tried to bench that much before."

Kim nodded and left the trio. Laura looked back to Jason as if sizing him up. "I could never figure you out," she said. 

"There's nothing to figure out," Jason told her extending his hand for Laura to shake. "I've been through a lot of strangeness in the last few days and I realized that I lost a really good friend for no good reason. I just hope that you can forgive me."
153311112112111111111112112.title: It's Worth a Shot

choices: Head over to work out with Laura
Stop by our old gym first
1533111121121111111111121121.content:
Laura stood there for a moment looking skeptical. She sighed once, then twice as she decided whether to accept this out of the blue apology or toss his ass into the ocean. A third sigh caused her shoulders to slump ever so slightly and she looked to the side.

“Fine. I accept your apology. But don’t think one simple apology can erase all of the things you’ve done to me.”

She paused and looked back at a relieved but still sorrowful looking Jason. She then looked over at Nikki. “And what about you?”

Nikki gave Laura a stern look. “What about me?”

Laura grunted. “Are you in a forgiving mood as well?”

Nikki held her gaze. “We’ll see.”

Laura rolled her eyes. “Well OK. Hell of reunion. Is there anything else I can do for you two?”

Jason licked his lips. “Can we work out together? I mean, uh, the three of us.”

Laura nearly choked. Nikki’s eyes widened and she turned to look at Jason as through her were nuts. Laura paused, laughed and shook her head.

“Sure, why not. But not today. Come back tomorrow morning. I’m expecting more weights this afternoon and I need to finish up with Hanna and Kim.”

Jason sighed. This was going as well as could have expected. As he and Nikki started to turn away Laura spoke with low controlled tones.

“And don’t think for a moment that I can’t keep up with you now. I’ve had quite a while to refine the strength building techniques. And some of my girls are even more talented than you ever were.”

With that Laura turned away and Nikki had to pull Jason away to get him to start walking back to her apartment. Nikki sighed and snuggled up as they slowly walked the beach. After a while Jason looked down at Nikki and bit his lower lip.

“So what do you think?”

Nikki kept looking ahead. “About what?”

“About everything. You seemed awfully concerned about Kimberly. And I’m guessing you’d be equally concerned about Hanna. How many girls is she training?”

“I’m not quite sure. At least ten. It was in the news a few weeks ago. Laura had started looking for girls with unnatural strength and convinced them to work out with her. Now girls search her out. The strange thing is there aren’t any boys who seem to have the abilities we have. It’s already starting to change the dynamic of high school and college sports in the area. And now I’m afraid she’s might be right about her ability to increase her strength on pace with you. I can only imagine if Kim or Hanna can become stronger faster than you. And add that to their ability to expand their muscles…. They’d be unstoppable.”

Jason nodded as he slowly started to share her concerns. The more he knew about this reality the stranger and more worrisome it felt. “And what about you?”

“What about me?”

Jason stopped so he could look her over. “Did I really ever ask you to slow down? To try and let me keep up?”

Nikki’s smile weakened his knees. She was radiant against the setting sun and her red hair sparkled against the rays. She blinked her green eyes, reached up and pecked him on the cheek.

“Does it really matter now? You know I’m bigger than you and we were still together. And since you stopping working out a while ago, I may be stronger than you to boot. So what does that tell you?”

Jason sighed and returned her smile. “Everything I need to know.”

Nikki nodded. “Good. Because there are a few things you and Laura don’t know.”

Jason furrowed his brow. “Like what?”

“I’ve figured out how to increase the effectiveness of my work-outs as well. That’s one of the reasons I only need to work out no more than once a week. I doubt I’m up to your abilities, I’m not really sure. So if Laura is, that really makes me nervous. And I’ve always kept tabs on Laura. I still don’t trust her anymore.”

Jason and Nikki started walking again. “So do you still want to work out with Laura tomorrow?”

Nikki smiled ruefully. “Of course. You know the old saying. Keep your friends close….”

Jason grunted. “You really don’t see Laura as an enemy do you?”

“Think about it Jason. We’re all super strong and capable of growing even stronger. Our muscles are so dense that we’re nearly bullet proof. Laura is putting together a growing group of like minded supergirls. What do you think she has planned?”

Jason stopped again. He had never considered any of this. He looked at Nikki who had remained almost unnervingly calm. “I don’t know. What DOES she have planned?”

Nikki gave him a gentle tug to keep them walking. “I’m not sure. That’s why we’re going to work out with her tomorrow.”

Jason shook his head. Just a few short hours ago he was the strongest person on earth. Now as far as he could tell he may not even be in the top ten. They stopped and picked up some Chinese dinner. Nikki paid for it without pause as Jason realized his wallet was quite empty. He felt weird about that and said so, but Nikki brushed him off. More questions he would need answers he thought. They returned to Nikki’s apartment and ate dinner with Jason asking more benign questions about the reality as he tried to catch up with things. As Nikki stood up to toss out the empty boxes, Jason stood up with a smile on his face.

“So you’re stronger than me now, huh?”

Nikki cocked her head to the side. “Yeah. At least I think so.”

Jason sat down and putting his elbow on the table put his arm out. “Prove it.”

Nikki giggled and sat down across from him. “Your funeral tough guy!”

As they locked arms, Jason flexed up his mighty bicep into a rock hard 31 inch mass of he-muscle. Nikki smiled wickedly and flexed up her bicep into a rock hard 35 inch mass of she-muscle, not bothering to pull in her expanding ability just yet.

“Any time you’re ready Jason.”

As they fought for position, Jason looked up into Nikki’s beautiful eyes and nearly lost the match right there. Shaking his head he figured he’s better keep his attention on the match and stared at their arms. Once he did he concentrated and was ready to go.

Jason started pushing hard and veins started rising across his super strong arm and he was soon pushing Nikki’s arm down a few inches. His confidence raised, he kept up the pressure, plowing all of his formidable super strength against Nikki. He got her arm way down when he could feel her grip tighten causing him to let out a pained grunt. He looked to see that Nikki’s bicep was growing larger, harder and tighter as his progress was halted. But he had the advantage now and he started to roll his shoulder try and push her down further. Nikki responded with another hard flex, pushing her bicep up to her full 42 inch power packed girth, applying additional pressure and causing Jason’s eyes to tear up. Nikki breathed hard through her grit teeth.

choices: Jason talks to Colin
Jason decides to ignore Colin
15331111211212.content:
Jason was shoved unceremoniously into the local jails holding cell. The door clanged shut behind him with a note of finality that he should have found chilling but instead wrote off as cliched. He rubbed his wrists where the handcuffs had left marks and looked around. The only other occupant of the holding cell was a boy about his own age with long unkempt hair, a black t-shirt with the logo of some heavy metal band and jeans with gaping holes in the knees. The other boys eyes widened as he looked at the blood stained apparition in front of him. "Jesus Christ, did you kill somebody?"

Jason shrugged. "I don't think so, just beat the shit out of him."

"Huh," the boy seemed to consider this. "Anyone I might know?" He asked finally.

"Brad Taylor."

Jason was surprised when the other boy let out a short barking laugh. "Good for you, that bloody git had it coming. Colin, Colin Frazer," the boy offered his hand and Jason shook it. It was interesting that Colin didn't seem to care that he now had semi dried blood sticking to his hands. "Do you smoke mate?" Colin asked taking a cigarette out of a crumpled pack and lighting up. He waggled the pack at Jason who took one.

"Don't know, never tried it."

"Good enough time to give it try then," Colin lit the smoke and Jason coughed but kept going. The smoke bit into his lungs but seemed to steady the mild shaking he had noticed in his hands the last few minutes.

"You'll get used to it," Colin offered. "So why did you beat the shit of old Brad? I'm sure there's a good story behind it."

"What are you in for?" Jason asked, ignoring Colin's question.

"Five finger discount. Got nicked at the mall lifting a CD. Or two... or three," Colin grinned. "But that's not as interesting as whatever led you here all covered in Brad Taylors blood now is it?"
15331111211212.title: Among thieves

choices: Jason goes back home with his mom
Jason ditches his mom
153311112112121.content:
Jason took another drag on the cigarette and spat a bloody gob of phlegm on the floor before sitting down. "You know Laura Friedman?"

Colin nodded enthusiastically, "One of the best sets of tits in town, of course I know who she is."

"We used to be friends, then she got stuck up and shitty with me. I went by her place to," Jason shrugged, "hell I'm not really sure why I went by." He knocked ash off his smoke and took another drag. "We argued, she kicked me out, then Brad showed up and threatened to kick my ass. I punched him first and he never even fought back."

"One punch? You took out Brad Taylor in one punch?"

"Nah," Jason shook his head and took another drag. Colin laughed as Jason had another coughing fit. "Nah," Jason continued when he got his breath back. "I think I broke his nose with the first punch, kicked him in the crotch, punched in the mouth, after that I sort of lost track." Jason shrugged as Colin let out a low whistle.

"Well friend, remind me never to piss you off." The two chatted for a while until an officer arrived and unlocked the cell door.

"Sullivan, you're bail has been posted. Get out here."

"Ta," Colin waved. "See you around mate." Jason waved.

He wasn't surprised that his mother was the one who had bailed him out. He wasn't even back to the car yet and her shrieking was driving him up the wall, "Fuck this, lock me back in," he muttered to himself under his breath.

Jason leaned his head back and closed his eyes, trying to tune his mom out but failing. He answered her questions morosely hoping she would get bored and leave him alone. "No mom, I didn't get hurt. Yea the other guy started it. No I don't have a criminal record now, I have to go to court later though. I don't think the other guy is dead, they would have told me if I was getting booked for murder. Yea I'm fine, all this blood is from the other guy. No I didn't stab him, I punched him a lot and probably kicked him a few times. No, I don't have the court date yet. I did it because he said he was gonna kick my ass again. Yea it was the same guy who beat me up before."

They finally arrived home and his mom seemed to have calmed down significantly now that she knew he wasn't a convicted felon yet. Jason excused himself and went to his room, he was surprised to see that his walls were covered with pictures and posters of Laura, his lip curled with distaste as he recalled her calling him a stalker. "Look like she was right. What kind of pathetic fuck am I in this reality?" Jason began methodically taking the pictures and posters down, when he was done he tossed them in the closet and slammed the door.

He sat on the edge of his bed and pulled his phone out. It had been taken away from him when he got to jail and he hadn't had a chance to check it since he got it back.

"Two missed calls?" Jason was surprised to see who they were from.
1533111121121211.title: Home again home again jiggity jig

choices: Jason calls Nikki in the morning
Jason does something else in the morning.
15331111211212112.content:
Jason looked at the missed calls then shrugged and dialed Nikki back.

"Oh my God are you ok? Where are you?" Nikki had picked up before even a full ring.

"I'm fine," Jason cleared his throat. "I just got home."

"Oh thank God," Nikki let out a sigh of relief. "I was so worried. Brad didn't hurt you did he?"

"No, no," Jason stifled the urge to chuckle. "He said he was going to kick my ass again and I just sort of snapped. I figured if I didn't get the first punch in he would just demolish me. I sort of flipped out and didn't really think about when I should stop punching."

"Oohh," Nikki's voice sounded sincerely saddened. "I can't blame you for that, I really can't. Not after what he did to you. But Jason, Laura is pissed at you, really really pissed."

"Screw Laura," Jason barked.

"What?" Nikki sounded startled.

"I said screw Laura," Jason said with less venom. "I can't believe the way she treated me today, even before Brad showed up. Screw her," he said again.

"So does this mean?" Nikki didn't finish asking the question but there was a current of expectancy and hope in her voice.

"I'm not sure what it means yet," Jason said honestly. "My head is messed up right now, I need some time to think."

"Oh," Nikki said flatly, with what sounded like disappointment. "Ok, I can understand that," she said after a lengthy silence dragged by. "You'll call me?" The hope was back.

"Yea, I'll give you a call later, maybe tomorrow."

"Alright," Nikki hesitated, as though there was something she wanted to say but couldn't make up her mind whether or not she wanted to say it. "Good bye Jason," she said softly.

"Bye Nikki." Jason looked at the phone after he had hung up and sighed. He had no idea what was going on and it was making him angry. It seemed like his life was now a pitiful wreck, but it didn't have to stay that way. He could do anything he wanted. It felt like he had a blank slate to work with, he was under no obligation to follow whatever path he was on in this reality. Jason fell asleep thinking about what he would do differently starting tomorrow.
15331111211212112.title: Nikki

Jason excuses himself and wanders the mall solo
153311112112121122.content:
Jason wake up early, his sleep had been fitful and broken, once the sun was up he was wide awake and he cursed softly as he rolled out of bed. His mom wasn't up yet, after the panic she had been in last night he like the idea of leaving before she was awake. He showered, dressed and grabbed a bagel quickly and quietly before heading out.

He wandered aimlessly, realizing after a moment that by habit he was walking right to Laura's house. He almost detoured to the beach because Laura never went there but really, with the body she had in this reality? She probably lived at the beach. Jason turned on his heel and decided he was going to the mall. Indoors, opposite end of town from the beach, he hopped on a bus and tried to avoid looking at anyone during the ride. He was surprised when someone thumped him on the shoulder.

"Oi mate," Jason looked up to see Colin. He had just boarded the bus and he flopped into the seat ahead of Jasons. A short, thin blonde with too much hairspray sat next to him. "Jason, this is me girl Wendy. Wendy, this is the bloke I was telling you about who beat the piss out of Brad last night." Jason nodded and Wendy offered a bored wave in return. "What are you up to today?"

"Heading to the mall."

"Same."

"Colin," Jason interrupted. "I have to ask, what's up with the accent?"

Colin smirked, "I get that one a lot. My family is from London. Well technically I am as well but I was too young to remember it. But you can't live in the same place with your mum, dad and older sister without picking it up a bit. I also have a younger sister but she avoids having anything to do with us, especially the accent."

"I like your accent," Wendy said.

"Of course you do love," Colin kissed her.

Jason rolled his eyes. He couldn't picture himself being that gooshy in public if he had a girl. The bus finally reached the mall and the small group disembarked with a handful of other shoppers.

1533111121121211221.content:
Jason walked with Colin and Wendy towards the mall entrance while Colin and talked with great animation about music and his own desire to start a band. "You should join up, you can play bass or guitar or something."

"I don't know how to play bass or guitar," Jason protested.

"You can learn, you have what you can't learn, attitude. You'd be a natural."

Jason shook his head, "I'll think about it."

"Don't think too long, I have a mate who has a decent bass rig he wants to sell, on the cheap you know," Colin winked and Jason understood instantly that what Colin was saying was that it was stolen. When they reached the mall Colin seemed to assume that Jason had joined them for the day and Jason couldn't think of any reason to protest the assumption. He liked Colin. He wasn't sure if he had any friends in this reality since Laura had ditched them, if not then he had to make some new ones. And he was fully expecting it when Colin pulled him to the side and whispered, "Right mate, this is the store I got pinched at yesterday. The clerk is going to watch me like a hawk, Wendy will nick the CDs and hand them off to you, walk out and no one is the wiser, you ready?"

"What about the sensors?" Jason asked referring to the anti theft devices in the CD cases.

"Don't worry, Wendy is a pro, you'll be fine," Colin slapped Jason on the shoulder when he nodded. "I knew I could count on you." Colin swaggered into the music store with Wendy following not far behind. Jason waited a minute before following them in.

As predicted the clerk kept an eagle eye on Colin who loitered near the front of the store, handling every piece of merchandise he could reach. Wendy had walked lazily around the store and Jason wasn't sure if she had grabbed whatever it was they were planning on stealing. He hung out near the back flipping aimlessly through the rack of posters until Wendy passed behind him and whispered, "Here." He took the CDs without looking looking at her and stuffed down the front of his pants untucking his shirt to hide any strange angles. "Good work, now leave." Wendy hadn't even stopped walking, she drifted to a clothes rack and stopped. Jason flipped through a couple more posters then slowly walked out of the store. Colin was in the middle of arguing with the clerk about his right to shop in the store as Jason passed. As Jason walked through the theft detection system his heart was hammering in his chest. He was relieved when it was clear that the alarm was not going off. Jason grinned and kept walking until he reached the food court and sat on a bench in front of the fountain where he could watch the music store entrance. Colin wasn't far behind him and it was only a couple minutes before Wendy joined them.

"Good work mate," Colin thumped Jason on the shoulder and took the CDs that Jason handed to him. "Is there any "shopping" you need us to help you with while we're here?"

Jason grinned, "Not today, maybe next time." Jason's voice trailed off as he caught sight of Laura on the other side of the food court. Nikki was with her as well as two other girls he didn't recognize. Nikki recognized him right away and waved, which he returned without thinking.
1533111121121211221.title: Jason hangs out with Colin and his girlfriend

Jason lets her go
15331111211212112211.content:
Jason watched Nikki and Laura have some sort of exchange before Nikki turned on her heel and walked towards him. Laura glared at Jason like she would murder him is she could and he found it easy to return the expression if not the sentiment. "I thought you said you were going to call me today," Nikki said as she approached. She looked as though she wanted to greet Jason with a hug but he remained sitting so she awkwardly let her arms drop. Who was Nikki and how did he know her Jason wondered once again?

"Today isn't over yet, I was gonna call," Jason said finally. Nikki looked Colin and Wendy with obvious distaste. "Nikki, this is my friend Colin and his girlfriend Wendy. Colin, Wendy, this is Nikki."

Colin looked over Nikki, lingering on her well presented C-Cup breasts and smiled. "Pleased to meet you." Wendy gave her habitual bored wave.

"Hi," Nikki turned back to Jason, "Can I talk to you for a minute? Alone?" She said with a pointed look at Colin and Wendy.

Jason sighed and stood up, letting Nikki lead him a few yards away by his elbow. "What's up?"

"What's up? Is that all you have to say to me?" Nikki folder her arms under her arms under her breasts, pushing them up and out and Jason had to make an effort not to stare into her cleavage. "Who are you hanging around with?"

“Colin and Wendy? I thought we just covered that.” Nikki rolled her eyes and sighed with exasperation. “I met him in jail last night,” Jason said with a shrug.

“You met him in jail last night? So what now? You’re BFF? Jason what are you doing?”

“Whoa, why would you care who I hang out with? And it’s not like I had people rushing to visit with me while I was locked up.”

Nikki glowered. “That’s not fair, I called you. And I kept Laura from…” Nikki trailed off and looked away.

“From what? Forming a lynch mob? Beating the crap out of me herself? That should be hard for her, she’s only three times my size.”

“Jason what has happened to you? Where did this whole tough guy thing come from? Do you have any idea how freaked out everyone is? You almost killed Brad. ALMOST. KILLED. HIM.” She repeated. “I get that you’re pissed off at Laura, and for whatever reason she’s pissed off at you. But I had always thought…”

“What?”

Nikki glared at him. “You exactly know what. I had always thought if you could ever get over your thing with Laura that we could try again; maybe make it work this time. But no, forget it,” tears started streaming down Nikkis cheeks and Jason was momentarily speechless. “I’m not going to do this to myself anymore. Grow up Jason,” She wiped at her eyes, smearing mascara and makeup. “Just grow up.”

“Nikki, I…”

“I said forget it Jason,” Nikki said, cutting him off. “And watch out for Jim and Terry, they’re going to try to get back at you for what you did to Brad.” Nikki turned and walked away, ignoring Jasons attempts to continue talking to her.

153311112112121122112.content:
Jason was literally speechless. His mind hadn't even finished processing the fact that he had apparently dated Nikki at some point in the past and now it was trying to deal with the fact that he had apparently just fucked up his chance to get back together with her. He soaked in the details of her legs and ass (showcased nicely in tight Daisy Dukes) as she walked away and remembered how she had looked in her tight, low-cut top and how attractive her cleavage had been. He pictured her eyes, her smile. "Fuck," he muttered, finally turning away and sitting on the bench next to Colin again. "Can I bum another cigarette?"

"Sure mate," Colin handed him a smoke and lit it for him before lighting one of his own. Jason ignored the fact that he was leaning against a "No Smoking" sign and inhaled deeply. He fought back the urge to cough and stubbornly finished the cigarette with single minded intensity. When he was done he had another. "Want to talk about it mate?" Colin finally asked.

"Not really."

"Fair enough," Colin stood up and stretched. "I'm afraid we're wearing out our welcome and it may be better to leave on our own before we're forced to go." Colin nodded his head toward the far side of the food court and Jason saw two mall security guards heading their way.

Part of him almost wanted to stay and fight but ultimately he decided it would be foolish to do so. These weren't the people he was angry with. He made a mental note; he was at war with Laura and her jock/prep clique. He grinned wolfishly at the thought, remembering how it felt to beat down Brad and thinking of how it would feel to do it again to someone else. Maybe this Jim and Terry? He wondered if those were the two who had been hiding behind Nikki while he was kicking Brad. “Let’s go,” he said, grinding out his cigarette on the No Smoking sign, grinning at the burn mark he left behind.

He followed Colin and Wendy back to the bus stop and they talked while they waited for the bus to arrive. They boarded the bus and began the trek back home. “Do you fancy stopping by mate?” He asked Jason finally. “That bass setup I was telling you about is at my place at the moment. You’re welcome to check it out.”

Jason shrugged. He wasn’t sure if wanted to buy, or even look at a bass. But he also wasn’t sure if he wanted to go home and deal with his mom.

Jason shook his head, "Nah, I'll stop by tomorrow or something."

Colin nodded, he exchanged phone numbers with Jason before he allowed himself to be led away by Wendy who managed to tug insistently on his arm without relinquishing her bored expression.

Jason turned and started walking in a random direction, thinking he wanted to get home eventually but probably not right away. "I see you've met my brother," a girls voice sounded next to Jason and he spun to face it while taking two quick steps backward, remembering that Terry could be girls name and he no idea who it was Nikki had warned him about. A pretty girl with long pale blonde hair was standing there giggling, as though she realized that Jasons first reaction to her voice was one of fear. Jason stood there, staring back at her with his hands thrust deep in his pockets. She was beautiful in the almost unreal way that supermodels were, about five foot six or seven, shining blue eyes, slim curvy body with breasts that were just large enough to draw attention to themselves without being distracting. He forced himself to look back at her face and he blinked as he tried to decide what it was about her face that seemed odd.

"Colin is your brother?" Jason asked finally, trying to get a reaction from the girl who until now hadn't taken her eyes from her iPhone.

"That's interesting," she murmured.

"What is? The fact that you had some sort of nose job that left weird afterimages behind?" Jason blinked again, he could almost see the faint outline of a different nose superimposed over the one she currently had. "And your cheekbones, you accentuated them, nice job."

The girl raised her hand to her face with a startled motion. “No.” She said finally. “I was talking about the fact that your profile seems to be locked due to a pretty nasty paradox.” She turned the screen of her iPhone towards Jason and he was shocked to see himself as the muscular behemoth in the app from Laura’s phone. “So you’re the one who’s fucking this whole thing up for everyone else aren’t you?”

15331111211212112211222.content:
The girl drew the phone back and went back to fiddling with the app, even assuming that having his profile locked meant she couldn’t mess with it his skin still crawled with unease. “How can you tell I redid my nose?” she asked finally.

Jason shrugged. “I can see it. There’s like an outline or something of how it used to look.”

“Anything else?”

“Anything else what?” Jason glanced around, wondering if anyone was overhearing their bizarre conversation. There was no one in sight.

“Can you see anything else I changed?”

Jason looked long and hard at her (not an unpleasant task) before shaking his head. “Your nose and cheekbones, that’s it.” He smirked before continuing, ”maybe if you took your clothes off I’d be able to judge more accurately.”

The girl shook her head slowly. “No, I think you’re only able to see what I’ve changed since you paradoxed yourself. My nose and cheekbones are all I’ve done today. Besides, I’m only sixteen, you don’t want any sex offender stuff on your rap sheet do you?”

“Fine, Ms. Frazer, are we done now? I have things I’d like to take care of.”

“Monica,” the girl said flatly, still not looking up from her phone. “And what DO you have planned? I can’t see anything, you’re completely blank. Well except for the dick you gave yourself.” She let out a low whistle. “Very nicely done, just over nine inches, and a hefty girth without being ridiculous. JUST big enough to be shocking without being so over the top people will freak when they see it. I bet you miss that thing.”

“Actually that IS my dick,” Jason said coldly, “the only thing I changed on myself before reality blew up was my muscle mass. Now what do you mean by blank?”

“So you’re still packing that thing?” Monica blushed. “And I mean blank as in I can’t get ANY projection results on you with the app. Not even the really short term ones. It’s like you don’t exist AT ALL.”

“Projection? What are you talking about?”

Monica shoved her phone into her purse and glared at Jason. “Are you fucking kidding me? What did you do? Just install the damn thing and shatter reality without reading the directions? Did you at least check out the online FAQ or forum?”

Jason shrugged, “It wasn’t even on my phone, I found it at a friend’s house and had no idea what it really did at first.” Monica’s jaw literally dropped open as she stared at Jason with incredulity.

“Really? Well good job king doofus, you may have very well completely screwed every plan I’ve had for this thing since I got it. They’re talking about shutting it down entirely if they can’t unravel some huge paradox and if I had to guess, that would be you. Do you think I want to go back to how I looked six weeks ago? Guess what? I don’t. I’m on the verge of setting my life path towards becoming one of the biggest, best, most WELL PAID,” she emphasized the last words, “models in history with better than even odds of transitioning into a movie career. And YOU,” she jabbed Jason in the chest, “probably fucked it up.”

Jason held his hands up and backed away slowly, “Whoa, whoa, whoa, none of which was on purpose, now slow down and let’s talk through this.” Jason was equal parts intrigued and frightened by this girl but regardless of how he felt about her she was potentially a gold mine of information regarding what was had happened and a possible key to fixing it. But given how the girl was glaring at him he wasn’t sure she’d be willing to help him at all.

153311112112121122112221.content:
Monica stood glaring at Jason until it passed the point where he believed she was going to cool off on her own. He cleared his throat and slowly lowered his hands. “Look, I can see you’re upset, and I can totally understand why,” he hastily added as her nostrils flared with anger. “but maybe I can help you fix whatever it is you think I did wrong? Maybe we can talk about it and it’ll turn out that it wasn’t really my fault anyway.” Jason seriously doubted that would be the case but hey, he may as well toss that out there, maybe it would calm her down. Maybe she would unwind enough to maybe explain exactly what the fuck had happened to him.

Monica took a step backward and looked at him. This wasn’t an angry look anymore, this was a cold, calculating look of appraisal. Jason shivered slightly and almost wished she had stayed angry. “Maybe,” Monica pulled her iPhone back out of her purse and her fingers flew across the screen. If it was the Alterations app that she was messing with Jason had no clue what she would be doing with it. It was just for making people hotter right? “Fine,” Monica snapped, putting her phone away again. “But right now I have things I have to take care of. You’re a friend of Colin’s right?” Jason wasn’t sure if he’d describe it as a friendship yet but regardless Monica didn’t give him a chance to answer. “Whatever time he asks you stop by tomorrow make sure you’re there at least a half hour early. We’ll talk.”

“But I don’t...”

Monica cut him off before he could finish telling her he didn’t know where she and Colin lived. “Our place is the one down the street, the opposite side from the bus stop, red siding and shitty looking lawn on the corner, you can’t miss it. And here’s a protip for you, they’re green.”

“Green?” Jason sputtered as Monica turned away, giving him a clear view of an ass that was nothing short of perfection before her very long hair settled back down almost to her knees, blocking his view.

“Green, don’t fuck this up because if you do I won’t give you a second chance.” She paused to look back over her shoulder at him. “Yes you might be able to help me, but you need me a hell of a lot more than I need you. Don’t fuck this up,” she repeated as she turned away and continued walking without looking back. Jason stared after her shapely, sensuous legs long enough to believe they may have been the most perfect looking legs he had ever seen. He shuddered slightly, despite how undeniably gorgeous she was Monica was unsettling. Jason took a minute to backtrack to the bus stop and looked up and down the cross street, sure enough he could see a red house at the end of the block with a withering lawn.

“Huh,” Jason grunted and walked down to the gas station to buy a soda. The entryway door jingled as he entered and the clerk behind the counter looked up from a magazine. Jason met his eye and waved. The clerk scowled and went back to his magazine. As he walked towards the soda fountain someone darted around him and the door chimed again as whoever they were exited. An uneasy feeling settled in the pit of Jason’s stomach, he hadn’t got a clear look at whoever it was but it might have been one of the guys who had been hiding behind Nikki last night while he had been kicking Brad across Laura’s front lawn. Jason had a Styrofoam cup in his had then put it back without filling it. Where was he going to find a weapon in a gas station? An even better question was where was he going to find a weapon in a gas station that he would be able to buy with less than two bucks in his pocket? He looked longingly at a short wooden club labeled “tire thumper.” It was out of his price range and too close to the clerk for him to practice his newly learned five fingered discount skills. He settled on a bottle of root beer, one of the cheap ones he didn’t really like but it came in a nice glass bottle.

The clerk rang him up without a word and handed Jason back his change. “See, this is why I love coming here,” Jason said as he twisted the cap off and downed as much of the root beer as he could in one breath, “the friendly atmosphere and warm ambience.” He let out an ear splitting belch and shoved his way out the front door. If the clerk replied Jason didn’t hear it.

Jason stopped just outside the door and took another swig of root beer as he looked up and down the street. “Now if I were a couple of gutter crawling jock strap stains where would I be hiding?” Jason took a step towards the street then noticed the entrance to a small alley that led between the gas station and the building next it. “Better question, if I wanted to beat the shit out of a couple gutter crawling jock strap stains without being seen where would I be hiding?” Jason walked straight into the alley and wasn’t surprised when two figures closed in on him before he was even halfway through. He also wasn’t surprised to see that they were the two douchenozzles who had been hiding behind Nikki. “Well well, Jim and Terry I presume?” Jason sipped at his root beer, almost done already. But that was ok.

“You know who we are dweeb,” one of them snarled. Jason raised an eyebrow when they both drew knives.

“You boys sure you’re up for this without a cute redhead to hide behind?” Jason wasn’t sure if they were ignoring him or if they didn’t understand that he was making fun of them. “At least let me finish my drink first, ok guys?” Jason rose the bottle to his lips and shifted his grip on the neck as they both predictably stepped in closer while he appeared vulnerable.
