Nikki wasn't sure whether or not she needed to roll the window down since the convertible top was already open; after hesitating she opted to anyway. The police officer walked slowly along the length of the drivers side, making a show of leaning over to peer into the backseat before he finally approached Nikki. "License and registration?" Nikki handed them over without a word. The officer looked them over, comparing Nikki's face to her picture on her license. "Do you two want to tell me what you were up to?"

"Dumpster diving officer, there's not a problem is there?" Nikki was barely able to restrain herself from whipping her head around to ask Jason what he was thinking.

"Dumpster diving, huh?" The cop directed his attention from Nikki to Jason.

"Yea," Jason said, with a hint of enthusiasm in his voice. "The record place will toss out stuff all the time that my friend and I will get usable parts from, like you can get replacement tubes for old guitar amplifiers from some of the stereos they'll trash. We've even pulled some records that were mostly playable, only a few scratches, some collectors online will still give you something for some of them," the cop looked uncertain but Jason continued. "My girlfriend wasn't too crazy about the idea though, so we kind of argued about it then decided to leave. It was a dumb idea, I probably blew my chance for getting laid tonight." Jason gasped out a lungful of air as Nikki elbowed him fiercely in the ribs.

The cop sighed, "We got a report of someone yelling or shouting so the next time you two have a quarrel, keep it down. And son, don't be stupid enough to drag your girl to a damn dumpster again. This will be a warning, next time it will be a charge for disturbing the peace, now get out of here," the cop shook his head as he handed Nikki her things.

She nodded and started the car as soon as he walked away. "Dumpster diving?" She hissed at Jason as she pulled back into traffic.

"Colin told me it's where he's picked up some of his sound gear from," Jason leaned his head back and closed his eyes. Now he really did feel sick to his stomach, probably from the shot of perfume he had sprayed in his mouth. "Seemed like a reasonable excuse."

"Reasonable excuse?"

"You didn't want to tell him we had been having sex in public did you? That is probably something we wouldn't have gotten away from with just a warning."

Nikki shook her head. "Jason, don't take this is a compliment because it's really not. In fact it actually kind of scares me. But I couldn't tell you were lying back there. I mean I knew you were because we were definitely not dumpster diving but I couldn't TELL you were." Nikki looked away from the road to look at Jason. "It scares me," she repeated.

Jason shook his head, "would you rather be getting charged for something right now? Or maybe spend some time in a holding cell? It sucks. I certainly don't want to do it again."

"No of course not, but..." Nikki frowned in silence for a moment as she drove. "But I don't like this feeling that you're that good at lying."

Jason honestly had never thought about it before, he had never considered himself a gifted liar, until this whole bizarre situation with Laura's phone he had never really felt like he had much reason to lie. He watched the scenery pass by and tried to think of something to say. "Did I tell you we have our first show in a few days?" Jason said finally. "Tuesday night. Opening for a local band at the Chiller. Colin got the gig confirmed for us this morning, someone else backed out and they probably would have taken anyone wiling to stand on stage for forty minutes."

"I thought you didn't have a drummer yet?"

"We're pretty sure we got one, we'll be spending the next couple of days practicing our asses off to get him broken in."

"So that's it then," Nikki said after a moment. "You're not going to talk about your scary good lying skills, you aren't going to talk about whatever big secret thing you haven't been telling me, you're going to talk about your band. OK." Nikki was obviously growing angry with Jason.

"What do you want me to say?"

"How about, "Nikki, I would never lie to you?"" She barked. "Not that I'd freaking be able to tell," she barked.

"Nikki I..."

"Save it," she interrupted him. "You're home, hopefully you'll feel better. If you're even telling the truth about being sick," she was gripping the steering wheel hard enough that her knuckles were white and she stared straight ahead.

Jason opened and closed his mouth a few times, trying to think of something to say that wouldn't ring hollow in his own ears, much less hers. "I'm sorry tonight turned out the way it did, I really am. But I hope you enjoyed at least some of it." He got out of the car and almost instantly dropped to a knee as an overwhelming wave of nausea overcame him. Whether it was the perfume, the stress he had been under all night, or whether it really was the food he ended up puking.

"Oh my God, Jason. Are you OK?" Nikki started to get out of her car but he waved her back as he struggled to his feet.

"I'll be fine," he said as he walked to his front door without looking back. This time she actually was pretty sure he was lying.

He was slightly surprised by her enthusiasm, "Yea, that's the plan. Not sure what time yet but I'll let you know, I'll probably be here most of the day practicing with the new drummer."

Jason had no response to that observation so he just awkwardly mumbled, "later," and headed back towards Colin's room. As he passed Monica's room her door clicked shut as though it had been partially open, he frowned at it as he walked past and shouldered his way through Colin's door.

"Hey mate!" Colin waved to Jason as soon as he realized he was there, "come meet our new drummer. Spud this is Jason, Jason this is Spud."

Jason shook the hand of the gruff looking young man Colin was introducing him to. He was short, probably not much taller than five foot three or four and had a short unkempt beard and shaved head. "Spud?" Even as Jason said it he realized that with his stocky build and hairstyle choice his silhouette resembled a Mr. Potato Head, it was probably even more pronounced when he was hunched over his drum kit.

"Dave," he said with a shrug, "but everyone calls me Spud, it's cool."

"Nice to meet you Spud," Jason said, shaking his hand again. "So what's the plan? Work out a set list then practice our asses off until the show?"

"Pretty much," Colin said with a laugh. Wendy shot him a glance that seemed to indicate she was anything but amused by the time crunch they found themselves in.

The late morning quickly turned into early afternoon before they arrived at a set list of songs they all knew and figured they'd be able to play together. "Our set is for 45 minutes but we really only need 35 to 40 minutes of music, there has to be some time for audience patter and such," Colin explained as he smoked a cigarette. "We're not going to have the time to get anything original competently written and rehearsed before then so we'll be sticking to cover songs for now. It's not terrible because you get a certain guaranteed audience reaction with songs they already know. It's not something we want to rely on though, by the next show we do we need to have at least a few originals or we'll be stuck in people's minds as a cover act." Jason and Spud nodded in agreement as Colin continued. "The Chiller is primarily a metal venue but we can get away with a lot of cross genre stuff if it's fast and heavy enough, I'm thinking primarily punk and grunge because it's more to our current skill level. The two biggest songs I think we'll get reactions from are "Smells like Teen Spirit," and "Blitzkrieg Bop," both are high energy and well known. I think we'd do best opening with Blitzkrieg to get people's attention and close with Teen Spirit because the guys we're opening for have a young fan base, they'll be more likely to know Teen Spirit and most of them should be at the show by that point, any chance we have to grow our fan base by leeching from someone else's we take, yea?"

Nyah surprised everyone by sticking her head into the room, "Jason, Nikki is here to take me to the gym, you're coming right?"

1533111121121211221122211221122221111121.content:
"I was thinking I would call it a night myself, actually." Jason said. "I've been pushing myself really hard lately and that combined with a full day of practice here has me beat." In actuality he felt like he could run a marathon, and he probably could.

Nyah looked quite saddened by this news. "Oh. Alright then."

As she turned to leave Jason told her that she could get some aerobic exercise in at home really easily. Her mood lightened a little at this thought which allowed Jason to head home without feeling too much like he had crushed Nyah's hopes. Jason rode the bus home and changed out of his clothes into gym shorts and a loose t-shirt. Well, it should have been loose but his physique filled it out pretty well. It wasn't tight but snug for sure. He realized that pretty much all of his clothes were cut to fit someone who was very thin, which he had been up until very recently.

"This is why I need to stay away from the gym," Jason told his reflection as his flexed his chest and felt his shirt tighten. "Another workout like the last few and I wont have anything that fits me anymore." He pumped his arm a few times smiling at the way his bicep filled up the sleeve. He'd weighed himself and found he was up to 192 pounds which meant he had grown by 40 pounds since arriving in this reality, and nearly half of that was the result of the last two trips to the gym.

Jason checked his phone again. Still no word from Nikki. He wondered if he should send her a message but figured he'd wait until tomorrow at the earliest. So instead he turned on his TV and began flipping through channels looking for something to watch. It only took a few minutes for his mind to return to the gym and his desire to pump his body even larger. He tried to refocus on whatever show he'd landed on but his desire to hit the gym was turning into a need. Real strength was within his grasp and he could have it. He remembered how good it had felt to lift heavier and heavier weights and then come back for more. To hit a barrier and push through it then go further. To feel the power in his body rage like a fire that could forge muscles of steel.

He hadn't noticed it until now but one of Jason's hands was inside his shirt feeling his chest and stomach while the other was rubbing his huge erection through his shorts.

Jason sighed. "Maybe a good workout will help me blow off some steam." He knew this was a terrible idea but also knew he would probably go through with it anyway. What he really needed was something to preoccupy himself, he just didn't know what that something was. He tried to burn off some energy by doing pushups but the ease with which he blew through them just made him hungrier for more strength. And he could have it if he just gave in to his desires.
1533111121121211221122211221122221111121.title: Restless Muscles

choices: Jason manages to fight back.
Jason is not strong enough.
1533111121121211221122211221122221111121.content:
Jason entered the gym muttering to himself about what a bad idea this was. He had intended to merely jog the 4 miles from his home to the gym but instead had run at top speed. Even with the long sprint behind him Jason hardly felt tired and dove directly into his workout.

Every set, every rep he told himself to take it easy, that this was not a good idea, that he would regret this at yet he continued to pile the weights higher, lift more, push his body harder than ever. He worked his way around the gym working his legs, back, chest, abs, arms, and shoulders all within two hours. After he stood panting with a dull fire burning in his body from the neck down. His shirt was now clinging to his body tight enough to show off the separation between his growing pecs and when he pumped his arms the sleeves responded with tiny snaps and pops.

Jason sucked down a bottle of water and could already feel his fatigue fading. He looked around the gym and noticed that the place had nearly cleared out, there were only a few people left. He nodded. "Good. There aren't too many people to see me really go nuts."

He began a second cycle adding even more weight to his exercises. The burning in his body become a fire and it seemed as though he could actually feel his muscles getting bigger. And he was loving it.

Near the conclusion of his second trip around the gym Jason lay on the bench press completing a set of 10 reps with 390 pounds on the bar. He didn't have a spotter and knew that was a bad idea, but tonight was the night of bad ideas. Besides, there wasn't anyone else around to spot him anyway and the idea of just stopping and heading home was far from his mind. Jason racked the bar and sat up, it wasn't enough. No one his size should be able to bench this much and yet he needed more. He got up and added a 25 pound plate to each side then lay back down.

He took a deep breath. "There are full blown bodybuilders, huge ones, that can't bench this much. Okay, 440. Here we go." Jason extended his arms and the bar lifted out of its cradle. For a moment he held it in place getting a sense for just how heavy it was. It's like I'm holding two of me in my hands, he thought. Slowly he bent his arms and brought the weight down towards his chest. For a moment he thought he'd made a big mistake as the bar didn't stop going down when he wanted to stop it but a moment later he caught himself and began pressing it back up. Slowly but surely he extended his arms once more the, before he could think better of it, he went for a second rep. As had been the pattern of the night the second one was easier. And the third easier still. By the time he got to 10 he felt he could add more weight, not a lot, but he was sure he could.

He racked the bar and let out a sigh, his arms dangling at his sides. He closed his eyes and let the heat of the lift seal more super powered strength into his body.

"That's really dangerous, you know." A deep voice spoke from very close by.

Jason's eyes shot open and he spotted Brad standing right above him in a spotter position. At least it looked like Brad's head, the body was something else entirely. Swirls of multicolored auras danced around more muscle than should have been possible. Brad's pecs were so engorged that he had to lean forward to see where Jason lay. His tank top and shorts were painted on so tightly that every nook, cranny, bulge, and vein was clearly visible as if he wore nothing at all.

"All that weight and no spotter. I figured a nerd like you would be smarter." A nasty snarl curled Brad's lips.

Jason felt panic sweep over his body. Visiting the gym had gone from bad idea to fatal mistake. His first instinct was to run, put the gym equipment between himself and the giant above him but before he could even move he heard laughter from below him. A quick glance revealed Jim and Terry, both of whom were also much larger now, though Brad put them both to shame.

"I have to say, nerd, you've grown a bit since the last time I saw you," Brad said. "Of course, so have I." Brad flexed an arm that was bigger around than a basketball. "What do you think?"

Jason tilted his head back and surveyed Brad's new body. "Yeah, pretty impressive." He pointed at Brad's thighs. "This thing is pretty huge, and so is this one over here. This one in the middle, though, leaves a lot to be desired." Jason's finger hovered inches from the meager bulge in the crotch of Brad's shorts.

Jason had been hoping to catch Brad off guard and find any kind of opening but the giant simply laughed off the insult. "What can I say, I'm not shower. I'm a grower." He flexed his quads and they swelled more than Jason thought possible. Each thigh bulged bigger around than his own chest and they began angrily pressing into each other as the muscles flexed. The girth of his thighs forced his shorts to slide up his legs bunching up just below the waist. Then Brad grunted and flexed even harder and to Jason's dismay his quads flared out even further, additional muscles extending to the sides like wings. The sheer mass was incredible and Jason guessed that just one of Brads legs weighed about the same as Jason's whole body.

Brad released his flex and examined the weights that Jason had been lifting. "Hmmm," he said, his voice a low rumble. "440 is a pretty solid bench, nerd. I can remember struggling to push this much iron around. Well, you know, before this happened." Brad waved his hand over his chest and stomach. Then Brad grabbed the bar with one hand and curled it to his chest in a quick easy motion then continued to hammer out rep after rep. After about a dozen or so curls he shook his head. "Yeah, I'm just not feeling it. What do you guys think?" He casually tossed the bar 10 feet through the air to Jim who caught it one handed and copied Brads exercise.

Jim wasn't as big as Brad but he handled the 440 pounds just as easily. "Feels like a baby toy." He grabbed the bar with both hands and began slowly bending the steel until the ends were touching. He tossed the mangled weight back at Jason who had to roll away to keep from being crushed.

Terry clicked his tongue and frowned. "Guys, I think we just have to accept that we've outgrown this place."

Brad laughed. "I think you're right, Terry. Do you boys think you could escort our friend outside with us?"

Before Jason could even react Terry and Jim had grabbed him and lifted him off the ground. Each man had one of Jason's feet and one hand and they carried him through the gym towards the locker room in the back. Jason fought as hard as he could but he could feel absolutely no give in their grip. What he did feel, however, was the burning sensation return to his muscles. He realized that this could be the perfect workout and perhaps his only way to escape. All night every time he had come up against a weight he couldn't lift his body responded by getting stronger, maybe if he fought hard enough he could gain the strength he needed. He tensed every muscle in his body all at once and pulled against Terry and Jim. The heat in his body became a raging fire burning like a star in his chest and radiating out to every fiber of his being.
1533111121121211221122211221122221111121.title: This Is a Mistake

1533111121121211221122211221122221111121.content:
Jason struggled against the iron like grip of Jim and Terry, it seemed like the harder he pulled against the more fiercely the fire inside him seemed to burn. The two were carrying towards the locker room while Brad followed behind them, continuing to drone on about the horrible things he planned to do to Jason. Truth be told, Jason had stopped paying attention to him as what was going on with his own body demanded his attention. Jason suddenly felt as though the last few days of insane workouts had primed his body for this moment and despite the fact that he probably should have been terrified he instead felt euphoric. It felt as though some massive power source was coursing through his body and his ability to fully tap into it was almost within his grasp. Jason vaguely noticed that they were almost at the entrance to the locker room but he ignored the implications, focusing instead on resisting Jim and Terry in the most concentrated flex he could manage. Brad said something else and his lackey's laughed but Jason couldn't understand them over the sound of his own blood pounding in his ears. It felt like the tendons in his arms and shoulders were going to tear and his entire body ached with the exertion but he continued to redouble his efforts. The edges of his vision began to blur and every sensation faded from his body except for the now painful ache in his muscles and the ever intensifying burning sensation in his body. Jason grunted as the heat dramatically intensified and his tormentors finally seemed to notice something was happening to him.

"Shit," Terry suddenly let go of Jason's arm, "what the hell, it feels like he's on fire!"

Jason stumbled as the tension on one arm was released but he quickly regained his feet and pulled against Jim's vice like grip with renewed determination. Rips and pops sounded out as Jason's straining arm and shoulder muscle began to swell larger than his already tortured t-shirt could handle.

"What the fuck? He's not supposed to be able to grow!" Jim sounded startled but still didn't release his grip on Jason's wrist.

Jason felt like he was riding on the biggest adrenaline rush of his life, and he had a momentary flashback to his first fight with Brad. "I should have fucking killed you when I had the chance," Jason snarled at Brad as Brad reached for him. Brad actually flinched back from Jason's obvious rage, then swaggered towards him again as Jim jerked Jason's arm hard enough to make his sneakers squeak across the tile floor of the locker room. With what felt more like operating on pure instinct than rational thought Jason stopped trying to have a tug of war with Jim and instead stepped into the larger boy and grappled with him, lifting him bodily off the ground. He grunted with the effort as Jim wailed with surprise, then he hit Brad with Jim, swinging him overhead by the arm and bringing him down on Brad like a hammer. Both cried out in pain as they collided with each other and Jason jerked Jim up by the arm again and roared as he repeated the hammer like body slam again, and then again. Each time the almost herculean feat became easier and as Jason raised Jim over his head a fourth time his shirt finally fell away in an explosion of tatters from his muscles. This time instead of bludgeoning Brad with Jim yet again Jason swung him wide like a baseball bat and swatted Terry off his feet, smashing him against the wall of the locker room. Jason let go of Jim's ruined, twisted and obviously broken arm and turned back to Brad, savagely kicking him in the face as he tried to regain his feet. Brad's head snapped back and Jason' grabbed him by the hair, yanking his head back and punching him hard in face, smashing his nose flat in an explosion of blood. "I would have just left you alone but you had to keep after me didn't you? You fucking prick!" Jason screamed as he punched Brad again. Brad shook his head, sending blood flying everywhere, and surged to his feet, catching Jason with a glancing blow to his own jaw.

Jason took a step back and reassessed the situation, his head ached with the impact of Brad's fist and his gut told him that if it had connected more solidly Jason may have ended up with a broken jaw or worse from the impact. As much as he hated to admit it Brad was still stronger than he was. Jason had gotten lucky catching them by surprise but he wasn't sure if he could actually beat him, especially as he noticed Terry crawling out from under Jim, who appeared to passed out from the pain and shock of Jason's attack. Brad grinned as though he could read Jason's thoughts. "That's right nerd, you're not making it out of here,' Brad sneered.

Jason felt a new rush of rage overwhelm him. "Stop calling me that," Jason shouted as he turned to grab hold of one of the wooden benches bolted to the floor in front of a bank of lockers. Jason tugged and with less effort than he would have expected it pulled free from the floor. The rush of heat through his body intensified once again with the momentary resistance it offered and he swung the bench with all the strength in his entire body, catching Brad square across the face with the unexpected attack. Brad flew back against the wall as the bench shattered with a deafening crack upon impact. Jason easily sidestepped a punch from Terry and tore a locker from the wall with a shriek of metal and another rush of internal heat. He brought the locker down over Terry's head and then kicked Terry squarely in the gut, pushing him backward where he fell over the immobile body of Jim.

Brad struggled back to his feet, blood dripping from his face as it streamed from his nose, his mouth and a deep gash on his forehead. He spit a tooth out where it rattled across the floor and came to rest next to Jason's foot. "That's it Jason, no more teasing, no more screwing around. Now I'm going to kill you." Brad's voice was flat, cold and matter of fact. It was completely absent of the mocking tone he usually had for Jason and it made Jason's blood run cold. Terry struggled back to his feet again and took a place next to Brad where he only nodded silently in agreement.

1533111121121211221122211221122221111121.content:
To his dismay Terry and Jim didn't even notice the force Jason was attempting to apply and by the time they were exiting the rear of the gym into the back alley he was feeling drained.

Jason was set down on his knees in a puddle. He assumed they did this on purpose since it was the only bit of water in the whole alley. For a brief moment Jason thought he saw some of the water evaporate when it touched his skin, but it was probably a trick of the mind. Jim or Terry, he couldn't see which, stood behind Jason with a hand on his shoulder keeping him in place. Brad stood in front of Jason and was joined by someone new. Jason's heart sank further when he quickly recognized the mysterious growing girl that had dangled the giant weight over his chest a few days earlier. Today she was clad in a grey hoodie and matching sweatpants. Both garments were vastly oversized and hung loose on her skinny frame. The hood was up and all Jason could see was her face which looked as pissed off as ever.

"I've got some bad news and I've got some good news, nerd." Brad said.

"Is the good news that you're going to stop calling me nerd?" Jason asked.

Brad chuckled but continued his speech as if he'd prepared what he was going to say ahead of time. "The bad news, nerd, is that we're not going to kill you. Not yet, at least."

"How terrible for you. You must be so disappointed."

"Yeah, Terry here was especially upset." Jason felt the hand on his shoulder tighten. Brad continued, "But our… benefactor must have had a change of heart. I'm sure it won't be long before it changes back."

Jason raised his eyebrows, "Benefactor, huh?"

"Come on, a smart guy like you probably figured out that there's someone out there that gave us these bodies."

"Oh, for sure. I was just surprised that a dumbass like you knew the word 'benefactor.'"

Brad laughed at the insult. "Which brings us to the good news. The guys and I have a new pal to play with."

"Oh yeah, another musclebound asshole? You know the fear factor wears off after the first three or so."

A calmness washed over Brad. He spoke slowly, "Have you heard from Nikki today?"

Jason's stomach dropped. "You lie."

Brad nodded to Jim who shoved a cell phone in Jason's face. On the screen was a picture of Brad with one of his giant arms around Nikki's waist holding her in a tight bear hug. His other arm was across her chest and his hand was squeezing her breast roughly through her shirt. Brad's tongue was extended and was just centimeters from Nikki's ear. She looked like she was screaming and struggling but Brad was just smiling and holding her in place. Then the cell phone was gone and Jason was left staring at Brads smug grin. "Not feeling so smart now are you, nerd?"

Jason's head was swimming. What was he going to do? What could he do? At the moment survival was the only thing that mattered. He could figure out a plan later.

"And since you were so concerned about the size of my equipment earlier I think I'll show you what Nikki has in store for her if you don't get with the program." Brad slid his hands into his shorts and pulled out his penis. The tiny, soft dick looked even smaller in his big hands. But once he gave his tool a soft pump it instantly began filling with blood and fast. Inflating like a balloon his cock got longer and longer until it dwarfed his hands. By the time he was fully erect Brad's cock had become a monster standing 16 inches long and as thick as a beer can.

"I told you," Brad said squeezing his cock and pointing it at Jason, "I'm a grower. Do you think Nikki will like it? How much of this bad boy can I squeeze into her before she begs me to stop? Or what if she just keeps begging for more?"

Jason couldn't take anymore. He tried to get to his feet and charge Brad but he was driven back to the ground before he could even get started.

Brad shook his head. "Don't even think about it, nerd. You've seen what we can do, haven't you?"

"Yeah, I saw what you did to that truck the other day." Jason spat his words, his anger was practically uncontrollable.

"Actually, I had nothing to do with that." Brad said. "That was all Brittany here."

The thin girl smirked and stepped toward Jason.

Brad got out of her way. "I'm getting stronger and stronger everyday," he said, "but I still don't think I could do what she did to that truck. And it was easy for her. She can get as big and strong as she wants and I'd bet that if she tried she could have put that truck into outer space."

Brittany shot a death stare at Brad.

The big man returned the look with a nervous chuckle. "Sorry, Britt. What I meant was she definitely could have put it into space."

Brittany nodded slowly then turned her attention back to Jason. She shook out her arms and legs then sucked in a deep breath through her nose. With a grunt she tensed her body and curled her arms inward in front of her stomach. The loose sweats suddenly weren't so loose anymore. Jason couldn't make out the details of her form through her clothes but it was clear that her mass was incredible. A moment ago she probably weighed 100 pounds but now she had more than doubled that and she was already sucking in another breath ready to expand her body again.

This time she filled her clothes to the max and Jason got a perfect view of the physique beneath. She still wasn't up to Brad's size but she was easily bigger than any woman the world had ever seen. Brittany raised her arms into a big double bicep pose. The seems of her sleeves began to separate which only spurred her on. She turned to look at one of her arms and squeezed down even harder forcing both her biceps to grow larger. Her arms were already over 20 inches around but now they were adding additional inches by the second. The sweats peeled away from her arms leaving them bare and still she squeezed out more and more size. Her arms were well out of proportion for the rest of her body but she showed no sign of slowing down. The giant bicep pressed against her forearm forcing it to extend slightly but still it grew, the peak raising higher and higher until the top of the giant muscle was even with her clenched fist.

At last she stopped and let out a soft moan as though her growth had somehow pleased her sexually. She let her arms drop to her sides, though they lost no size when relaxed. She approached Jason and pushed him so that he fell onto his back.

"Get a little carried away there, Britt?" Brad asked which elicited another death stare but this one had much less bite to it. "Like I said, nerd, we're not going to kill you. But that's the bad news since you'll probably wish you were dead in a minute. Brittany here is going to hurt you."

With an evil sneer Brittany put her hands on Jason's thigh.

"I've heard that the femur is the strongest bone in the body." Brad said.

"I didn't know you were a doctor," Jason said trying to ignore the pressure that Brittany's slender fingers were putting on his quads.

Brittany squeezed and twisted and Jason felt the bone in his leg snap. White hot pain rocketed through his body and he let out a loud scream. He felt her hands now grasping his other thigh and he tried to beg her not to do it but words wouldn't escape his lips, only sobbing breaths and cries of pain. This time she slowed her movements down and began slowly applying more and more pressure forcing more screams from Jason's lungs. Finally his other femur snapped but Brittany didn't release the pressure. She just dug her fingers in more mashing his muscle fiber into mush.

The pain was too much for Jason and the world began to go black. The last thing he saw was Terry's huge body standing over him with what looked like a piece of broken glass in his hand.

When he came to he was in a hospital bed and...

1533111121121211221122211221122221111121.content:
Jason opened his mouth to offer up an idea but he was hit with an image of Nikki and Brad locked in a kiss. His stomach turned and he looked away. His eyes fell on the giant weight that was used to nearly crush him. This was all too much.

"Look," Jason said turning back to face Nikki but not looking at her. "I'm not feeling well."

"Oh." Nikki said. Jason didn't see her face but he could hear her frown. First the lie about the cut on his cheek and now he was ditching her.

"Yeah. I was feeling dizzy in the shower and I think I should go home and get some rest. Probably pushed myself too hard today, you know?"

"Sure," Jason knew she wasn't buying his story but at the moment he didn't care. He felt betrayed and disgusted. Have you tried sucking the inside of her thighs yet? She really gets off on that.

Not wanting to draw this out any further Jason turned and walked out of the gym towards Nikki's convertible. Outside he saw the gym owner once more he was screaming into his cell phone.

"I TOLD YOU ALREADY, I DON’T KNOW!! JUST SEND SOMEONE, ANYONE!" Jason looked beyond the big man and saw what must have been his truck, or what was left of it. The giant Chevy was now in two pieces stacked on top of each other. A nearby lamppost had been removed from its place at the side of the road and used as a skewer running through both chunks of vehicle. The gym owner continued to claim ignorance regarding how he had become the owner of a Chevy kebob to the police or his insurance agent or whoever he was yelling at but Jason knew exactly what had happened.

No wonder Brad and didn't mind slinking away, he still got his revenge. Jason wanted to throw up. As if he needed further proof of what had transpired he found a torn t-shirt a few dozen yards from Nikki's car and recognized it at the one the mysterious girl had been wearing. In his minds eye he saw her easily holding the 1000+ pound bar to her chest, her trim arms and chest swelling with muscle. The wild, terrifying look on her face as she gleefully tortured him.

Jason strode past the mayhem as well as the small crowd that was gathering and slunk into the passenger seat of Nikki's car. Nyah and Nikki joined him and Nikki sat looking at him for a long time as if there was some answer she could discern if she stared hard enough.

"What do you guys think happened?" Nyah asked from the backseat, her voice as soft and unsure as ever.

Nikki didn't break eye contact with Jason who still refused to look her way. "I don't know. Do you know, Jason?"

"No clue."

The trio rode in silence. Jason made a mental wish that Nikki would drop him off first but he had no such luck. They dropped Nyah off who told Jason she hoped he felt better before exiting the car. Jason wanted to be impressed that her social skills were improving, albeit just a little, but he was too busy being miserable. When Nikki pulled up to his house Jason was out of the car and up his driveway before she had even made a full stop.

He slammed the door to his room behind him and locked it before slumping down onto the floor where he began shaking uncontrollably. These maniacs were going to kill him. He'd been lucky so far and been able to surprise or outwit them but his luck would only last so long. Today he'd only survived through his tormentors desire to watch him squirm coupled with good timing on the part of the gym owner. There was no doubt in his mind, though, he was going to get very hurt and probably killed. He wasn't safe anywhere not when someone, probably Laura, had imbued them with super strength.

Jason calmed his nerves and stood. There was a small mirror above his dresser which he approached and admired his reflection. Impending karmic cataclysm aside he should feel pretty good, he was nearing 170 pounds of lean muscle and getting bigger every day. Already his overly skinny frame had taken on the look of a swimmer and he was stronger than he'd ever been in his life but it wasn't near enough. Would he even be strong enough once he reached his final weight of 370 pounds? Probably not.

Jason lay on his bed watching the shadows move across his room while the sun dipped low over the horizon. He did his best to shut his brain off and just sleep but anytime he would close his eyes he heard something that he interpreted as his impending doom and shot back awake. Eventually he stopped caring and welcomed Brad, Terry, Jim, or the mysterious, silent girl but even then sleep was elusive as now when he closed his eyes all he saw was Brad with his face buried between Nikki's creamy thighs sucking away while she thrashed about in ecstasy. She clawed at his scalp and wrapped her legs around his head and screamed out demanding more, more, more.

Finally it was morning and Jason was feeling even more miserable after a night filled with fear, anger and not a bit of sleep. Nikki must have had trouble sleeping as well because shortly before 7 she sent Jason a text message:

Feeling better?

Jason sighed. Clearly this wasn't just going to go away. He reluctantly responded:

Not really.

Are you ready to tell me what's going on?

Did you fuck Brad?

Jason didn't normally like to use the f-word when talking about sex but in this case he felt it got his level of vitriol across. He expected her to call him then so she could yell at him instead of simply texting but his phone didn't ring. In fact nothing happened for over a minute which he took as an answer to his question. Finally he received a response. One word, three letters, a "y" on the front end, a "s" on the back and a big ol' "e" in the middle.

Jason nodded at his phone. Then he asked another question he shouldn't have to, but things being as they were he needed to know:

Did I know that already?

This time his phone did ring. He answered it and waited for Nikki to speak. It was obvious that she was crying. "What kind of question is that?"

Jason held his voice steady, though he felt it could crack at any moment. "A strange one, I know. But an honest one. Is this something that I already knew? Have we talked about this before?" Thank you very much shifting realities, Jason thought.

"No, I don't think you knew. We've never talked about it. I don't know if anyone else told you. It wasn't a secret but it was a long time ago."

Now that things were out in the open Jason was actually feeling a little better about it. He was still a bit disgusted but not as much.

"Jason, what's really going on?"

"Brad, Terry and another one of Laura's pals, some girl, attacked me again yesterday. Also Brad said some… things about you that I didn't enjoy hearing."

"Oh." Nikki paused for a while then responded with a surprising amount of anger. "They can't keep doing this!"

"I know," Jason said.

"Can we call the cops?"

Jason though of the mangled Chevy on the pike. "No, I don’t think it'll do any good."

"So then what?"

"I need to make a call," he said solemnly.

There was a long pause. Then, "What about… you know?"

Jason did know. "Nikki, I'm sorry. I shouldn't have reacted like I did. I'm still very upset but I'll get over it. You and me, we're going to be okay."

Nikki's voice was still sad but Jason could hear relief and hope in it as well. "Okay, Jason. Call me when you're ready. I love you."

"I love you too, Nikki." He said and was happy to find that he meant it.

Jason ended the call with Nikki then dialed…

1533111121121211221122211221122221111121.content:
Laura was the last person in the world that Jason wanted to talk to. In fact he'd be perfectly fine with never speaking to her again as long as he lived which made him sad since Laura used to be his best friend. That he was the one to turn her into such a monster only added to his desire to never deal with her lest he be reminded of what his overzealous libido had done. However this was a call that had to take place. Things were getting dangerous and Laura was the only one in the world that could put a stop to it.

Jason dialed and waited. His stomach twisted into a knot, tightening with each ring. Just when he feared his call was going to go to voicemail he heard Laura pick up.

There was a long pause in which Jason wondered if he should talk first. Finally she spoke, "You've got a lot of nerve."

Oh god, even her voice was sexy. Jason had really done a number on her. He knew he'd have to act quick before things got heated. "Laura, listen I-"

"NO! You listen! I don't know who the fuck you think you are! You are determined to ruin my life!! You ruin my party, put my boyfriend in the hospital, but his friends in the hospital, steal one of my best friends away from me, and now you have the balls to call me and expect to listen to what you have to say? FUCK YOU!!" Clearly it was too late to avoid anger.

Yeah, you've got it so rough. Jason had to concentrate to control his temper as well. He was just about to begin pleading his case when Laura interrupted again.

"Why are you even calling me? You want to gloat? Do you want to rub my face in the mess you've turned my life into?"

Jason waited. He wanted to make sure he wasn't going to be cut off again.

"WELL?!?" Laura demanded.

"I want a truce." He said as calmly as he could. "We leave each other alone from here on out."

"And everything you've done to me? I just let it go?"

Jason couldn't believe how self centered Laura was. Did she really believe that she was the only one wronged here? "Everything you've been though, everything I've been through, we call it a draw and leave it behind us. You never have to see or hear from me again and you call off your attack dogs."

"What attack dogs?" Laura sounded hurt by the accusation which Jason found odd.

"Brad and his pals. The only reason they ever got hurt in the first place was when they were attacking me. Self defense, you know."

Laura scoffed at this but Jason didn't let it get to him. There was another demand he had to lay out and he already felt like he wasn't getting much traction in this conversation.

"And another thing," he continued, "I would really appreciate it if you were to remove any crazy powers you've given them. Just to make sure they don't come after me again."

Silence. Lots of it. Then: "What are you talking about? Do you hear yourself? What powers?"

"I know about the app on your phone, the one that can change people. I know you gave Brad, Terry, and Jim abilities with it. You even adjusted yourself and that girl I've seen you with, I don’t know her name though."

"You're insane." Laura said. "I don't know why I'm surprised, after the way you acted at my party beating Brad unconscious and daring me to kill you it should be obvious that you're nuts. But a phone that gives people powers? Really Jason?"

He'd been so sure that Laura had been the one making Brad and his cronies bigger and stronger but there was something in Laura's voice that told him she wasn't lying. She really didn't know about it. That wasn't possible, was it? Who else could have done it? Who else would want to hurt Jason? Suddenly an image appeared in his mind, his first memory of this twisted reality: him standing in Laura's house looking at photos of her prom dates through the years holding her phone, her old Nokia phone.

How could he have forgotten? That was the crux of this whole mess in the first place, the center of the paradox he was trapped in. Of course she wasn't the one who had the app, if she did he wouldn't be in this fucked up world at all. Someone else was making his enemies grow bigger and stronger.

"Well?" Laura said, "What do you have to say for yourself?"

Backpedaling, Jason frantically thought through his options. If it wasn't Laura then he guessed it could have been any of her crew that had found the app and were using it to torture him. He would just have to figure out who.

"Fine," he said, "it's not your phone doing it. But don't you think it's funny that Brad has gotten so much bigger these last few weeks?"

Laura cackled. "Now I get it. God, you're so pathetic. You think you're going to convince me that Brad is on steroids and that I should dump him, right? Is that your latest plan to fuck me over? Well guess what, I know he's on steroids. He told me all about it, showed me his stacking cycle. He's on more gear than I've even heard of before: test, anvar, HGH, masteron, you name it. And it's working. He's getting bigger every day and so much stronger it's crazy."

Yeah, crazy alright, Jason thought. So Brad is lying to Laura about his growth, huh?

Laura continued, filled with righteous indignation. "And before you ask, yes, he told me that Terry and Jim are on the same plan and yes I'm okay with all of it."

"Alright," Jason had to hope for a long shot on this one, "well then how about that girl I've seen around with them? Have you noticed that she seems to be able to grow superhuman muscles out of nowhere then just shrink right back again?"

"Brittany? You've been reading too many comics, Jason. That girl is a weakling. She can hardly lift a sandwich to her mouth to eat and I've never seen an ounce of muscle on that twig."

Jason nodded. Of course, if Brad was lying about the source of his muscle they wouldn't reveal Brittany's secret. Time for the last ditch effort. "Look, Laura. You don't need to believe me about them, that's fine. Can you please just ask them to leave me alone? I'm tired of looking over my shoulder, worrying about them hurting me."

"That's rich. You put them in the hospital, not the other way around. Now you're worried about getting hurt?" Laura sighed. "I don’t even know why I'm still talking to you. Brad doesn't want to have anything to do with you, okay. You're just being paranoid. Goodbye, Jason."

"They're lying to you, Laura!!" Jason shouted but the line was dead. And that was just how Jason felt too.

Dead.
1533111121121211221122211221122221111121.title: Beg For Your Life

choices: Nyah
Greg (Laura's bodybuilder brother)
1533111121121211221122211221122221111121.content:
It was a full ten days before Jason even set foot outside of his house again. During that time hardly slept and he ate very little, instead he just spent his time sitting by the window waiting for Brad and his gang to arrive and rip him apart. When he did sleep he had dreams in which 20 foot tall musclebound bullies chased him and toyed with him. Sometimes he even dreamed of Laura, not the big and sexy one but the one from his reality. He always felt such relief when he saw her because he knew that meant that things were back to normal but before long she would groan and begin to burst out of her clothes turning into the busty amazon from this reality. Then she would toss him like a doll at the feet of his giant tormentors.

After five days of seclusion his mother began to worry and asked Jason to come down and spend more time with her and his sister. Jason acquiesced deciding that he was feeling pretty lonely and that he could cower with dread just as well surrounded by his family just as well as he could alone. So, while he still spent most of his time in his room he would come downstairs in the afternoons and sit in the living room with Jasmine while she watched TV. In this reality his twin sister was just as much of a jock as she was in his own and watched UFC and Sportscenter pretty exclusively which Jason didn't care for but he wasn't really paying much attention so it didn't matter.

The first day he came down he was actually pleasantly surprised when Jasmine payed him a compliment.

"Whoa! Looking buff, bro," she'd said as he entered the room wearing shorts and a tank top. It was true that Jason was looking stronger than ever, his body was now 25 pounds heavier and all of it was muscle. His achingly thin body now had the sleek form and hard definition of a runner with cut abs and clearly outlined pecs.

Jason just blushed.

"Whatever you're doing keep it up," Jasmine told him. It was the first encouraging thing she had said to him in his entire life and while it felt good it was overshadowed by the threat of Brad and his pals who were much, much stronger than he would ever be.

Though he remained locked away from the world Jason did stay in communication with a few people in the outside world, primarily through text messages. Colin was very distraught that Jason wasn't coming to any band practices. Jason promised that he was still practicing, though that was initially a lie. By the end of the first week, though, Jason actually did return to his bass which he found comforting. He could just lose himself in the rhythmic strumming and actually found himself experimenting more and more. He began trying whatever came into his mind and seeing how it sounded. Most of it was terrible but occasionally he would stumble across a lick that resonated and he would work on nailing it down over and over again. Once he felt good about what he'd created he would use his phone to record it and send the file to Colin who would send back words of encouragement.

Jason also kept in contact with Nikki, or rather she kept in contact with him. He was still feeling odd about her past with Brad but even more odd with how much it bothered him. He hated himself for being so freaked out by it but he couldn't help it. Every other day or so he would receive a text from Nikki just checking in with him. He would always respond and keep a brief back and forth going for a while. As days passed he found himself missing her more and more and in the end it was his desire to see Nikki again that got him beyond his fear and back into the outside world.

They agreed to meet on the beach near Tower 17 which was close to the pier. He hoped that after an initial chat they could head to one of the restaurants that lined the pier for an impromptu date. Tower 17 was also close to the outdoor gym where the biggest and strongest bodybuilders in town went to pump and flex their muscles for an adoring public. Jason had a hunch that at least one of Brad's crew would be there, though he wasn't sure where this feeling came from. Jason's best attempt at a plan was to begin gathering whatever reconnaissance he could on his would be attackers, but he had to do so in public places where they were much less likely to come after him. He figured they probably weren't too afraid of the repercussions of beating him to a pulp, but so far they had worked to keep their super strength a secret so Jason figured they would continue to do so.

- - -

Shortly after noon Jason as approaching the agreed upon meeting spot. He saw Nikki standing in the shade of the lifeguard tower and his heart leapt into his throat. She wore a bikini with green and white stripes that accentuated her fair skin and red hair wonderfully. She she spotted him she dashed to meet him and jumped into his arms wrapping her perfect legs around his middle. Jason caught her, at first afraid that her momentum would bowl him over, he found that his new muscles weren't just for show. While he was nowhere near strong enough to make a truck-kabob he was happy to know that he could carry his girlfriend in his arms without much trouble.

Jason embraced Nikki tightly and gave her a long kiss. She pressed herself against him as tight as she could mashing her ample breasts against his hard chest and digging her fingers into his scalp. When their kiss was done she leaned back and smiled at him, it was as bright and wonderful as Jason remembered.

"I missed you," she said.

Jason opened his mouth to return the sentiment but Nikki's eyes went wide and she gasped before he could.

"My goodness you're looking strong," she said running her hands over his pecs. He'd intentionally avoided wearing a shirt specifically to show off his torso, so he was glad she'd noticed. "It looks like you've been working out nonstop since the last time I saw you." She crawled out of his arms and bent down to get a close look at his washboard stomach. "So sexy!"

Jason was glad that Nikki wasn't dwelling on the past and instead was just sliding right back into their old relationship. "Thanks, I've been pumping a little iron here and there," he lied. He noticed that Nikki's body had changed a bit as well; she looked like she'd tightened her figure up a little. Her arms were slightly slimmer, specifically her triceps had lost the bit of fat that had hung from her arm. Her stomach, too, had lost the tiny pooch she used to have and it was now a flat surface perfect for painting a new set of abs upon.

"You're looking amazing too," he said. "Very trim. Have you been in the gym a lot this past week?"

Nikki turned red and looked down. "Well, yeah," she said then quietly added, "and I haven't been eating very much so I've dropped a few pounds."

"Oh," Jason was sorry that he'd mentioned her appearance and was even somewhat embarrassed that he was so turned on by the body she'd gained by starving herself over him. "Well, let's fix that. How about some lunch?"

Nikki grinned. "Sure, let's eat. I'm going to need some fuel if I'm going to start building up these muscles like I said I would."

The pair walked arm in arm to a diner that was perched atop the pier just above where the waves were crashing on the shore. Jason sat in a booth that overlooked the sand on the far side of the pier where he could see the raised platform of the gym with two dozen or so meatheads pumping and flexing for an audience that surrounded them on all sides. Jason ignored that scene for the moment, though, there'd be time for that later. He looked instead to Nikki who was sitting with her hands laid across the table. Jason placed his own hands in hers and returned her smile.

"I'm sorry for this past week," he told her. "I just got so freaked by the realization that Brad is probably going to kill me when he gets the chance. I've been cowering in my room ever since."

Nikki's expression turned to worry. "You can't live like this. What are we going to do?"

"Well, I have a thought about that. We need information about them and what they are capable of."

"What do you mean capable of?"

Jason paused. He knew that if he told her they Brad's gang had super strength she wouldn't believe him, this was actually a part of his plan to have someone neutral witness their enhanced abilities. "Just trust me, we need info. That means someone to collect that info."

"And you have someone in mind?"

"I do," Jason said.
1533111121121211221122211221122221111121.title: Some Time Alone

choices: Greg agrees to train Nikki.

1533111121121211221122211221122221111121.content:
During his time alone Jason had lots of time to think. This was usually bad since his thoughts frequently returned to Brad and company and just how close he had come to being killed on more than once occasion. However, there were times that he was able to get his head together enough to focus on solutions. At first he saw no way out; Brad, Terry, Jim, and the girl Laura had identified as Brittany had superhuman strength and for all he knew could be getting stronger by the day. Once he was able to ignore the terror of his impending doom he realized that he didn't need to defeat any of them, not really. He had to find the source of their power: the person who had given them the strength to rip trucks in half and skewer them with telephone poles.

So when he told Nikki that he wanted to find out what Brad's gang were capable of he was mostly lying. He knew very well what they could do. What he needed was information on how they did it. The bad news was that he couldn't just ask them since he'd never live long enough to do anything with the information. His was going to need a spy and Jason's list of allies was short.

Nikki seemed like the most obvious choice since she and Brad apparently had history. She could run back to him and say that Jason had broken her heart and earn their confidence that way. Jason actually spent a whole day of his solitude trying to convince himself that this would be the only way but in the end he couldn’t bring himself to do it. After the things Brad had said and the torment Jason had put himself through he wanted to keep Nikki and her ex as far from each other as possible. Besides, they might just hurt her or hold her hostage to get Jason to come to them and that's something he could never allow to happen.

His next thought was actually Nyah. She was obviously attractive and could likely seduce information out of Jim or Terry since neither was all that bright. They would probably sell their own mothers for a good look at her enormous breasts. Jason quickly dismissed this idea though for several reasons. First Nyah was far too shy and would never let them talk her into it in a million years. Secondly Jason feared what those brutes would do to her with raging libidos and the strength to take whatever they wanted from her.

No, he would have to be smarter. He needed to find someone no one would suspect; someone he shouldn't have any ties to whatsoever. Someone who could be places that Brad was without raising an eyebrow. Jason had practically given up when it hit him: Greg. The more he thought about it the more he liked the idea. Laura's bodybuilding brother was someone that Jason didn't really have ties to, though they'd been friendly in the past. He was the sort of person that could be around Laura and her boyfriend without people wondering why. Finally Jason realized that if Brad, Terry, or Jim were going to keep up their lie about juicing they'd have to spend some time in the gym, heck they'd probably go anyway just to show off how strong they were and intimidate everyone they could. Greg's lifestyle meant he would fit in perfectly at the gym. He didn't even need to hang out with them, just near enough to pick up some info.

When the idea struck Jason rushed to his computer to find what he could about Greg. He was very aware that history had changed and he hoped that Greg was still into bodybuilding and still nearby. A quick Google search brought a jackpot of information.

"Holy shit!" Jason sat back in his computer chair as the reality of what he had done with Laura's phone became even more evident. "Whatever I did to Laura must have become a genetic mutation that she shared with her big brother." The first picture that had come up was of Greg standing on a stage in what was clearly a bodybuilding competition. He was flanked on both sides by the likes of Phil Heath, Dennis Wolf, Dexter Jackson and a dozen others that Jason had never heard of before. Greg dwarfed them all. The closest in height anyone else came was a full head shorter than Greg and no one could come close to his bulk.

A short time later Jason had discovered that most of Greg's insane size was actually accredited to what was known as The Friedman Flex. Though he was clearly taller in this world, a full 7 inches taller, in fact, most of the time Greg was apparently no more muscular than any other heavyweight bodybuilder. He was actually only slightly larger than the Greg in Jason's reality. However, Greg could make his muscles swell by insane amounts just by flexing. Clearly the expansion ability Jason had bestowed upon Laura was shared among siblings (Jason had briefly wondered what Laura's sister Vanessa looked like in this reality but stopped himself from checking lest he get distracted). In fact, from what Jason had read it seemed that Greg's expansion ability was far more effective than Laura's.

"I guess you just can't help but get overshadowed by your brother, even when things are stacked in your favor, eh Laura?" Jason said. He eventually found a few videos on YouTube of Greg demonstrating his sinewy pliability. Jason watched as Greg flexed a bicep that some unseen pair of hands measured at 21 inches.

"Impressive, right?" Greg asked in the video. "Well watch this!" He extended his arm and flexed again with a deep grunt. It was like a bomb went off inside his arm blowing it up to impossible girth. "What's it say now?"

A woman's voice dripping with awe spoke, "Uh… wow. Ok, looks like you're just a hair shy of 32 inches."

"Really?" Greg sounded disappointed. He squeezed harder and roared louder. "AAAAHHHHH!!! How about now?"

"32 and a quarter."

"Yeah, baby. Now we're talkin'!" He turned his head and kissed the enormous peak just as the video ended.

"That's the guy I need to help us." Jason had said.

- - -


"Greg? Why do you want to talk to Greg?" Nikki asked between bites. Their food had just arrived and she was stuffing her face with both hands. Jason guessed it was really true that she hadn't eaten much recently.

"He's the only person I can think of that can get close to Brad and his douchey pals without them immediately assuming I sent him." Jason said. His attention kept getting pulled to the outdoor gym on the beach. A larger crowd was gathering around the raised stage and something about it made him worry.

He looked back at Nikki who was deep in thought. Finally she nodded. "Okay, I'm in. I know where he likes to hang out and I still talk with his girlfriend from time to time."

"Wait, I don’t think you should get too involved in th-"

"Jason," she cut him off. "Greg hardly knows you. He and I get along a heck of a lot better. I could probably even get him and Sara to meet me for a few training sessions. Maybe I'll get some honest to goodness pointers in the meantime, huh?" She smiled seductively and ran a food up Jason's leg.

Jason wanted to say something else in protest but Nikki was already lost in new thoughts.

Nikki flexed her arm revealing a surprisingly plump little bicep. "Can you imagine if I had a body like Sara?" She shivered with excitement.

"I don't like this, it wasn't what I had planned. I wanted to keep you and Brad away from each other." Jason regretted the words the moment they were out of his mouth.

"Is that what this is about? You still think I've got a thing for Brad? Don't you trust that I love you? Do you think I'm just some horny bimbo that'll drop you the moment Brad asks me to?"

Jason dropped his head. "That's not what I meant. It's just… he's dangerous, Nikki. Him and his buddies. Brittany especially."

"Brittany? A strong enough breeze could knock that girl over."

Jason saw her in his mind with arms bulging as she easily lifted a thousand pounds, the insane, gleeful look in her eye as she moved to crush him beneath it. "She's gotten tougher."

Nikki sighed. "Look, I appreciate that you're worried about me but I can't just sit here while they look for new ways to kill you. Besides, I'll have Greg with me for protection."

As big and strong as Greg was, Jason was sure it wouldn’t be enough. But since he had no choice he gave in and agreed to do it Nikki's way. Meanwhile on the beach the crowd around the platform broke into loud applause. A loud speaker announcement echoed across the beach that someone had broken an all time lifting record. Jason had 3 guesses as to who it could have been.

For a split second Jason remembered what it was like when he was likely the biggest and strongest person on the planet, before he'd screwed up the whole universe. He desperately missed his enormous muscles which would have given him more than enough strength to level these two jokers. Instead all he had was a glass bottle and a desire to live to see those giant muscles again.

As soon as he raised his drink to his lips one of the assholes lunged at him with knife extended. Jason was prepared for this and he sidestepped the blade easily. He adjusted his grip on the glass bottle and swung with all of his might aiming for Asshole No. 1's skull. He made perfect contact and the bottle shattered across the jock's head leaving a deep gash that instantly overflowed with blood. Asshole 1 fell to the ground so hard and fast that Jason wondered for a split second if he had killed him.

Jason started to turn towards Asshole No. 2 when he realized that the broken pieces of glass in his hand were too small and useless as a weapon. He looked down to verify this and then realized his mistake. He saw Asshole 2's hand speed towards his side then make contact. The knife went in so fast Jason could hardly feel it. He even had enough time to convince himself that he wasn't going to scream which made him glad; he didn't want to give this bottom feeding shit stain the satisfaction. Then Asshole 2 turned the knife and white hot pain erupted through Jason's entire torso. He screamed out so loud he thought his vocal chords would rip apart. In the end, however, it was the scream that saved his life because several people in the buildings that lined the alley called the police.

Jason took more punishment but he didn't feel it. Shortly after being stabbed he blacked out and fell to the ground. The next thing he saw as a television screen. It was mounted high on the far wall which instantly informed him that he was in the hospital. He didn't feel like moving and didn't for a very long time. He just stared at the screen watching some daytime talk show where vapid people discussed what kind of lettuce various celebrities preferred on their salads. Jason stared at the screen for a while without really watching and before he knew it he was watching some small claims courtroom show. For a long time he refused to move but then Jason realized that the channels were changing. Someone was channel surfing which meant he wasn't alone.

Jason flopped his head to the left and saw...
1533111121121211221122212.title: Poor, Poor Jason

choices: Jason tells Monica the truth.
Jason tells Monica to leave.
15331111211212112211222122.content:
If there was any indication that Monica had been watching the television or changing the channels Jason couldn't find it. She sat in a chair facing Jason's hospital bed with her face buried in her phone. Upon seeing Jason move she glanced at him for a scone before her eyes returned to whatever she was doing. She wore denim pants rolled up to her shapely calves, a pink button up shirt and Converse low tops.

"Finally, you're awake." Monica said with a combination of sarcasm and disdain that could only come from a teenage girl.

"How long have you been here?" Jason asked. His voice was weak, but he was relieved to find it wasn't painful to speak.

"Long enough to get bored and sneak a peak at your big ol' cock." Monica leveled her eyes at Jason and shot him a devilish grin then slipped back into bored teenager mode.

For his part Jason was too exhausted to feel violated, but he reminded himself to be outraged later. "Is that all you did?" He laid back and stared at the ceiling. He'd never considered himself to be well endowed. He'd always assumed he was average, and since he was never confident enough to get with a girl much less get naked in front of one, he had never received the news.

"I gotta say, it's really nice. I don't know what it is, but it really turns me on. I mean I've been with a guy twice your size but he was an Alterator, that's what we call ourselves, so it wasn't real. And it's not like there's anything I could do with something that size anyway. But yours is natural, you know, and-"

"What are you doing here Monica?" Jason couldn't take any more of her rambling. "Because if I have to sit here and listen to a 16 year old girl go on and on about my penis I may just jump out the window."

Monica was quiet. Jason was afraid he'd pushed her over the edge so he turned to face her again and looked her in the eye. "Look, I'm sorry. I'm just in a lot of pain and I wasn't prepared to see you. Much less to learn you were.. you know.. looking at me."

Monica rolled her eyes. "You are waaay to uptight about your body." Jason could see just a hint of a smile on the corners of her mouth that told him she forgave his outburst.

"Speaking of bodies," Jason said, "you've made some more changes." He hadn't noticed at first, but when he focused more he could see the changes she'd made like double vision. Her lips were fuller and her neck a little longer and more slender. Her bust was slightly more rounded and fuller while her waist curved in slightly more. Every one of these changes was visible to him in both their new and old state like she was two people occupying the same space. No more was this more apparent than her knees. Instead of two it was as though she had four. One pair of knees was a good two inches offset from the other. It was clear that she'd made herself taller, but it looked as though it was only in her legs. He had to stop looking for changes and relax his eyes because he was getting dizzy seeing double.

"Well, yeah! They've announced that unless the 'technical issues' they're experiencing are solved they're shutting down the servers is less than a week. I've had to speed things up a bit while still trying to be believable."

"And how is growing..." Jason paused and looked her up and down, "what, four inches taller in a few days? How is that believable?"

"You think I'm some amateur? I've been wearing lifts and high heels for months now." She held up the flat soled sneaker for Jason to see. "If anything people will think that I've shrunk. Now I've got to find a way to squeeze another two inches in before next Friday."

"Yeah, you got it rough."

Monica crossed her arms tightly across her chest. "I'm not the moron who ruined the whole thing, am I?"

It was Jason's turn to be silent, but he knew no apology would be forthcoming from Monica. Finally he decided he would have to speak first. "If it makes you feel any better I got stabbed."

Monica broke eye contact and looked off into space to her right. "Actually you were stabbed five times."

"Oh," Jason looked at his chest and stomach still covered by the sheets of the bed and realized that he really didn't want to see what was causing the constant dull throbbing down there. "So, what are you doing here?"

"Well, I was doing a little research on your problem. It may be possible to fix everything, but you have to tell me exactly how you got here. What did you do that caused your paradox?"

Jason sat for a moment in thought. He wasn't sure he could trust Monica, but he also felt as though she was hiding something. He was sure she had personal motives in wanting to repair things so she could continue using the app, but it felt like there was something bigger going on. Why would she go to the trouble of tracking him down after showing so much disdain for him the last time the met?

Monica was clearly getting impatient. "Come on and spill it, your girlfriend has been coming by and checking on you everyday. She could be here any minute."

"My girlfr-?"

"The redhead with the nice legs," Monica said. Then she grinned and crossed her own insanely long pins, running her hands along her denim wrapped thighs. "You know, relatively speaking. So spill it!"
15331111211212112211222122.title: Monica

Laura, looking angry
153311112112121122112221221.content:
Jason stared at her for a moment, not willing to trust her completely, but not wanting to lose the best source of information he had about this reality.

“I don’t understand why telling you about what I did can help fix things. How can you do that?”

Monica sighed and stared at him, deciding, apparently, just how much she wanted to tell him.

“Well for one thing, those of us who have real access to the ap are limited to a small community and the makers have already cut back on our options. But if they are going to shut it down, some people are prepared to make some bigger changes, disregarding the written requirements.”

Jason looked confused. “So? While I understand your own desire to be a supermodel, do the makers of the ap have control over the users? Can they cancel everything?”

Monica let out a frustrated sniff. “We don’t know. But if I can give them information about your paradox, then maybe everything will go back to normal.”

Monica paused as she sized up Jason again. “And besides, who said anything about just being a supermodel. I’ve seen your friend Laura Friedman.”

Jason grunted. “She’s not my friend.”

Monica rolled her eyes. “Sure she’s not. But tell me, if she’s not an Alterator, how did she get to be so big and so hot? I mean she’s got sponsors lined up based on her incredible strength, muscles and beauty. And the way her biceps grow when she flexes them…. It seems a bit unreal. Was that her phone you used to change yourself?”

Jason tried to maintain a blank expression and not give anything away. Monica seemed to know more than she was letting on. He knew clearly that it was when he changed Laura and hit historical that the paradox kicked into gear. If he admitted it to Monica, what would she do? What would the makers of the ap do? If his profile were unlocked, could he become massive again? The biggest problem was he didn’t trust her. He hoped Nikki would return soon.

“Laura has just grown that way for all I know. Maybe someone else tried to change me at the same time I was working myself and caused the paradox.”

Monica leaned forward; her sexy cleavage spilling ever so slightly forward against the shirt, stressing the buttons. Her gaze became more focused, giving Jason an uneasy feeling.

“Look, we can either do this the easy way or the hard way. I know the person you wanted to be, the guy with the huge muscles. And it’s clear that you knew Laura Friedman. I’m thinking after you changed yourself you changed her to be your big beefy girlfriend. Or was it the other way around? Now why don’t you just step me through it so the paradox can be fixed.”

Jason’s pulse raced and he now felt very uncomfortable and had a growing sense of fear. He had to wonder just what this girl was capable of.

“If you know so much, why do you need me to admit to anything? What difference could that make?”

Monica leaned back slightly and seemed to be tensing her muscles as her expression remained hard. Jason could have sworn her shirt looked tighter than it did just minutes ago.

“I’m beginning to think you had a special version of the ap. There were rumors of ones with historical buttons, ones that could slip into a paradox with one simple change. If someone used the button correctly nobody would ever know things changed. Paradoxes can still occur if a person makes dramatic, instantaneous changes, but it’s harder. So Jason, which one was it? What did you do?”

He dug through his pockets and pulled out his key ring. Same Batman logo key ring (The iconic 70s style yellow oval with Black bat) same house key, the spare key to his moms car that she never let him drive, what were these other keys? Jason usually only had one other key on his key ring, the key to the lock his desk drawer. There were a handful of other keys he didn't recognize and he tried these in his door until one managed to unlock it.

Jason felt like he was stepping into an episode of the Twilight zone. "God damn.... I AM a stalker," he breathed as he quietly closed and locked the door behind him. His walls were covered with pictures of Laura. Some were cut out of magazines or newspaper, most were photos that had been printed on computer paper. A breathtaking shot of a topless Laura framed by a willow tree by a small pond was over his bed. This picture of Laura had been blown up to poster size and was on glossy paper. She was looking off in the distance, her face turned mostly away from the camera with one arm crossed over her breasts, the other pointing at something out of frame. Despite her face being in profile her body was facing the camera and she was standing relaxed, a tight pair of jeans unbuttoned and pulled open to reveal a hint of lace panties underneath. Jason cleared his throat and turned away from the poster, pointedly ignoring his stiff member. He did a double take when he realized what he was looking at now. A picture of Laura dominated the center of the board and around it were pictures of who Jason assumed her friends and family were. Hand drawn arrows swirled around them, all eventually connecting back to Laura. Post it notes clung to many of the pictures and some had notes scribbled directly on them. The question to where the extra keys came from was answered when Jason saw that every drawer on his desk had a padlock affixed to it.

“What am I hiding from the world?” He muttered as he unlocked the drawers. Each drawer was stuffed full of spiral notebooks and Jason groaned as he flipped through them. “Isn’t it bad enough that I’m a stalker without being a crazed journal writer on top of it?”

He paused to read an entry about Laura and her sister going shopping, then another, and another. “Huh, Laura and her sister were never this close in my reality.” Another entry talked about Laura and her “best friend” Nikki. “Who the fuck is Nikki?” Jason glanced up at the corkboard and quickly found Nikki, a cute girl with a big smile, curly going on frizzy red hair and a light dash of freckles across her nose. A great many of the arrows led back to Nikki before connecting to Laura. “Right, hi Nikki.”

Jason slapped closed the notebook he had been reading and lay back on his bed. He was startled but not entirely surprised that another poster quality shot of Laura was staring down at him, this one was probably taken with her swimming in the same pond that was in the other poster. She was standing in water up to her bust with her enormous breasts cradled in both arms, creating mind boggling cleavage almost up to her chin. Her smile was stunning and droplets of water sparkled around her head. “This is making it REALLY difficult to concentrate.” Jason sighed and reached for the bottle of lotion.
