Jason took a few minutes away from reading to try sketching out the paradox as he understood it.

"Laura and I used to be best friends," Jason started by drawing a straight line from the word "Friends." "This went on for literally years until she downloaded this app on her iPhone." He placed a question mark on the line and labeled it "App." After thinking he went back and marked "iPhone" on the line as well, between "friends" and "app." He frowned. "I don't know if she ever used the app before I found her phone." He thought about the scrawny frame and abysmal body image he could remember Laura having before he found the phone. "Probably not," he decided. But he put another question mark next to "App," this one he labeled "Lauras uses app?" He tapped the notepad with his pencil and leaned his head back to think then scowled when he realized he was staring at "Ceiling Laura" again. "You're not helping," he growled, returning to his sketch. "What about Greg or Vanessa?" Jason stacked two more question marks over Lauras and added "Greg or Vanessa use app?" Greg and Vanessa were nigh legendary pinnacles of development, it seemed much more likely that one or both of them got their hands on Lauras phone and App before Jason did. But if so there was no way of knowing. He racked his brain, struggling to think of any way he could know for sure if they had. Finally he pulled up the app on his own phone and opened Vanessa’s profile. He momentarily pondered the irony that Vanessa, who he had lusted after for her raw sex appeal as far back as he could remember now did almost nothing for him. He studied her profile in detail, trying to figure out if there was a way to tell if she had been previously modified. Not seeing anything overt he swapped over to his own profile and studied it. “Aha,” he muttered, noting a tiny notation next to his name. “Revision 1.” He went back to Vanessa, then to Greg. “Revision zero. Damn, you two really did win the genetic lottery didn’t you?” Going back to Laura he verified she was also at Revision 1. “So if she did use it before I did it wasn’t on herself. Interesting.” Jason put a notation under the stack of question marks. “Not on selves.” “And here’s where it gets crazy,” Jason drew a loop back over the timeline and labeled it “I use the app.” “But I didn’t wreck anything until…” Jason added another loop that diverged completely from the timeline that he labeled “I use the app on Laura.” So if I get her past to change so that she buys an iPhone instead of sticking with her ancient Nokia it fixes everything right? He drew “iPhone” on the new timeline then linked the two lines together with a question mark. “This is giving me a headache,” Jason tore the timeline sheet out of the notebook and put it over the picture of Laura that was in the center of the corkboard. “But I think I got it. I need to somehow alter someone in Laurra’s family in a historical way such that it would cause her to buy an iPhone.”

Jason pored through more entries detailing shopping trips with Vanessa and eventually work out trips to the gym with Greg. He looked around at the pictures of Laura, noting again the muscularity he had given her on top of the generous bust line. It made sense she would get training tips from her brother. “Maybe I’m being selfish here,” Jason said out loud, addressing “Ceiling Laura”. “I mean look at you, you’re gorgeous, your relationship with your brother and sister is better than it ever was in the other world. You have a lot of friends... and fuckbuddies... Maybe I shouldn’t mess with it. I mean I can take this App and make any woman just as hot as you or even hotter (even as he said it he doubted it was possible) and hell, I can even make her madly in love with me. Jason closed his eyes and massaged his temples, trying to wish away the stress headache he was getting. “I just don’t know,” he said finally.

Jason glanced over at Laura, who looked relieved to be away from the clutches of her big sister. At least for a few hours anyway.

“You know she wants me there just so she can be compared herself to her little sister and maintain her dominance. She’ll have several large men there as well. At least she hasn’t made me her personal assistant like Greg. I really feel sorry for him.”

Jason sighed. He really had messed things up. But maybe he could fix them. He at least wanted to try his theory out.

“How about we head to a gym instead of the comic book shop.”

Laura slowly turned toward Jason with a curious look on her face.

“The gym? Why would you want to go to the gym now? I’d rather lose myself in the comic books for a while before the afternoon show.”

Jason bit his lip. “I have a, uh, theory I’d like to try out. Can you indulge me for a short time? I promise if nothing happens then we can leave right away and head to the comic book store.”

Laura chuckled. “Well aren’t we mysterious today. OK, take the next left up ahead. We can head to my sister’s gym. It will be closed today, so we can have it all to ourselves.”

Jason let out a sigh of relief. He was happy he got Laura to chuckle. For the first time since he started messing with things, she reacted like the old Laura. Jason bit his lip, wanting to know more about this reality without asking something he should already know. Sighing and figuring there wasn’t really much harm, he glanced over at Laura.

“So how have things been with Vanessa recently?”

Laura sighed. “Well, you know, more of the same I guess. Every since she turned 17 and started working out with Greg she’s continued to grow stronger. Funny how Greg was condescending toward her back then, making fun of her little fitness muscles and girlish strength. Boy does he regret that now. It was pretty incredible back then to watch her grow stronger and see her confidence grow as well. I still remember the day Vanessa invited me out to the gym to watch her out lift Greg. And that was the day she showed everyone how she could flex up her muscles with her expansion ability. Her arms were huge even back then. I remember being so proud of her, even if she did give Greg a hard time. If we only knew what was coming…”

Laura paused as turned to look out the window. Jason was about to say something when Laura continued.

“We all knew Vanessa was very pretty, but it was as if lifting weights and growing more muscular only made her more beautiful. And while her grades in high school were OK, during her physical transformation she turned into a genius. She started marketing herself and was soon running fashion, work-out equipment and other on line businesses. The more Vanessa put everything together with her beauty, body and intelligence, the more arrogant she became at home. Soon we were all working for her, our parents, me, and especially Greg. She never forgave him for his earlier actions and after breaking his records, his ego and several bones, he’s given in and is now practically her slave.”

Laura looked ahead to point to Jason where to turn before continuing.

“And I thought she would have been excited for me when I started to show the same abilities at 17, just like her. But she saw me as a threat I guess. When my breasts grew larger than hers, she had me get them reduced. When my hair lightened to a golden color, she made me color it back to brown. I grew prettier and smarter as I grew stronger, but not quite in her league. And unfortunately, it doesn’t seem that I will ever to get to her strength or expansion abilities, not that I haven’t tried. My expansion ability seems pretty fixed, which keeps it well below Vanessa’s.”

As they pulled into the empty parking lot, they got out of the car and headed toward the door. As Laura pulled out the keys she turned to Jason to continue.

“I’ve been working out hard, Jason. More than you, Vanessa or anyone knows. Yet it seems that while I can still grow stronger, I’m not even keeping up with Vanessa’s gains, much less catching up. I increase my best lifts by ten or twenty pounds and she increases hers by a fifty. Today I expect her to bench over two tons and curl more than 1500 pounds, with one arm no less. How do you keep up with that?”

As Jason followed her into the gym, she gave him a sad looking smile. “But for you Jason, I can at least show you what my gains have been. They’re actually quite impressive, although I tend to lower them around Vanessa.”

Jason stood at the curling station as Laura headed for the locker to change. He stayed there for a while taking everything in. How close were they now? She seemed willing to give the kind of quick summing up he wanted. Surely he should have known much of this, shouldn’t he? As he continued to think, still wondering if his plan or at least his thought that he could possibly alter things would work, Laura came out of the locker room. Jason gasped as Laura was sporting a gray athletic bra, tight gray biker shorts and white athletic shoes. Her long muscular legs, hard 6 pack abs, broad shoulders, wide lats, thick bodybuilder pecs and meaty, bulging arms made her look every bit the high end super athlete he had originally envisioned and programmed into the phone, even without the oversized breasts. At 5 foot 11 and nearly 200 pounds of large, lean muscle she actually looked better proportioned with smaller breasts and her body looked harder and a bit larger than he thought it would, including the oversized arms. Laura smiled at his slack jawed stare.

“I’m glad you approve. You haven’t been to the gym with me in like forever.”

Walking up to Jason, Laura crossed her large arms under her thick chest and tensed her biceps, causing them to expand up to their programmed 20 inch circumference. Or were they bigger? Before he could contemplate that, Laura noticed him staring and cleared her throat.

“Ahem, my arms are now nearly 21 inches around thanks to my work-outs and can expand up to 27. But now that you know that, why did you want me to come to the gym? What is this theory of yours?”

Jason blushed for a moment as he stared into Laura’s eyes. He weighed his options and decided to start with a question.

“Has anyone come up with a logic explanation as to just how Vanessa or you for that matter, can be that strong and expand your muscles like you can?”

Laura unfolded her arms and cocked her head slightly. “No, not really. I can’t speak for what they’ve told Vanessa, but I’m definitely stronger than someone with my body type should be. The doctors simply have given in to some type of genetic mutation. Seeing as we’re both healthy and haven’t asked for further tests I guess nobody else is curious enough to try and force the issue.”

Laura sniffed. “Like anyone could force Vanessa to do anything anymore.”

Jason turned and scratched his head. “Well maybe the explanation isn’t all that easy.”

Laura narrowed her eyes. “What do you mean?”

Jason let out a long sigh. “Do you have a tape measure?”

Laura shook her head. “Are you kidding? Vanessa has them practically everywhere. There’s one on the bench behind you.”

Jason turned, nodded his head and picked it up. “OK, can you do some alternating bicep curls?”

Laura laughed. “You don’t start with your arms for a work-out. Well, unless you’re Vanessa.”

Jason pulled his arms out to try and explain. “Well, this is an experiment after all. If this doesn’t work right away we can do something different.”

He could tell Laura was suspicious, but she walked toward the rack of weights along the wall and picked up two rather large ones. Jason glanced on down the line to see that the rack actually moved out and even had larger weights at the end that read 2 tons. Those must be for Vanessa he mused. Was Vanessa already anticipating curling that much weight? As Jason walked over toward Laura he noticed she was holding 350 pound weights in each hand and his eyes widened. Laura smiled at him as she turned toward the full length mirror.

“Impressive, no? I’m stronger than any man now. Yet I’m a distant second in my own house.”

Jason looked on as Laura readied herself to curl the weights. He took a few breaths and started to concentrate. What if Laura were as strong as her sister? Stronger. What if her muscles were as big and her expansion ability was even greater? Could he really affect Laura as he thought he did for Vanessa?

As Laura pulled the weight up with her right arm, Jason found that..

“So is this a pretty cool ap?”

Jason sniffed. “You could say that.”

Laura chuckled. “Ooooooh, mysterious.”

Jason thought about telling Laura what he knew. Or what he thought he knew. Would she believe him? Would she be able to fix the paradox and perhaps bring them back to what he remembered as “normal”? Laura smiled as the phone pinged.

“OK, download complete. Let me open this puppy up.”

Laura’s soon looked confused. “What is this supposed to do? It looks like I can pull up different people. I entered my old contacts and it looks like I can pick one. Hey, how about you?”

Laura did so as Jason craned his neck to look at the picture. It was him as he was now. Different than the one on his phone in which he was the large man he had once been, but on hold by the ap due to the paradox he created. Unfortunately, the same warning soon popped up.

***This profile is currently read only. This profile cannot be modified due to an unresolved paradox***

“Shoot!” Jason cursed in frustration as Laura looked at him funny.

“Paradox? What’s going on? You must have this ap. Is there some sort of problem with it?”

Jason paused. He didn’t want to go back to the beginning and explain that it was Laura’s own IPhone back in his old reality that started this, seeing as he borrowed it to change himself and change Laura without her permission. The fact that the profiles weren’t in synch only seemed to make things worse. He wasn’t sure things could ever be fixed. As he looked up after staring at the phone while thinking, Laura was still staring at him and was looking impatient. Jason sighed, putting his thoughts together.

Jason pushed his arms out and lied. “No. No. You were cool with it. But once I did so, you didn’t remember anything and were really weird. You didn’t like me and were, well promiscuous.”

Laura nearly growled. “You changed Vanessa?

“Yes, it was the only option I could think of at the time. You have to realize this is all very strange. It kind of fixed things, but not enough I guess.”

Laura looked at him skeptically. “So what were the old Vanessa and I like?”

Jason wasn’t sure he wanted to continue, but figured there was no real reason to lie even if he did risk making Laura mad. “You were shorter and much smaller. No real breasts, skinny. I had made myself bigger and we, uh wanted the same for you.”

Laura let out a short laugh, which to Jason indicated she still didn’t believe him. “Funny, I don’t remember that at all.”

“I know. Think how I felt when we were no longer friends. So in my attempt to correct the paradox I changed your sister. She used to be curvy and build like a supermodel. She didn’t have any muscle to speak of.”

Laura grunted. “So first you make me stronger than Vanessa and as strong as Greg, except for my arms with are stronger. Then you make Vanessa bigger and stronger than me. Why?”

Jason sighed with frustration. “To try and fix the paradox. But it didn’t work.”

“Why would you want me small and weak?”

Jason sighed. “I don’t. But I can’t affect myself to at least be your equal in size. And you can’t either.”

Laura’s arms dropped and her expression softened. “Well you do have to understand if this all appears to be unreal. But having read enough sci fi through the years, it certainly has been written about. And the phone does say paradox.”

Jason nodded, happy that at least she wasn’t going to toss him out his own car. He moved his eyes back her phone.

“Have you tried Vanessa?”

Laura shook her head and pulled up Vanessa.

***This profile is currently read only. This profile cannot be modified due to an unresolved paradox***

Jason cursed again. “Damn.”

“Ow. Stop it Supergirl.”

"Thanks," he said, truly appreciating the sentiment even if he didn't fully understand it.

"Cold, are we?" She asked running her fingers over his skin.

Jason grabbed her around the waist and pulled her body close to his. "Not as long as you're here to keep me warm." He planted a firm kiss square on her lips while he sent his hands down her back to her firm butt.

Nikki moaned approvingly, "Thank you for a fun evening. I think you really knocked Laura off balance. She's not used to guys postponing her attention like that.

Jason leaned against Nikki's car and shrugged. "It's not a big deal. She's a person like anyone else, she's just got that crazy muscley trick."

"I like your crazy muscley trick better." Nikki put her hands on Jason's pecs.

"Me too." Jason made his chest bounce up and down to Nikki's delight.

They got into Nikki's car and she drove to an old gym that looked like a family owned business. The place was dark and obviously closed for the night. She parked on the street and looked at Jason.

"Thank you again," she said placing a hand on his leg.

Jason wasn't sure why they were stopping here so he made a joke hoping to find some truth. "Care for a late night workout?"

Nikki's smile was electric and her green eyes sparkled. "That's very tempting. I do know the guy who owns the building." Her hand moved up to Jason's bare chest. "I'm sure I could convince him to let us in." She paused and her smile faded. "But I'm afraid I have to work early and I don't have any work clothes at your place. But I'll take a rain check."

Jason was watching closely and when she said the words "your place" her eyes had darted to the windows above the gym. Jason looked up and spotted what must have been his apartment. Jason's frustration grew a bit; just this morning he had been living at home with his mother, how could he now be living in an apartment above a gym? And did he really own the building? A lot had changed when he'd bobbled his phone at the tailors today.

"How about tomorrow?" Nikki asked.

"Sure," Jason said. "I don't think I have anything on my schedule."

They kissed and Jason stepped out of the car. He stood on the sidewalk and waved as Nikki drove away then turned to face the mysterious building. He peered into the gym for a moment but didn't see anything distinctive or familiar about it. Instead he went to the door that led upstairs to the apartments above. At the top of the stairs Jason found four doors. There were two on opposite sides of him by the stairway and two more facing each other at the end of the hall. Jason fished his keys out of his pocket and found two that he was unfamiliar with. One was big and brass and looked too large to fit any of the doors before him. The other was smaller and silver and looked like a house key.

Jason stood still and tried to will himself to know which door was the one to his apartment but couldn't remember. He supposed if he quietly guessed wrong the occupants wouldn't notice so he crept to the first door on his left and gingerly slid the key into the lock. He practically did a celebratory dance when the key turned and the door opened.

Moments later he felt a bit silly because it became very apparent that it wouldn't have mattered which door he had tried. Yes, he must have owned the entire building because where there should have been a wall separating his apartment from the next there was instead open space that flowed right through. Jason walked down and turning a corner found a similar open space connecting the second apartment to the third one which then lead to the fourth. Instead of owning two one bedroom apartments and two two bedroom apartments he instead had one huge six bedroom apartment. The layout of the place meant that he had four separate kitchens (two of which seemed devoted solely to piles of beef and boneless chicken breasts) but to his pleasant surprise he found that two of the bathrooms had been combined so that it now had a giant sized shower that accommodated his enormous frame.

The place was filled bursting with everything Jason loved, everywhere there were movie poster and nerdy art all over the walls. Jason found one of the bedrooms had been turned into a reading room with tons of books and comics stocked on shelves from floor to ceiling. There were various figures and replicas including a full sized batsuit. Another bedroom had a massive plasma screen television hanging on the wall with couches and easy chairs spread around. Jason noticed a rather sophisticated sound system had been installed and the closet was packed with movies and video games.

The one thing Jason didn't find anywhere was any weight equipment. At first he found it strange that someone with a body like his didn't at least keep some weights around. Then he found what looked to be his bedroom and remembered the complete gym below. In the corner opposite his giant king sized bed was an opening in the floor twice as big around as he was and a fire pole that gave direct access to the lower floor.

Jason slid down the pole and found himself at the back of the dark gym near a mirrored wall and rack after rack of free weights. He surveyed the place with pride then looked for a way back up to his home but didn't see one. He glanced back up at the opening in the ceiling that led to his bedroom and realized the way. Jason gripped the steel pole and began lifting himself up letting his legs dangle freely. He climbed hand over hand pulling his 300+ pounds with incredible ease until he was back on the second floor again.

"I don't know where I got the money for all of this, but this is pretty much the coolest life I could imagine." Jason told his reflection in a full body mirror that hung from the far wall. "As annoying as it is to live constantly confused this house, this body," he flexed his towering biceps, "and Nikki way more than make up for it."

Jason suddenly felt very tired. He slid out of his pants and opted to sleep naked. He approached his bed and noticed a black hardbound book on the nightstand with a yellow post-it note attached to the cover. Written on the note in his own handwriting was a word very familiar to a computer nerd like himself: "Readme." Jason flipped through the book and found it was a journal he'd been keeping. At last this could be exactly what he needed to get some more information about his own life. He was tempted to start reading right away but also felt like he should wait until the morning when he could focus better. But then it was always possible that if he didn't read now something would come up and he'd never be able to get caught up. And of course there was still some paradox looming that could possibly have effects on him and others; he thought back to the email that gave him the link to the Alterations app that mentioned exactly that. Did he still need to fix things? He thought so.

What's a mega buff hunk to do?

Then he opened the front cover and a handwritten letter fell out that sent a shiver down his spine and led him to believe that’s exactly why the book was there. It read:

“Dear whoever you may be,

Over the last 6 months my life has become exponentially better but it has also become increasingly obvious that it is not my life. I was never supposed to have the body I have nor the fame that came with it. I’m unnaturally strong, even for my size, and that power doesn’t really belong to me. And then there’s Nikki. I don’t think

The bottom line is that you, whoever you are, have been getting closer and closer. You’re here to take back the life that is yours. I’ve been myself less and less and one day I’ll be completely you. I’ve become alright with that but you need to know that there’s a bigger problem. This world is sick and I don’t know what caused it or how to fix it. I’ve left my journal for you so that it might help you figure out where things went wrong. I put a few notes on important events (and the ones I keep dreaming about) so that maybe you can see where things took a turn. I have my suspicions but I don’t dare make them known.

Take care of Nikki for me. She’ll need someone strong, both physically and spiritually, to face what’s coming.

-Jason”

Jason read the note over and over. It felt so impossible but it was clearly in his own handwriting and the description of becoming someone else mirrored the feelings he’d been having of another person taking control. Perhaps it was just the echos of the Jason before fading away.

He read through the journal but nothing really stood out to him as significant. It was clear that he had major crush on Laura, but who wouldn’t with her body and abilities. It appeared that Laura never really returned the feelings and though she and Jason were friends they never dated or even kissed. One major change was the presence of Vanessa; now that she was into the more nerdy side of life she was a major part of their group. Apparently she and Jason had been a couple back when he was 15 and she was 16. A picture of the two of them at some school formal was tucked into the pages of the book and Jason looked at it with a huge smile; in it Jason wore a tux and was painfully skinny. Vanessa was fairly slender as well, not yet developing the juicy muscles that came from her time as a cheerleader or on the track team, though her breasts were already very well developed. Her tight dress accentuated the curves of her chest and put her cleavage on proud display.

Jason continued to flip through the journal. There were a few spots that had been bookmarked with post-its and he opened to the first of these. Written on the yellow note were the words “first meeting.” The entry was from several years ago when he had been 14 years old and Laura 13. It outlined the story of how Laura and Jason had met Nikki. Apparently he and Laura had been walking home when Laura spotted Nikki who had fallen while crossing the street and was about to be run over by an oncoming truck. Laura, without even thinking, sprang into action, her muscles erupting on her tiny frame shredding her pants and ripping through her shirt. Laura managed to scoop up the injured Nikki and carry her to safety. Nikki was fine, though scared, and instantly became a part of their clique.

Jason put the book down. Obviously he had no memories of that event since it had occurred in a different reality to his own but there was a strange familiarity to the story. Suddenly he remembered that when he had been in middle school he’d heard about a girl who’d been killed when she’d been hit by a truck. He’d never known her name but it was obvious that it had to have been Nikki. It was the only way to explain why he’d never known her. He put the book down and rolled over to find his phone. He opened the Alterations app and pulled up Nikki’s profile. He spotted the status once more, “expired” crossed out and “active” next to it. He nodded. “Hello paradox.”

Jason spent nearly two hours going through the journal trying to find some sort of evidence that he was wrong, instead he found the opposite. There was another post-it bookmark on an entry dated a little less than a year ago. The post-it had the note “Deja vu” written on it. Jason gathered that by this time he and Nikki were dating and while the two of them were walking around town with Laura and Vanessa Nikki fell into the street and was nearly run over by a truck. Just as before Laura, with her enhanced strength, was able to save the redhead from harm.

“Ok,” Jason said aloud collecting his thoughts, “clearly in my reality Nikki was dead but in this one, where Laura was strong enough to save her, she’s alive. That’s not really a paradox though, it is? I mean the coincidence of nearly being hit by a truck twice is clear and perhaps the universe really is trying to correct itself, but that’s still not a paradox. Right?” He looked across the room to his reflection in the floor to ceiling mirror but received no comfort. Each prospect was scary: either NIkki being alive was the problem and he was destined to lose her or there was something even bigger looming. He returned to the book to see if any other clues could be garnered.

The next few entries were pretty bland but then a few days after Laura had saved Nikki for the second time Jason found a page of text that could have only been written in anger. Scratched out words, foul language, and stabbing penmanship let him know that something big had gone down. The only phrase that Jason could make out was “Thank god that fucking bitch is gone from our lives for good.” There wasn’t another entry until 5 days later at which point Laura was never mentioned again. It seemed a safe assumption that this was the falling out he and Laura had gone through that led everyone else to walk on eggshells at the gala earlier in the evening, and likely the same one that had caused his strange panic attack.

Jason ready a little more finding entries from 6 months ago when he and NIkki had started working out together. He smiled to himself as he read, “I know that I probably won’t be able to get very big or strong but I told Nikki that I want to be able to protect her should she need it. I guess every little bit helps and who know’s, maybe someday I can be as big as Greg.”

Satisfied that he had received plenty of answers, some of which he could do without, Jason closed the journal and lay down. Images of his beautiful Nikki in various forms of danger floated through his mind and sleep was a long time in coming.

Laura stood there, taller as well thanks to the Ap at 5 foot 10 and as beefy as a large male bodybuilder. She had on a thick tank top that hugged her large upper body. Her chest was thick more with muscle than breasts, but her boobs still sat high on her large pectorals. Her wide back curved in to a narrow, muscle laden midsection and her well muscled arms looked to be 24 inches unflexed. Laura’s mid-thigh level shorts exposed legs that were long and strong. As Jason’s gaze made it back to her face it was clear she wasn’t amused.

“Do you two really think you can continue to fool Dr. Richards? He’s not the rube you two take him to be. His daughter Nicole is the head of the pharmaceutical division and she has been snooping around the gym.”

Jason scoffed. “The gym is more secure than Fort Knox. And the door to the basement lab weighs 1000 pounds. Even if she made it into the gym, she’s never get into the lab.”

Laura shook her head. “I’m not as confident as you are I’m afraid. Besides, why on earth would you want to hide your true strength? Don’t you remember why we started this in the first place? It was to become super heroes! We were going to help people.”

Jason grinned. “That’s in the comic books.” He turned toward Vanessa, who had stood up and was clutching the ipad against her huge boobs. “Although, that would be a great idea. Me as a comic book hero. We should pitch the idea!”

Vanessa smiled and was already tapping on the ipad. “Yes, you could then promote the comic book as you continued to break your lifting records across the country.”

Jason smiled. “Or across the world!”

Vanessa giggled as Laura shook her head. “I would leave you two alone, but if you remember, Jason and I were heading to the gym.”

Vanessa swiped the ipad and pulled up a schedule. “Right! Jason needs to give me a new baseline for bench press and curls today so I can factor that into my equations.”

Laura sighed. “Uh-huh. I suppose you want me to write the results down for you and bring them home.”

Vanessa nodded. “Yes. No more texting that sort of thing. We don’t need that kind of information roaming the digital highway.”

Laura picked up the car keys and headed for the door. “Come on Jason. I know how much of a thrill pumping up your muscles gives you. I could use a work out too.”

Jason nodded and followed Laura toward the door. He turned his head toward Vanessa, smiled and gave her a wink. He was already plotting getting back to Vanessa once Laura headed down to the lab like she usually did. Vanessa smiled back and bit her lip, blushing with equal anticipation.

Laura climbed into the Hummer and Jason sat down in the passenger seat, which was already set to handle his size. As they pulled away Jason turned toward Laura.

“Awe, come on Laura, you need to lighten up a bit. Just because Progression worked better on me doesn’t mean you still can’t join me at some of the charity events to lift some heavy stuff too. After all you are the second strongest person on earth.”

Laura sighed. “I have no desire to be part of your scam. You two would want me to hold back and add me to your wagers. No thanks.”

Jason let out an annoyed sigh and crossed his large arms across his massive chest, enjoying the feeling of his indestructible muscles. He flexed his chest a few times for effect.

“Suit yourself. But you don’t know what you’re missing. The cheering crowds are a big turn on!”

Laura nodded her head sullenly and forced a smile. “Yes, I know how much you enjoy that. I’m glad that it makes you happy. I just wished you would be more honest, that’s all.”

Jason shook his head; he was tired of this conversation and turned to look out the window. A few minutes later they were at the gym. His gym. The biggest gym in the state. He hopped out of the car and smiled at the marquee. “Jason’s Gym, Home of the Strongest Man on Earth.”

As they walked in several people turned and one person walked up to Jason, looking for an autograph. He smiled and walked over toward the counter. He only signed pictures of him posing in skimpy shorts that people could buy for $20. Laura sighed again as Jason signed the photo and followed her toward the back area and their own gym with the lab below.

They pushed in numbers and put their eyes forward for scans before the two foot thick metal doors opened up. Jason smiled as he saw huge metal disks, massive hydraulic devices and big screens connected to computers that controlled the machines and could measure muscle girth and density. Only Laura, Vanessa and Jason knew just what he, or for that matter, Laura was capable of. And with further Progression treatments there didn’t appear to be any stopping them.

Jason ripped off his shirt, exposing his massive upper body. He rubbed his hands together. Within minutes the machines were powered on and Jason was pumping hundreds of tons. Laura punched in progressively larger numbers until he topped out at 678 tons for two reps. His muscles were pumped up to incredible levels and he smiled at her as he grabbed a towel to wipe off the sweat.

“A new record! That felt incredible. Ready for a turn yourself, I can set the weights down for you.”

Laura’s expression was thoughtful as she wrote down his results, but then as she stood up, her expression changed. Looking at Jason, he was surprised when she told him.
153312122.title: "...what about your fiancé?"

choices: Jason breaks into the Richards' lab looking for evidence.
Laura lied about the break in to be alone in the lab with her new formula.
1533121222.content:
"Someone WHAT?!?" Jason yelled. He began breathing heavily as seething rage poured into his body. He tended his already pumped arms and chest and his veins rose to the surface of his skin looking ready to burst. He stomped over to a reenforced rack of huge dumbbells and picked up one that was about the size of a large dog. The label on the side indicated the weight weighed 10 tons, but Jason handled it like it were no more than a baseball. He then hurled it towards the far side of the gym 200 hundred feet away where it broke a hole in the wall and vanished. Jason put his hands to his temples and shut his eyes tight trying to control his temper. "Are you sure?"

"I wasn't at first," Laura said calmly, she had seen these sort of outbursts from Jason before, "but now I'm sure."

"How?"

"Well, the power log shows that the computer was on early this morning, but I didn't think much of that because Vanessa comes by at strange times. But one of the micro-filament strands I had placed across the USB ports has been broken, and neither Vanessa or I ever use those ports. Someone else plugged something into the system."

"What filaments?" Jason didn't know what Laura was talking about. 

"Well, you and Vanessa made me take out the security cameras from here since you didn't want any video leaking out that could ruin your little lie. So I put tiny strands across the ports that would break if someone used them."

"What time does the log say the system was accessed?" Jason was maintaining his cool, but he was right on the edge. 

"7:22 AM."

Jason spoke slowly and deliberately tempering his anger. "Okay, pull up the security footage from the main gym and see who was near the secure door around 7:22 AM. Please."

Laura clicked through the menus for a few minutes then frowned. "It's all been wiped. The video from 7:18 to 7:31 is all blank."

Jason began to shake. His face flushed and his chest surged forward. With a floor rattling yell Jason began overturning racks of weights and tossing plates around. This time Laura backed up against the nearest wall, less from fear and more to remain away from flying debris.

Finally Jason began to settle. He looked at Laura with murder in his eyes. "WHO?"

"There's no way to kn-"

"You said Richards has a daughter, that she's been poking around. Right?"

"Well, yeah."

"Then it's got to be her. I know it. What was her name again?"

"Nicole."

Jason approached the computer and did a few quick searches. It didn't take long to find an address and photo of Nicole Richards. She was a cute redhead, a bit overweight, but very pretty. Jason found the address on google maps and left the gym without a word.

He didn't even bother to take Laura's car and instead opted to run to Nicole's home. His massive legs propelled him faster and faster until he was pushing 50 miles an hour and still not exerting himself much. As he ran he couldn't help but think that the name Nicole Richards sounded very familiar. Something about a profile and changes caused by an iPhone app. The memories were buried but in there somewhere fighting to be heard. Instead Jason ignored it and continued running. All that mattered now was finding this Nicole person and making her pay for her theft. If she exposed his lie he would be ruined in the eyes of the public, but even worse if she discovered the secret of Progression he could potentially be dethroned as the strongest person in the world. He didn't like the idea of competition and would keep his secret process safe at all costs. 

Several minutes later Jason had spanned the 25 miles between the gym and Nicole's house which was a huge walled off compound with a mansion on a hill in the center. Without even slowing Jason leapt over the 15 foot wall and sailed halfway across a large field. He slowed his run and approached the main house. As he rounded the rear and approached a huge patio with several deck chairs and a pool he heard a voice behind him.

"Hello, can I help you?"

Jason turned and found himself facing Nicole Richards. It was quickly obvious that the picture he had seen at the gym was an old one. The Nicole before him was no longer the cute and overweight girl but a ravishing beauty with a tight gymnasts body. She stood 5 feet 9 inches tall with fair skin and thick red hair that spilled across her shoulders. Her face was gorgeous with full lips and a light splash of freckles across her nose. Her eyes were otherworldly and seemed to glow unnaturally green. She wore black lycra shorts that hugged her hips and rear like a second skin and a matching sports bra with perfectly rounded C cup breasts underneath. Her outfit as well as her running shoes and iPod on her hip suggested she was just about to head out for a jog. Her legs were long and muscled and her bare stomach showed off a defined six pack. Her shoulders were broad and her arms trim with cut muscles that popped as Nicole raised her hands to tie her hair back in a pony tail.

"Jason Sullivan!" Nicole lit up. Her smile was brilliant and intoxicating. "I'm a huge fan!! What are you doing here?"

For a moment Jason's confidence wained. As strong as he was this woman made him feel weak. Then he remembered the break-in. "Don't play dumb! I'm here because you stole files from our computer!"

Nicole's face took on a look of surprise, but her eyes didn't. To Jason it looked as though her eyes were laughing. "I have no idea what you mean! Why would I steal anything from you?"

"Don't play dumb. I know you've been snooping around, and now someone wiped our security videos and copied our hard drives."

Nicole laughed. "And you think it was me? I'm sure you have some proof to back up your claim. Otherwise I think you should be on your way."

As if on cue a platoon of security personnel surrounded Jason. 

"You think these guys could even slow me down?"

"No, but I think the video cameras they all have attached to their visors could capture enough incriminating video of you threatening a poor little girl to effectively end your career."

The wind was removed from Jason's sails. He realized how flimsy his case really was, he had no proof only a hunch. "This isn't over," he said and turned to leave. 

"Before you go," Jason stopped to listen without turning back, "I just want you to know I really am a huge fan of you and your beautiful fiancé. I used to be overweight and out of shape and the two of you really inspired me to work hard and get fit. As you can see I've made some pretty amazing progression." She let the last word hang in the air until Jason turned to look at her again. Nicole smiled her incredible smile once more. "Of course I'd be lying if I said that daddy didn't help. It does pay to be the daughter of the world's foremost gene therapy scientist." Nicole raised her arms and flexed her biceps. Her fit arms expanded way more than should have been possible. Her gymnasts arms grew to bodybuilder proportions until her softball sized biceps took her arms to 18 inches around. "I'm no where near as strong as you, of course, but a girl can dream." She tightened her flex even further squeezing yet another inch out of her eye popping biceps before relaxing her arms, which shrank back to their previous size, and blowing Jason a kiss. Then she nonchalantly put her iPod earbuds in and took off at a jog down a path towards a group of trees. 

Jason left the compound, the whole way being followed by the security team that he suspected Nicole had no need for.
1533121222.title: Confrontation

15331212222.content:
Laura sat down in the lab, the generators were humming and a number of beakers were boiling, pushing out precise quantities of solutions into long tubes that mixed together to end up in a single flask. Laura was staring as her new version of Progression dripped forth. She glanced over at the third beaker, the one she had made a deal to get, the one that not only linked her initial gene therapy together, but gave an added bonus. Her concentration was broken when the phone buzzed. She stepped over to pull up a text.

“He just left.”

She put the phone down. “Damn.”

Laura then looked around and smiled slightly as she stepped over toward a mini fridge and was happy to see some ice cubes. Pulling one out, she plopped it into the beaker and stepped upstairs quickly into the gym. She had already done her best to clean things up, but it would take a team of welders to fix some of the mess. Of course the team of welders was quite used to cleaning up “unexpected” messes. At least most of the weights were in the right places. She had left the heavier ones alone, not willing to give anything away.

She knew Jason would come back. If Vanessa told him she needed his best bench and curl numbers then he would make sure she got them. She grumbled out loud, upset that he listened to Vanessa more than her. Of course it had been going on for a while, but that didn’t make it any easier to take. Nor was the sleeping around. How dumb did he think she was? Or worse yet, how little did he care? Of course she also knew that Vanessa was the only one besides herself strong enough to actually have sex with him, but she knew all about the throngs of woman at the hotels when he traveled.

Glancing up at the gym cameras to make sure Jason wasn’t near; Laura quickly headed back downstairs, turned off the heat to the chemistry set and closed the end valve. She picked up the flask and looked at it for a moment, swirling the contents around as the ice cube melted. Letting out a nervous sigh, she pulled the beaker up to her mouth and drank the contents down. Licking her lips she headed back toward the stairs, turned off the lab computer and the lights and reaching the top, carefully pulled the heavy metal down until the hydraulics kicked in and slowly pulled the door into the floor. Several clicks indicated the door was closed. Laura pulled the area rug over the trap door and walked back to the computers to make sure Jason hadn’t ruined any of the delicate equipment. She let out a small burp and felt the advanced Progression formula work its way through her system as she checked out the hardware.

While Laura worked, Jason was still walking back, talking to Vanessa.

“No, I don’t know how she got in or how she was able to flex up muscles out of nowhere. That’s what you’re supposed to tell me!”

“OK, I’ll see what I can find. Have you talked any more to Laura?”

Jason grumbled. “No, not yet. I suppose I should head back there and see if there is any more information from the computers.”

“Yes. And make sure to finish your workout to give me some baseline numbers for both your curl and your bicep size.”

Jason sniffed. “Considering what happened I’m not as thrilled as I was earlier.”

“Yes, I know, but until we have some proof or Nicole makes a move we need to stay on plan. Besides, once you start working out you’ll feel better.”

Jason nodded to nobody. “Yeah, you’re right. I do love working my bi’s.”

“That’s my boy. Now let me do some checking and we can talk more tonight at say, your place?”

Jason smiled, and growled softly. “Sure thing. I’ll just have to lose Laura.”

Jason hung up, looked ahead and started running back toward his gym. Within moments he was running as fast as the traffic, if not faster, and only slowed down when he made it to the gym. He brushed himself off, and realized that he was in only his shorts and his specially made shoes. As he entered the gym and the desk crew smiled at him, Jason smiled back waved and pointed to the back gym. They nodded and he walked briskly to the back area and entered the lab. Laura looked up from a console as Jason entered.

“How did it go?”

Jason looked at her with anger and turned away. “Not good. I confronted this Nicole, but she of course denied everything even though I’m quite sure she knew what I was talking about.”

Laura held her plain expression. “So you weren’t able to get any proof?”

Jason shook his head. “But that wasn’t the worst of it. When she pulled in her security she flexed her arms.”

Laura stared at him blankly as he paused for effect. “And her biceps expanded. A lot. I mean, way more than they should be able to. More than anyone should be able to.”

Laura turned her head slightly, trying hard not to smile. “And then what? Did she say anything?”

Jason’s face flashed red as his anger returned. “Nothing! The bitch turned around and ran off. We need to figure out what is going on.”

Laura nodded her head. “OK, what do you want to do?”

Jason looked around, eyeing his earlier handiwork on his equipment. “Well maybe we could run a tracer to see which files have been copied.”

Laura looked at him to continue, but then he turned to look at the weights. “After I work out my arms. I need to blow off some steam.”

Laura forced herself not to roll her eyes or smile. She thought that dealing with Jason over the years had given her the ability to be a good poker player. Moving over toward another section of the gym, Laura reached out to a display and powered up the station. There was a thick bar with giant plates on both side and hydraulics to lock them into place. A laser machine sat above the center of the bar and several others were on either side. Jason smiled for the first time since Laura gave him the news of the computer hack and walked up to the bar.

“I assume you have the lasers ready to measure my biceps after I pump the weights.”

Laura nodded. This station had taken months to finish and was all about Jason’s ego. It wasn’t enough that he could curl weights no other person on earth could hope to move, but a complex set of equipment was put together to measure and announce the size of his biceps. It was configured for Laura and even Vanessa, but they rarely used the extra feature. Only now as Laura felt more and more powerful did she think about utilizing the feature on herself. But not now. Jason needed to go first. She set the computer to allow for Jason to announce adding more weight and moved off to the side as he approached the bar.

By now every movement Laura made was causing her muscles to contract and bulge, pushing out slightly larger and feeling much stronger. The experience was raising the hair on the back of her neck and she was starting to sweat. Jason was ignoring Laura completely as he set himself and reached down to the bar.

“Computer, Jason. Set for 100 tons.”

The computer responded. “Confirmed.”

He reached down and easily deadlifted the weight up and with a small grunt began curling the weight. Laura looked on as he slowly increased the weight after a set of 10. His strength and his bulging biceps used to turn her on and only a year ago she would have been begging to let her feel his muscles and cheer him on as he curled heavier and heavier weights. Now she felt quite different. It wasn’t emptiness so much as a loss. But as the power of the new Progression pulsed through her veins, new feelings were coming to life.

As he finished up with 205 tons, another record, he dropped the weight and the room shook. Smiling over at a nearby mirror and still ignoring Laura, he pulled up his right arm and staring at it, looked over at the console.

“Computer, biceps.”

The lasers moved quickly and announced, “42.5 inches.”

Jason smiled and with his typical boastful attitude turned toward Laura for the first time since he started.

“Another new record! Pretty awesome, huh?”

Laura’s eyes narrowed. “Yeah, pretty awesome.”

He gave her a sideways look. Did she look different? Shaking it off Jason snickered and said.

153312122221.content:
Jason always felt better after a good pump. Especially one that confirmed just how strong he was. He clearly was super human. The only one in his class was Laura. And she was less than a tenth as strong as he was. This fact alone had given him the bravado and the overall arrogance that had driven him to take whatever he wanted. He had initially enjoyed Laura’s excitement and sex with her was incredible, but when he wanted to reach out and take what the world had to offer, she didn’t want to come along for the ride. And as he alone had supreme strength to go along with his world record breaking physique he didn’t have to worry about any consequences. After all, what could Laura really do to him anyway? He continued to play along with her to keep her under his thumb, but it was getting harder to get a read on her. And he hadn’t seen her lift in a while.

So just to keep a mental note of just how far Laura stood below him and to accentuate his dominance, he decided to play nice and offer her a chance to work out him. After everything she continued to do for him, he figured she’d earned it.

“Now that you’ve seen what a real man can do, how about we see what you can do.”

Laura kept her emotions in check, but her response betrayed her calm exterior.

“Really? Can I? I wouldn’t want to get in your way.”

Jason sighed. “Look, if you want to be that way we can just go back to the computers and check for further signs of entry.”

Laura licked her lips. She felt primed for action. Her senses were all on edge and she let out a few controlled breaths to contain herself. She had no idea how effective this new version would be and she didn’t want to overplay her hand if she didn’t have one. But it took everything she had not to just try and lift what he had just completed.

Laura walked over to the bar where Jason still stood and forced another smile with as much warmth as she could fake.

“Sorry Jason, I guess the break in bothers me too. I would love to work my arms.”

Jason sniffed, satisfied with her response and backed out of the work out area. Laura let out another breath as her pulse started to race.

“Computer, Laura. Set for 10 tons.”

Jason backed up against a rack of weights and smiled. From what he remembers, this was already near her previous best. Perhaps she was getting stronger too. She did look a bit bigger he thought.

Laura reached down and easily pulled up the bar. She remembered how thrilled she was when she was first able to dead lift this much weight. Of course Jason made sure to lift ten times as much and then more. But now…

But now this weight felt…

Light. Really light in fact.

Trying not to smile, Laura kept up the show and slowly curled the weight for ten reps and held it at her thighs. Her entire body was tingling and she feeling as more excitement than she had felt in, well, years!

“Computer. 20 tons.”

The hydraulics kicked in and more plates kicked in. Laura almost giggled as she still felt little resistance. She quickly knocked off 10 reps and paused. Jason looked on, a bit put off that she was apparently actually one tenth as strong as he. Something she hadn’t been since they first took the Progression. And his feelings changed further as Laura pulled in another excited breath.

“Computer. 40 tons.”

Jason was going to say something about the weight being too heavy, but before he could Laura was already curling the weight. He watched as her arms appeared to be pulsing with each rep and looked like they were growing…. Larger. Certainly bigger than she had been. In fact all of her muscles looked like they were pushing out larger across her frame. Her legs, already thick and cut looked denser and harder, stripping off the small amount of fat as her quads and calves sharpened considerably. Her glutes rose up as he could see her shorts push out, exposing the bottom of her behind. Jason could tell he back and chest were widening and thickening as her thick spandex top pulled outward, exposing hints of the muscles growing below. He barely had a chance to take in her other muscles when Laura shocked him with her next statement.

“Computer. 80 tons.”

Jason stood upright and stared on as Laura began to curl what was now easily 7 times her previous best. He focused on her arms and was no longer surprised to see that they had grown much bigger than before. Laura could flex her biceps up to 26 inches on a good day. But he surmised that her biceps were now swelling up well beyond 30 inches. And as she pumped the weight he could see those biceps harden, thicken and bristle with new muscles and scary detail. By the time she finished another ten reps Jason was feeling something he hadn’t felt in years.

Nervous. And that unfamiliar emotion expanded further as Laura announced the next weight, this time with a smile.

“Computer. 160 tons.”

Jason’s jaw opened as he heard the familiar hydraulics kick in and watched as the larger plates were brought into play. He cleared his throat and before Laura attempted her first curl, she turned her head looking for Jason to say something. He nearly stammered, but held his normal commanding tone.

“What’s going on here?”

Laura gave him a mischievous look. “What do you mean?”

Jason grunted. “You know exactly what I mean. You’re about to attempt to curl over 10 times your previous best lift. What have you been up to?”

Laura gave him the same look he had received from Nicole. Her face had a look of surprise, but her eyes were laughing. And as she started to curl the weight like it was no big deal, she raised her eyebrows as if nothing were out of the ordinary.

“Oh nothing really. You know me, always tinkering.”

Laura quickly knocked off ten curls and paused as Jason struggled to put his thoughts together. And Laura was not about to let him off the hook. Not today! She felt unstoppable. She felt like she was in control for the first time. And she was going to enjoy it! And the best part so far, the part that Jason hadn’t even seen yet, was the extra bonus. But first things first. Laura nearly laughed as she announced.

“Computer. 320 tons.”

Jason’s face flashed anger. No way was she going to curl that much! There was no way she was over twice as strong as him! He clenched his fists at his side and his massive muscles pumped hugely. He took a step forward to put this to an end, but didn’t make it to a second step when Laura moaned.

And slowly, hypnotically, curled the weight.

Once, twice, three times in slow, controlled, sexy, powerful strokes. Her biceps responded with shocking growth, adding inch after inch of muscle as she curled over twice Jason’s best with seeming ease. After 10 full, strong reps Laura let out a satisfied sigh and let the weight drop with a deafening boom that shook the entire block.

“Well that was a good warm up. But I figured since I just crushed your record that you’d like to get a look at the biceps that kicked your ass!”

Laura pulled up her right arm slowly for effect as Jason quite literally shook with growing rage. How could she do this? Why didn’t she do this to him? As Jason stood there temporarily frozen, Laura looked over toward the computer as she pulled her hand into a fist, but didn’t flex.

“Computer. Biceps.”

The lasers did a quick sweep and announced “36 inches”.

Laura smiled at that and brought her forearm down slowly and then bringing it back up began to squeeze her fists.

“Computer. Biceps and continue to announce each inch increase.”

The lasers moved and began to announce 38 in…, but stopped as Laura tensed her bicep fully. Jason’s eyes widened as he watched something he never would have believed if he hadn’t just seen it done an hour before. Only this time the muscle being flexed was much larger, much harder and much, much stronger. Laura’s bicep surged upward as muscle fibers flooded her bicep and triceps, multiplying and growing, pushing muscles on top of muscles, fueling her strength to even higher levels and causing the computer to choke as it tried to keep up. Jason thought it was stuck as it spat out.

“Forty…, Forty…, Forty…”

It kept going until Jason soon realized that her bicep had grown beyond his best and that she wasn’t slowing down when it got stuck on….

“Fifty…, Fifty…, Fifty…”

Rips and tears were barely heard above the computer, but it was evident that Laura’s top was losing a futile attempt to contain her surging upper body that was growing bigger, although not nearly as big or as fast as her biceps; which now peaking up toward her fist and were already stuck on…

“Sixty…., Sixty… Sixty…”

Jason had had enough. Whatever she was doing, whatever she had done it didn’t matter. Nobody shows up Jason Sullivan! Even as the computer kicked into the Seventies, Jason stormed forward, his right hand back into a fist. Laura turned her head to see him approach, narrowed her eyes and gave him a look that dared him to come closer.

Seeing red, Jason...

A warm body, a woman's body, snuggled up close to him and wrapped her leg around his while pressing her chest and breasts against his arm. From his perspective the woman felt tiny, a mere fraction of his size; but then he realized that this was because he was so large not because she was small. The woman slid her hand across Jason's chest and squeezed his pectoral muscle. 

Never in his life had Jason been touched in this way and his penis leapt into immediate action hardening and pitching a 17 inch tent with the bed sheets.

The woman sat up and Jason got his first look at her. The first thing that was obvious was that she was gorgeous. He smile dazzled and he could feel himself falling for this woman already. The second thing that was clear was that this woman was a bodybuilder. She had wide shoulders and a thick chest that supported her C cup breasts and kept them from drooping. Her abs were chiseled and looked cut from steel while piano key obliques lined her sides. Just something small to improve her life.
155312.content:
"Yeah... yeah I did, wait here a second and I'll bring it to you." Eileen felt like she got everything she could have ever wanted and so much more, she had no reason to keep the magical phone, but she did want to make sure this world stayed as perfect as it was.

She only now noticed how much people have changed due to her shift. In the old reality, the shorter woman would have been considered a powerful sex goddess, but in this new one, she was below-average. As Eileen ran up to her room, the strengthened walls and stairs slightly creaked and shook with each of her steps. She made it to the phone and did a quick search through its contents to find out it belonged to Laura Friedman. She swiftly opened the alterations app and put Laura's name. During her first search through the app, she noticed one of the tabs that frightened her but now seemed necessary - the personal wants and needs. She opened it and wrote down something with a little bit of a heavy feeling on her heart:

"Laura won't care about checking to see what previous changes were made with the app. Even if she doesn't know what these changes are, she will also never feel the need to reverse any of them - this mostly means that Laura will never think of changing me or my family with the app."

Unknowingly changing the world when she became an amazon was one thing, brainwashing was a whole nother topic and she knew that if she wanted to keep this magnificent form she really did not have much of a choice. She ran back down the stairs and handed the phone straight to Laura.

"You didn't by any chance find a strange app on that phone, did you?" Misako asked.
"Yeah... but it was really weird... and confusing so I didn't bother with it; also, it's not my phone and I was just about to call the police about it. It just flew in through my window ha-ha." Misako found it strange to see the sexiest person in the world embarrassed and confused; each one of Eileen's biceps was nearly the size of Laura, and Misako knew in her heart that there was something odd about that. No matter how much someone works out, you don't achieve this size through natural means alone.

She made a mental note of this and returned with Laura to the car. Before they entered she whispered into Laura's ear: "I don't trust her." Yet when she looked at Laura's face it showed no signs of worry, which was even odder. They entered the vehicle and Sammy felt some relief knowing where the app was, even he was afraid someone would royally screw the world over with it.

"Ok Sammy, we will take you down to the station, Laura, you will come with me to a separate room where we can study that app more closely." They both nodded quietly and the police brigade drove away from Eileen's home. She went back in and felt a massive weight lift itself from her - as if the app itself was some cursed object that was no longer forcing its presence on her. She went up to her bed and started thinking about Rosa - her friend from college. She was from Cuba and in the old reality, she was a 5'8'' fit dancer who had nothing to do with the goth culture but was attracted to it. In the first semester, they tried dating for two weeks but found that they enjoyed being friends more than being a romantic pair. They still occasionally had sex. While thinking about her, Eileen realized the image that was popping into her head was of Rosa's new figure, and it was hot. Rosa now stood a towering 8'6'' and her curves alone rivaled Eileen's. She wasn't that muscular, though in this reality that still meant a prominent 12 pack and sizable 40'' biceps; that didn't matter for Eileen. She remembered how much more virile their sex now was and thinking about it made her orgasm a few times. She picked up her phone and called Rosa immediately.

~~~

Laura and Misako stood in an interrogation room and stared at the open app. Sammy willingly entered his cell and requested to never see the phone again.
"I tried deleting it; it won't let me," Laura spoke slightly dejected, she didn't want to tell Misako that she really wanted to try the app out. "And I don't think Eileen did anything. Why would the most powerful person in the world want to change anything about herself?"
"Did you think she might have become that powerful because of the app? We don't know its full capabilities." Misako did not want to touch the phone herself after she saw what Sammy looked like 5 minutes after not using it.
"Well, I don't want to throw away my phone and you don't want anyone to touch it so there really isn't a way to transfer all of my data to a new phone. It kinda has to stay with me." Laura wanted it to stay with her, she was slightly frightened by how much she wanted to use the app.
"You know I can't take any chances of having this app out there right? I hate to say this, but you are going to have to be put under watch Laura. I won't mess with your private life, and I honestly can't stop you from using the app yourself. But the moment that phone is robbed or I find out you used the app recklessly; I will treat it is a weapon of mass fucking destruction. My squad and I will keep a close watch on you, your family and your friends. We will make routine reality checks by writing down any and all things that you could change and comparing our checks. You will come to a weekly psyche check to make sure you are of sound mind and if you believe you can use that app for genuine good it will be done only in a controlled environment. Do you understand?" Laura quietly nodded to everything.

They both left the room, the phone was placed into a briefcase that Misako cuffed to her arm all the way until they reached Laura's house. "There is a geolocator chip inside that phone and briefcase either the phone is more than 20 feet away from the briefcase and/or the briefcase leaves the premises of your home, a police squadron will arrive and get it back. I will be out here for the rest of the day, one of my partners will cover the night shift. See you around kiddo."

Laura got to her home and let out a massive sigh of relief. While Misako was busy with repeating her long-winded explanation for how the rest of her life would go, Laura discovered the historical change option in the phone - Misako would never be able to find out about a change she never knew happened. However... Laura also knew there was a clear basis to Misako's fears, what if the changes got out of control? She didn't want to wake up one morning and discover she unconsciously and out of greed turned herself into a ruthless titanic ruler that crushed dissidents under her massive feet and ate people for fun. She nearly vomited on that thought.
She could hear the sounds of Vanessa and Greg working out in the basement and peeked to see her 8'1'' Goth, blonde, mega muscular sister working out with her 9' mountain-of-muscles brother while listening to heavy metal that was just a little too much for her. She swore that every month both of them looked a little bigger, not that that was strange, it was just the pace of their growth was unusual even for this world. Vanessa alone was now easily bigger and stronger than Misako outside, though only a little shorter and with slightly smaller NN cups.

Laura always felt jealous of their figures, everyone in their family was big and powerful and she... she flexed her 20'' biceps and felt her firm ass - she just couldn't stop comparing it to Greg's monumental 78 inchers and Vanessa's ass that was so big and powerful she even got into a local newspaper for breaking the concrete floor at a club she frequented due to being too drunk.

she went up to her room and did what she usually did when she wanted to just think - started curling her 30 kg dumbbells in both arms. She stared at the phone waiting for her inside the briefcase on her desk and thought.

~~~

Eileen had the best sex of her entire life and even her strengthed ultra-large bed had a hard time not creaking under her and Rosa's combined weight and strength. She swore she could feel her and Rosa slightly grow after they climaxed but ignored the thought.
"Do you ever wonder how much even better our sex could be if I was your size?" Rosa mused out loud, the smaller woman lay on top of Eileen.

And Eileen did wonder.

She only needed to find a way to get the app.
It was only an app after all.

It seemed like such a strange idea, but the more Laura thought about how to implement it, the more she liked it. If Misako didn't care about Laura using the app, she wouldn't tell her co-workers to keep an eye on Laura, and Laura could go on using it as much as she wanted.

It was the "how?" that Laura got stuck on for a while; until she realized she could look at Misako's own desires. Under some general desires about what she wanted the world to be like - mostly the word justice about 15 different times in 10 paragraphs that were a little too long - Laura found Misako's hidden sexual desires. Laura was kinda shocked to discover Misako was into women who were slightly older than her but much taller and more muscular - and most importantly, were neither dominating or submissive to her. Laura, already finding most of the people around to be jaw-droppingly sexy, realized making herself into Misako's ideal lover won't only net her a hot girlfriend, but also a carte blanche on using the app to even further improve her life.

As she started using her phone, she made sure that Misako wasn't looking at her fro outside and starting changing herself drastically, making sure she picked historical change. As she finished sculpting her titanic new form, she began writing down the explanation for the new reality. "While I was still born to the same family, I wasn't my mother's daughter, I was her sister in this new reality. We loved to work out together and over the years I became much bigger, sexier and more powerful than her, but we remained good friends. Sometime last year I spotted Misako giving out a report and it was love at first sight for both of us. Over the next few months we met each other more and more until half a year ago we bought a nice apartment and moved in together. I received the app around the same time as in this reality and the events that happened to this phone were about the same, except Misako didn't report about it to her higher-ups and instead, I promised her that we would make the next change together."

As I finished, I applied the change and the whole world spun around me. I found myself on a large bed that I remembered getting last year with Misako. I was kinda shocked for a few minutes as 37 years' worth of new memories sprung into my brain. I remembered my sister and I working out and I quickly outgrowing her. I remembered the looks of lust, jealousy, and envy I got as I continued working out and became a professional supermodel (I didn't even write that part!), and I remembered meeting Misako and our many nights of passionate sex and exhilarating work-outs.

As I stood up I saw the 12' ceiling get frighteningly close and the top of my head brushed against it, just as it had for the past week or so. I looked down and I could barely see anything past my endless cleavage - definitely bigger than Eileen's. I flexed all my muscles and my pale naked body shuddered with ecstasy. My 20-pack of raw power felt like titanium, my biceps were much bigger than Eileen's at around 150''. I found it strange I was thinking about Eileen so much, but then again I considered her a sort of a protegee. In this new reality, she came to me for all sorts of advice, from where I got my goth attire that could fit my perfect through what to do at the gym. I looked over our closet to see all the many custom-made dresses. I decided I wanted to stay naked and continued observing my long powerful legs - pillars of strength. My ass was curvy and powerful. My hair was long and mostly white.

As I stepped out of the room through large doors, I arrived at our living room + kitchen, the ceiling here was much taller. Then I saw a photo of me and Misako at a promotion ceremony at the police HQ and realized I forgot to take into account what would happen if a bodybuilding-crazed-superwoman became Misako's lover. Misako was much bigger and sexier now. She had to have been at least 9'6'' and her police uniform did nothing to hide her magnificent curves and musculature.

"Heya sexy," I heard her voice from the couch and she got up and started groping my huge breasts. our naked forms made love for about an hour - fortunately it was Sunday and my next photoshoot wasn't until tomorrow.

Eileen noticed nothing odd as she remembered she somehow forgot the fact that the magical phone she found belonged to her role model from her old reality. Well, in the old reality Laura Friedman was well known among goth circles for how powerful and sexy she was, even if the goth culture was a little niche, Laura helped goth girls feel a little less lonely by being a role model. Eileen still thought about how strange it was that in this reality they got so close because Eileen made herself so big; would they have gotten this close in the old reality? Wait a minute, did Laura use the app to make herself that big?! No, she seemed genuinely frightened when Eileen told her about the strange app yesterday when she and Misako appeared at her house. Of course, Eileen only told them she found the app, not that she used it.

Eileen picked up her phone and started searching for any information people had about the app, she wanted to give rosa the form she deserved - bigger and sexier than even Eileen's own. Most of the forums seemed to point out contradictory information. Some users say they just found the app on their phone one morning, others said it came with the phone. there seemed to be nothing to connect all of the cases of people using the app. Except for the fact that after one use they suddenly got the urge to continue using it and decided to get rid of it as soon as they could; some even went as far as burning their phones. Eileen thought for a second - what if this is what the app does? What if it was doing the same thing to her now?

And as those thoughts swirled in her brain she got a strange and familiar-looking notification.

~~~

Misako and her lover were exhausted after trying every sexual position they could think of twice. Ever since the 28-year-old met the older woman her life had only gotten more perfect every day. And since that day when they both found out Laura's stolen phone had a magical app on it, she was thinking about how much more perfect they could make it together.

"Are you ready?" Misako got up from their bed and looked at Laura's phone.

info.brief_description: Laura finds an iPhone app that allows her to change herself and others.
info.description:
OMG!! 500 chapters! Thank you to everyone who has added chapters to my story. Now let's shoot for 1,000!!!

Laura (18) is a plain and ordinary girl who is tired of living in the shadow of her sexy and popular siblings. Her sister, Vanessa (20), is a 5' 10" busty, blond, bombshell with a fit body from years of cheerleading. Her brother, Greg (24) is an amateur bodybuilder and has packed a good amount of muscle onto his 6' 2" frame.

Laura is horribly jealous of both of her siblings; both her sister's amazing curves and good looks and her brother's size and strength. Laura herself is a 5' 4" 105 pound waif with no boobs to speak of. Though she's good at school she's also a bit of a geek who's really into Sci-Fi movies, comic books and video games, and as such she's a bit of a social outcast. Her siblings, on the other hand, were each massively popular in their day such that everyone is always comparing Laura to them.

All of this is about to change, though, since Laura is about to find an iPhone app that can help make a few.... alterations.


Feel free to add. Please no gender switching or animal transformations. I reserve the right to edit or delete your chapters. Have fun!!!
